My partner was asking what device I was using to charge my phone and j showed him this on amazon and I decided to write a review to show my appreciation for this power bank! If you need a large power bank then there is nothing that can touch the 20100!!! Just buy it and you won’t be displeased!
title: Must buy!

author: Matthew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2017
review_content: Great battery. I have owned 4 different anker batteries, all 4 still work wonderfully. This one is no exception, once again Anker has proven that they are the best value for this price range in power banks. My friend and I play pokemon go and bring one with to keep our phones charged, and it charges up my surface 3 about equally to if I had plugged it into a wall outlet. I've only had one defective battery a few years ago when they were still getting started and they shipped me out a new one for free.
title: Great battery. I have owned 4 different anker batteries

author: Ashley S
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2019
review_content: I've been using this product off and on for 6 months. Everything was working great and as promised - so much battery life! I pulled it out to use a week ago and it no longer would charge any device. I contacted Anker customer service via Amazon and they immediately replaced my power bank with a new one. BUY WITH CONFIDENCE knowing if anything goes wrong, Anker's customer service is amazing!
title: BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!

author: James DeMichael
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2017
review_content: I don't give many 5 stars, but right out of the package and with only 1/2 power, charged my Galaxy 6 from 45%, Galaxy 7 from 52%, wifie's Galaxy 5 from 2% and lastly my Surface (did not have percent). Oh and there was still 1/4 power left, not bad in my book. It s a little bigger than my other chargers, but I would expect to bring this for a weekend trip or other excursion where I would not see accessible power, or maybe I would expect to help others who are less prepared out.
title: Best Portable Charger (So Far)

author: Amazing
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
review_content: Great product. Last long and i can charge my phone 2-3 times. It does take a long time to charge and the battery runs out fast if you only charge it up to 2 blue dots. It’s also but heavy to carry it around but other than that I have no problems yet.
title: Nice charger

author: Brian D
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
review_content: I bought this to have on me during a trip overseas. It charged my iPad and iPhone twice over with plenty of battery left. It charges my devices incredibly fast.During a sightseeing outing we passed it around the bus to let everyone charge their phones after hours of taking pictures.I keep it with me in my bag all the time now. It has come in handy on multiple occasions. I have to charge it about twice a month.
title: Amazing battery life, super quick charging!

author: kelly paulson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2019
review_content: I ordered this charger for a music festival after reading the reviews on how awesome the charge was and how many times it would charge my phone but its been a few months and it only charges my phone once or twice now before I have to charge it again and it takes a full day of being plugged in for the battery itself to charge, huge bummer because I love this brand so maybe I just got a faulty one but its too bad :/
title: Was amazing for first few months

author: Hong T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2016
review_content: About this product over a month ago and after the second week the charger literally fell apart into pieces, it was working great for me during those two weeks and then after the charger fell apart when I unplugged it from a full 10 ish hour charge,  are used until I ran out of battery. It wasn't until I recently found another wire somewhere in my closet that I was able to charge it up again but now it seems that the LED light is stuck on the 2nd.and I can't tell whether or not it's full battery becuass it is stuck at just the second light not the first and the second but just the second. Who do I contact about this? Will add photo of the broken charger when and if I find it.
title: Who do I contact????

author: Clifford Wong
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2018
review_content: My Anker PowerCore 20100 has provided me with very reliable and efficient service. It is a very durable high quality product. Anker customer service, especially Sharon, has provided me with outstanding customer service. I needed to replace my micro USB cable so I contacted Anker through my Amazon account. Sharon promptly replied to me and immediately sent me a new micro USB cable. She provided me with truly professional, courteous, and efficient customer service. Such excellent customer service and a high quality product make owning an Anker product extremely satisfying!
title: Such excellent customer service and a high quality product make owning ...

author: Kim M. Nardi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
review_content: Bought this product to charge my phone in a short amount of time and every 5 mins its shutting off and not charging. Before utilizing I charged for 24 hrs and still not working.
title: Unable to use

author: ZR
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
review_content: The battery life of this thing is amazing. I’ve used it to charge my phone multiple times a day with plenty of charge to spare. Not sure if this is a feature but i feel like it charges my iPhone faster than an outlet. The blue led indicators and great for showing how much charge you have left.
title: Outstanding

author: Jhakce Morgan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2018
review_content: It worked great for the first year or so. Past that, it wouldn’t recharge completely, and now one year and two months later, it turned into a glorified paperweight.Update: After posting this, Anker reached out to me and let me know that the product was still under warranty and offered to replace it. So, we’ll see how the new one works and go from there. I am grateful for the warranty and customer service from Anker.
title: It works great

author: Madmartigan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019
review_content: So far it’s great. I will really push this device next month during family trip to Disney. I’ll update this post if it falls short of expectations. I’m confident in the brand, and the charger has been working well so far with light use. It has a solid, durable feel.
title: It works well

author: Kim
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
review_content: Product is defected. Only when turned on, it charges. When the blue lights turn off, the battery stops charging my phone shortly after. I tested with different wires.. it's the battery.I've bought about 10 anker batteries over the past few years. This is my first time buying a red one (mine always get lost or mixed with others, so I got red to differentiate) and this is the first time an anker battery has disappointed me.
title: Defected

author: Robert Sekuler
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2020
review_content: For several weeks, I tried and tried and tried, to no avail.  No advice on the internet (or the instructions that came with the charger) fixed the problem. This particular charger stubbornly refused to charge,Perhaps it was just the luck of the draw (and quality control issues, too?), but I reluctantly concluded that this charger was not going to do the job its name implied. Because I did not really need a small plastic door stop, however nice its color, back it went..
title: Just a doorstop, though a nice shade of blue

author: Cullen A Cochran
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2017
review_content: I used this to power my LabRadar bullet chronograph (Doppler radar to measure bullet speed).  My unit takes a lot of batteries, so the Anker 20100 Power Core is just the ticket!  It powers the radar, so I don't have to spend a fortune in AA batteries.  These Anker Power Core chargers are a great product.  I'm really happy with my puchase!
title: Powers my Labradar bullet chronograph.  Does a great job!  Saves me a ton on AA batteries.

author: Craig Daw
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2016
review_content: I couldn't be more impressed with Anker as a whole. This was the first charger I ordered from them but have nothing to complain about. Has a massive capacity and charging estimates are accurate. Charged my Samsung Note 4 and my wife's IPhone 6 Plus multiple times each from dead and still had quarter battery life. It charges the phones very fast aw well. I thought it would take some time but within an hour you can have 75% charge on your phone. Charging the charger itself takes quite awhile but if you plug it in overnight it'll be charged by morning. We have even dropped the pack twice and it has suffered no damage and still works great. The size is a little bigger than expected but still small for the capacity. It's too big for your pocket but would fit nicely in a purse or backpack.
title: We have even dropped the pack twice and it has suffered no damage and still works great. The size is a little bigger than expect

author: AMANDA TRUJILLO
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2020
review_content: Absolute disappointment. No matter what I did it never fully charged and the USB ports started with one malfunctioning and then the second. So in essence I’ve got a 35.00 dead charging bank. As an Uber/Lyft driver this kind of thing makes my job harder because I need to order a whole new one or consider another product. Caution with purchasing this.
title: Very Disappointed. Product never performed properly.

author: Chet
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
review_content: I've only been using this charger for a short time.  Compared to my mophie, the Anker charges my iPad and iPhone faster and multiple times before needing to be recharged.  The downside is the time it takes to recharge the Anker.  I'm using their wire with an IPAD power adapter.  This combination requires between 4-6 hours to charge the Anker from less than 25% capacity to a full charge.  Nonetheless, I'll be happy to have this Anker on a long plane flight.
title: Great charging capabilities

author: annie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2019
review_content: This charger is literally life. I don't know what I would do without it I absolutely I'm in love with this charger, and it is great to have to also put into my emergency bag in case of a natural disaster. The battery life lasts very long and is capable of charging multiple things
title: Love this

author: Pamela .
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2020
review_content: I've had this for over 2 years and went through the Iphone 7 and currently using it on the Iphone 8 plus, along with other phones. It charges really fast and I can charge up to 6-7 times (if my phone battery is roughly around 50%). It's so much faster than a regular outlet.The only annoying this is that there's mini led lights that light up to let you know how much battery life is left in the charger and two of them don't light up.
title: Great charger!

author: MikMal19
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2019
review_content: I bought this charger to use to charge my phone when the battery got low later in the day and for emergency purposes. The first charger worked perfect for a awhile and all of a sudden stopped working, idk if something happened or what. But I contacted customer service and they were really nice and super fast and I got a replacement sent in no time. Second works perfect and I'll be using it for awhile.
title: Works great and customer service was awesome

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2016
review_content: I use this battery primarily to power my Sony a6300 video camera, whose atrocious internal battery life is compensated for by being able to power the camera via MicroUSB. It's big and chunky, but it gets the job done. I can power the Sony for 17 hours straight or keep my phone charged on a 4 day trip through the woods under heavy use.I like how it determines the maximum safe charge it can deliver, since a lot of cheaper power banks simply have a 2.1amp and 1amp port and rely on your phone to know what it wants.
title: Food, shelter, and the Powercore 20100

author: Emily Howell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2016
review_content: So far so good! I've had this charger for a couple weeks now and I can't imagine how I managed without it. Samsung S6 is notorious for having a small battery, one of the only flaws I can find with that phone. So it needs recharged frequently, especially with how much I use apps. This portable charger has made my life so much easier. I haven't counted, but so far I've never had the charger empty out before two days at least, and I'm a heavy user I think. Fantastic product, fast charge, and a great brand. I've been very satisfied with my Anker products so far.
title: Game changer!

author: Sgaedke1
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2016
review_content: I love this charger.  A little bulky but it is just the backup I need for my iPad when I'm on set script supervising and don't have access to power - actually even better.  My iPad won't last for a 14 hour day on set with out a recharge and this gem keeps me working - I plug it in every night to recharge - Does not come with a plug to charge just a USB cord but will use a regular iPad plug with the charging cord just fine. you will need a charging cord for whatever device you want to charge as well.  Anker may suggest something different but this works for me just fine.
title: Necessary Equipment.

author: Snp
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2020
review_content: This is surely a must have and has helped me when in need. I bought it when I was going overseas and has helped me through out the trip.The only downside is it takes really long to charge it, that's a downside as the capacity to hold charge is also huge.The other downside is it does not have a USB C port and has only 2 USB charging ports.Overall  good experience. Folks with iPhone 11 and above would recommend to wait for a newer version.
title: Handy and always helped when in Need

author: Ilya Goryunov
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2017
review_content: Upd. Next day after my post anker support service reached me with apologize and offering a replacement, which was delivered 30/12, less then in 2 weeks after my post. Sharon from support service was very kind and involved in my issue so I could feel a personal approach.Every company could fail but not every one is able to fix it promptly in such a gentle wayIt came with initial charge of 50% and this was enough for me for a month. After that I have charged it for a 12h (all 4 LED were on) with original power cord, and put into my backpack. Next day I tried to charge my iphone using Anker but without any success - it was on black. I was confused and tried to charge that Anker one more time, but it was still on black. Pushing a button doesn't help, device is obviously dead without any reason.TL;DR initial 50% from stock was good, but it couldn't be used after recharge
title: Disposable power bank

author: Ariel Bowens
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
review_content: This thing has been a complete life saver on those long 12 hour rides down south. I can charge multiple devices and never run out of juice.
title: Definitely worth it

author: Luna
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2019
review_content: I can’t believe I’ve had this since 2015 and still working strong. I use this for charging cell phones and small devices. I just got back from camping and charged multiple phones multiple times. The kids were grateful. I can happily say that I trust Anker and they have earned my business.
title: Anker is a brand you can trust

author: Jay
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
review_content: Fully charges my galaxy s10+ 4 times when on full battery, but takes almost 12 hours to charge the powerbank itself. It's bulky, but charges my phone very fast, and holds a charge for whenever I need it. Really wish it recharged itself faster, but apart from that it's a solid tool to keep in the car when needed.
title: Holds a lot of power, but takes forever to recharge

author: Jaclyn L.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2018
review_content: Loved the portable charger, I take it out with me when I go out backpacking or traveling. I would have given it 5 stars but for some reason the probably battery itself stopped holding a charge and now it completely won't charge up at all when I plug it in. It also will keep turning off and not recognize that my Google Pixel is plugged into it. I've had this for less than a year*UPDATE* Anker customer service reached out and replaced my battery under warranty. They went above and beyond and made this whole issue smooth. Thanks!
title: Loved the portable charger

author: Drellimal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2018
review_content: Very reliable I can charge my phone around 6-7 times before needing to recharge this portable charger. It does take quite a long time to fully charge though, around 10-15 hours depending on the current of the wall adapter you use. The 3rd LED indicator stopped working for me after 3 months but it's not a big deal I still use, love and highly recommend this.My way of using it is to charge it on Sunday then throughout the week you can use it to give your phone some life at the end of the day before you reach back home and it should last you the week at least until Saturday​.
title: Really Reliable and useful

author: M. Thompson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
review_content: Took it camping and worked perfectly fine. I’m glad I brought it, never died on me but we didn’t overly use it either but it was still plenty of life left at the end of the trip
title: Works great

author: Wingbat
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2016
review_content: This is a little heavy to tote around everywhere.  However, if you are looking for a portable charger that you may have to charge once a week or so, this is it.  My teenager got this as part of his birthday. He WAS always letting his iPhone die.  In the first week, he hasn't let it die once.  He lets the phone discharge until it is around 10% or less.  Then he hooks up to this Portable charger.  It charges considerably faster than the stock Apple lightning cord and plug.  Note though that you will have to supply your own lightning cable if you are an apple user.
title: Power Anywhere

author: Jennifer L. Hensley
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020
review_content: Anker provides excellent customer service.  I contacted amazon as I could not plug in my cable to my anker.  Amazon told me it was outside of my return Window so I should contact Anker directly. Anker was phenomenal. I provided them the required information, they gave me a label and I shipped my broken anker to them, and they shipped me a new anker right away. Thank you Anker for excellent customer service.
title: Thank you Anker!! Anker has the portable chargers ever.

author: David Casillas
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2019
review_content: I bought my battery pack years ago and still works great. I bought mine before the prices went up. Before Anker became affiliated with Pokemon, which they deserved. For those complaining about the battery pack not working anymore. You're overcharging the battery which kills it. Some people leave it connected for days. Would be nice if it would stop charging once it was fully charged. This is my 3rd battery pack I've purchased from Anker. And I learned the hard way by overcharging the 1st one. I lost my 2nd one.
title: Dont overcharge your battery pack.

author: Gayle R.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2019
review_content: I bought this charger a little over a year ago, and it worked wonderfully. One full charge of this battery would charge my iPhone X about 4 times and my ipad 2 times. After almost 16 months, the charger stopped charging as well. I contacted customer service, and after a back and forth of 3 emails, a replacement charger was shipped. And I had the replacement in my hands within 3 days. I highly recommend Anker products. The quality of the chargers is amazing, and the customer service was the cherry on top.
title: Price and quality

author: Suzanne C
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2019
review_content: I was so glad I got Anker PowerCore 20100 for the Spain trip last month (Dec 2018). I did not have to worry about draining my cell phone battery while using Google map to find my way around. I had the Google map on most of the time in Toledo, Segovia, and Salamanca. I used it to charge my cell phone and my friend's cell phone as well as a portable wifi device as I was walking and on the train/subway. I also had no problem with security check in my carry-on bag. Must buy!
title: So happy with the purchase

author: buster
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2019
review_content: After much research, I purchased this for work travel. This power bank unbelievably would NOT stay on!!! I had to keep on turning the ON button on the side. Inefficient charging bec it would not stay on. RETURNED today.
title: Product would not stay on to recharge.

author: Daphne
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2020
review_content: Upon arrival, I tried to charge it completely...3 days later still not fully charged! I used the cord it came with and I ordered the power plug....it is extremely expensive but,highly disappointing!!!  The ankor company reached out to me and IMMEDIATELY SENT ME A BRAND NEW THAT WORKS GREAT!!! AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!
title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE

author: Eve
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2018
review_content: This product is quite amazing, BUT if you're planning to buy this product, I will just have to tell you that it is better to get it with their fast charger. My brother own one which I use and I see how BIG the difference in how fast the power bank charge. When I use it with my regular phone charger even with the cable, when I come back five hours later, and it is not even two lights steady on. When I use it with their Anker fast charger,  it will be fully charged within 3 hours which makes such a huge difference. This power bank is absolutely terrific! I just suggest you get the recommended charger for it! It will benefit you in the long run :D
title: Best Travel Buddy!!

author: Anders O. Halvorsen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2019
review_content: We have been using Anker products for years and have always been very happy with their products. Earlier this year, we bought the PowerCore 20100mAh. It stopped charging after a few days but Anker shipped a new unit immediately. As expected, the new unit works great. Highly recommended.
title: Great charger and great customer service

author: Zach T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2018
review_content: Holds a lot of juice! This thing can recharge my iPhone and iPad multiple times! Really worthwhile for someone on the go. However, I believe that it is not something that can be taken onto an airplane. Be warned that TSA might confiscate it. Also it takes forever to charge with a normal usb charger. I would commend getting at rapid charger, which will make this portable battery charge up in a reasonable amount of time.
title: UNLIMITED POWERRRRRR

author: anam1786253
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2019
review_content: I must say I was really disappointed, when I received this, that for the price, it did not include a small black charging cord for iphone.  It only comes with a battery charging cord.  If I had my charging cord, I wouldn't have needed this....sort of defeated the purpose!The last portable charger I ordered, came with both cords and this one was way more expensive!
title: DISAPPOINTED THAT IT DOES NOT COME WITH IPHONE CHARGING CORD

author: Nicolas M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
review_content: Works great when it works. Paid alot of money for a seemingly top of the line charger for my wife. Would expect it to last for at least a few years..I have reached out to anker directly and pending the response from them I may update this review. It says on the page that they offer a 16 month replacement warrenty. We will see if it's honored--------UPDATE--------Customer service has replaced my battery pack after 11 months if use. They honored their 16 month warrenty.
title: Stopped working withen a 10 month period

author: jennifer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2019
review_content: YES! we love her so much! a life saver. she keeps my phone charged for a week straight. only downside is that she takes forever to recharge herself, but once she's done, she is good. to. go.
title: yes, yes, yes!

author: Innovate4u
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2018
review_content: While I have always read both 5 star and 1 star reviews for everything I have purchased on Amazon, I am ashamed to say I have not contributed to this  service until now. This change of heart is because I am so overwhelmed about this product's performance that I had to get off the sideline.That said, this is one bad charger. It is worth all the 5 star hype. I was a bit reluctant about purchasing it  based on the price because I got burned on a lower priced models manufactured elsewhere. But in this case specifically, you are getting what you pay for. I am very pleased about it's ability to charge my Moto G and in doing so it barely budges from full power. It is truly one of the best value product's I have purchased. If you need a charger, look no further. After putting a full charge on the product, I charged my Moto G5 plus from 35 to 100 pct. in less than  2 hrs (while watching video) and my charger still reads a fully charged afterwards. I couldn't ask for more.
title: I am shocked into giving my first product review!

author: The Zeppelin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2016
review_content: Charge a Table and my Phone.  Got this then had a short trip to hospital and had to stay two nights.  This was a saviour recharged my table and phone (wall outlet was too far away from bed)  Keep both at peak power all day long.  Smart technology charges faster than what standard chargers do.  Also works with LONGER cables.  I have a 10 ft cable, that my kids use to charge and play tablet at same time.  Most charges the resistance of this long run will not charge the device.  The ANKER products seem to sense this and boost the power and will charge through long cables.
title: Great for on the Go, charges two devices quickly.  Works on 10 ft cable runs

author: Nubia Morales
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
review_content: I have used this charger a few times now and it charges my phone pretty quickly. I haven’t tried to charge 2 things at the same time yet though. The only downfall is that this battery is a little heavy but works well.
title: Recommended

author: Jack
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
review_content: My USB C Hub is a great product especially in light of having to work from home during these Corona Virus times. The product has enabled me to easily attach additional screens and peripherals to my main computer s that I may complete my work in an efficient manner. I hardheartedly recommend this product to anyone who is looking to make the job of working from home more productive.
title: Great Product

author: Dean Brooks
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2019
review_content: What a lifesaver this thing is.I use it when I am out riding my motorcycle and using my phone GPS. To have the GPS running constantly really runs down my battery fast so I just keep this thing plugged in and I can ride for days. I go out three or four days in a row and I never have run out of juice.The power you need when you go off the grid!
title: The Power You Need

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2019
review_content: Absolutely love this product. Can charge my iPad I use for school twice with some left over on a single charge. Charges my phone and accessories many times over on a single charge.  However, the first one I got stopped charging for some reason. They replaced it but the turn around time is long since they make you return it before they ship a new one.
title: Recommend

author: Sunny Escapes
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2018
review_content: I recently used this battery on an overseas flight to charge mobile devices. I got several full charges and the battery stayed fully charged. Glad I made the purchase. It's heavier than I realized, but OK for a travel bag or backpack. I wouldn't want to carry it around in my hand or pocket all day.  It performed as I hoped.
title: Good Product

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
review_content: Worst Anker product I ever use.I bought this month ago, took more than 12hr to charge(with fast charging dock) also Drain so fast. I complained amazon about it. they send me another one. Guess what? new one same as junk like old one. I spent 50 something dollars for this. Anker famous now but they don’t have the beat quality anymore. Usually I don’t write reviews. My expectation was too high for Anker. I can’t trust this band anymore.
title: They lies about their Product

author: lookitskhaki
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2018
review_content: I bought this maybe two weeks ago. Though I like it as it does its job, I think I got a faulty unit. It’s been plugged in and charging since yesterday at 6 pm. It’s 6:58 am and it still has only charged halfway. It charged all the way when I got it two weeks ago. I sure hope this dud of a piece doesn’t quit working in two more weeks all together. I’m super disappointed.Update - Anker is incredible and sent me a new product at no charge. I guess I had a lemon because the new one works like a charm. Thank you so much Anker for taking such great care of your customers!
title: Device wont charge

author: Sarah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2016
review_content: Super glad I got one of these. Only complaint is that it doesn't come with the right kind of charger. It takes a LONG time to charge. But once it's charged, it will last you a good chunk of time. Got this for playing Ingress, and later for playing PokemonGo - it's been super useful. Now I just make sure to bring it with me everywhere since my Android S6 seems to lose power rather quickly throughout the day. Also great on trips where you aren't sure if you'll be able to find an outlet conveniently.
title: Heavy duty charge

author: jonathan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2017
review_content: I got this item because it supposedly charge your phone quick, its bs. It takes a LONG TIME to charge your phone. It does charge your phone but youll have to leave it overnight charging. When i charge my phone at home, it usually takes no more than 45 mins to charge. With this thing in 45mins it probably goes up 8%, i wouldn't recommend it.
title: Cheap quality

author: J-Breeze
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
review_content: First one died after a few months of use, Contacted Anker and they got back to me immediately! Amazing customer service! Had me try a few things and when it still didn’t work they sent me a new one free of charge! I’ve been using for several months now and it works great! First one was certainly a fluke!
title: Perfect Customer Service!!!

author: A. Rogers
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2018
review_content: The flashing blue lights were a bit confusing the first time that I turned it on but a call to Anker's customer support quickly solved my confusion. I've used it occasionally in a year, and it's been a fantastic lifesaver. The only minor downside is the weight but I can live with this and will continue to find it useful in a real emergency.
title: This gadget works as advertised.

author: Julie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019
review_content: I purchased the Anker 20100 rechargeable battery pack in July of 2016 and used it extensively for 3 years.  It quit working 3 years (almost to the day) from the time of purchase.  I've been very satisfied with its performance and I ordered a new one this week, which I suppose is the ultimate sign of customer satisfaction.  I'm a little disappointed with its 3-year life.  I would have expected 4 to 5 years from a rechargeable battery.
title: Good product, but a little short of outstanding!

author: Huan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2018
review_content: I bought this product in July of 2018. It’s now November 2018. Only four months later and one of the charger port no longer charges. I took the cable from the other port (which charges perfectly fine) and switched it with the second port and it does not charge.
title: Charger port stops working after 4 months

author: Thao
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
review_content: So when I got the Anker powerbank, I started charging it and it heated up so I called Anker and they asked who was selling it, and I said whoever the name was that I forgotten. And she said that we can’t replace you the Anker power bank if it wasn’t from the company. Life lesson: BUY IT FROM THE COMPANYY!!! Or you have to charge SAME AMOUNT to get a replace.
title: Buy this from the company

author: Jesse
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2018
review_content: Update! I was able to contact Anker, and I addressed my problems with the charger and they replaced! Very happy with customer service and quality of the 2nd product.First one: Damn thing crapped out on me 2-3 months of having it. Only got 2 uses out of it and won’t charge anything anymore. The device itself charges but Since I cant return it, it gets one star.I’ve tired OEM cables and aftermarket ones.
title: Won’t charge any device after 2-3 months

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
review_content: I like the power it holds and how fast it can charge great for Pokémon go. When charging you need to find a proper source to get power from and do it over night while your sleeping cause it could take a min. I almost just use this now instead of conventional charging. It’s super fast just got to remember to press the button when plugging it in to your phone to initiate the charge.
title: Excellent charger

author: Hiddenreviwer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2017
review_content: After a year of use it is still my go to charger. It was a great value and works exceptionally well. I expected the "IQ" charging to be a gimic, but it's not. I notice my phone charging almost as fast as the turbo charger provided with my phone. My only complaint is it does take 8+ hours to reach a full charge. For the same quality and half the price of the other name brands it is a great buy. If your concerned about the charging time they do sell another model that charges much quicker. That may be my next buy.
title: Buy it!

author: Jerdan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2018
review_content: Extremely disappointed. I bought my anker 2 weeks ago for my daughters birthday since her iPad has been dying a lot during our trips and now it just won’t charge anymore. The power bank doesn’t charge her phone at all. Both ports don’t work even when the powerbank is fully charged. Before I bought ge product I was doing some review reading, I was excited about this charger because of all the great things I’ve hearing and reading about it but it didn’t even last a month and it’s already unusable.Edit: anker contacted me and gave me a replacement power bank for free. Thankyou very much! It made my daughter very happy. Best customer service! 10/10
title: Extremely disappointed. I bought my anker 2 weeks ago for ...

author: Zach
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2017
review_content: I ordered this product while it was on a big sale and got it for an amazing price. I don't need 20,000 mAh but the price point between this nd the 16750 was tiny. I like that is has 2 ports, and the led indicator. However, I don't think it charges as fast as a wall charger, and the outer shell feels a little cheap. But those things are pretty neglefable so I'll only remove 1 star. I would recommend this product for sure, but not at the original price point.
title: Baker 20000mAh portable charger. Famtastic (on sale)

author: Ozoriah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2017
review_content: So to start off, this charger is wonderful. It takes a while to charge itself, but with a good wall plug and/or leaving it to charge overnight you can have it fully charged up whenever you need it. The size of the power bank can charge whatever phone you have multiple times over, its charging ports are faster than most generic charges (such as the general iPhone charger), it's sturdy, very portable, and I could go on. It just works amazingly well.I had a problem with it (after owning it for quite some time) after switching phones where for some reason it was really slow charging and often didn't recognize I had my phone plugged into it. I contacted Anker and after telling them what was going on and answering a couple questions they immediately sent me a replacement and asked I send them my old one whenever convenient so that could take a look at it, just like that. I really hope they keep up their amazing customer service as they become a more popular company because it really makes them stand out. Stellar company from everything I've seen.tl;dr: 6/5 product and company
title: Great Charger and a Great Company

author: teresa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2019
review_content: If you're traveling or always on your phone, you need to get this external charger. Yes, it's a bit heavy and bulky but it's a lifesaver. I can charge my iphone 10 full times!  And I'm not exaggerating. I was abroad and was constantly on the go without power so I was able to charge my iphone and go-pro on the external charger without a any problems. The external charger does take 24 hours to fully charge but it's not that big of a deal when you have an outlet to plug into.
title: This is a lifesaver!

author: Tracy F Peterson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2016
review_content: I use this thing all the time.  Will charge my phone like 10 times before it's empty.  The only thing that tripped me up is it cannot charge a device while it is on the charger.  I thought it was DOA at first, until I realized what was going on.It does take a while to fully charge since the capacity is so high, but it'll last you a whole weekend.  I use it when we're camping or I'm travelling all the time.  It's pretty heavy for the size, so be aware.  It'll fit in a pocket, but you'll feel it there.
title: Great product, super high capacity

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2016
review_content: for a charger at this price here are the cons and pros that after using the product I have concluded.  This portable charger gives my iPhone 6s a good full 4-5x the charge.  the design i do not like so much, it is more on the heavy and bulky side.  I purchased two of these portable chargers for my work one white and the other black, after a few uses the white one no longer works.  I am very disappointed because this product costed me about $40 and i was only to use it for less than a month, maybe i was unlucky that i happen to received a malfunction product.9/9/16I believe I owe Anker some appreciation.  Although I happen to receive a malfunction charger, Anker customer service quickly reached out to me after i had written my review and replaced me with a brand new charger.  They had also assured me that their portable chargers come with a 18months warranty.  Cathy was the customer service rep that reached out to me, I am very happy now and would like to applaud this company for doing everything they can because they believe in their products and they will do anything to make sure customers get the most out of their products.  Thumbs up for changing my experience from negative to positive.  My black Anker charger still works fine and I would buy their products again.
title: This portable charger gives my iPhone 6s a good full 4-5x the charge

author: Annie Butler
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2019
review_content: So as a person working in the outdoor industry it is helpful to have a charger. Last summer I got one of these and it was great! Until I lost it in a airport... I jumped online and ordered a new one because of how much I use it for work. I used it as soon as possible on trip and the battery was defective! I was able to get through the trip by turning it on every 3 minutes but when I got home I reached out to the Anker team and they helped so much and sent me a replacement quickly! This one works like a charm and the staff are awesome for helping me out and being so kind.
title: Anker support team

author: Crystal Flint
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2019
review_content: ****Update: Ankers customer service is very prompt and sent me another battery right away. So far, it's working well. Great customer service. My husband has had one for a while and loves it- hopefully it was just bad luck.*****When I originally ordered this charger it wouldn’t charge above 3 bars. I was sent a replacement charger and it worked well and charged to 4 bars. Now after returning from my trip the battery only chargers to 2 bars and it’s no longer within the window to return. I’m very disappointed because my husband has one that has work perfectly for some time and I received 2 defective ones and now stuck with one that doesn’t work in less than 3 months!!
title: doest hold charge

author: Christy-Ann
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2018
review_content: This is our second Anker portable charger, so I'm not surprised this is awesome. Anker is a great company and this charger did exactly as promised. Used it multiple times during the week (without having to recharge it) to keep our phones charged while on the go. Easy to use and not too heavy. Comes with a protective pouch so it doesn't scratch other things in your bag.
title: Great charger!

author: Anonymous
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2019
review_content: Traveling overseas, I’m using my phone as a camera, a subway and walking map, a translation tool, a notepad... which can deplete my iPhone battery by lunchtime. I bring the portable charger and cable with me and I can power my phone multiple times on the go - and it still has charging power at the end of the day. Worth every penny.
title: Key item for traveling!

author: Robbin J. Bryant
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2018
review_content: I already have this charger and my husband loves using it so much that I got tired of him stealing it and bought him one! It charges my iPhone 6 phone very quick and the charge on the anker battery lasts a very long time so I get many uses out of it! It does take awhile to re charge it but I usually just charge it through the night and it's ready to go that next morning.  It isn't the smallest charger so you can't just stick it in your pocket comfortably (it does fit in your pocket but it sticks out about 4 inches) but it fits nice in my purse and is a lighter charger than ones I've had in the past.
title: This is the only portable charger I buy bc it works so great and charges fast!

author: Suvi Viswanathan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2019
review_content: After using this product, I may never switch from Anker again.  Other than the size of the product being slightly too big for my liking, the product works really well and is pretty easy to travel with.  It also actually charges at the faster rate required by many phones so recharging is fairly quick!
title: Amazing battery life for iPhone X, XR and XS

author: Beans
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2017
review_content: This battery is a life saver. It holds 4 charges and can fully charge a Samsung phone when it's dead 4 times. I don't own an apple nor charged one on this but I was told it can charge a dead iPhone 5 or 6 times cuz they have a smaller battery capacity than Samsungs. If you're someone who's always out and about or forgets to charge your phone at home, this is the battery to get. It charges pretty quick too in less than an hour. Only negative is it takes over 10 hours to fully charge. If it's fully depleted it'll take almost a full day to 100% charge. There are 4 blue lights indicating how much charge it has. It can charge two phones simultaneously at the same quick speed. It's a bit big and weighs appx. 2lb but it'll fit in your pocket. Definitely must have for any traveler.
title: It charges pretty quick too in less than an hour

author: Thomas Roach
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2016
review_content: Had been using a pack with half the power of this one, but this is the travelers best friend.  I just spent five days camping and kept everything charged up, Note 4 phone, JBL bluetooth speaker, and a tablet got some use.  Anyway the biggest thing I love is that this one Fast Charges.  Silly but have gotten spoiled with things charged in an hour and this pack is just like plugging into the wall with original charger fast.  Got home and still had charge left and charged my note again and a work phone as well before having to plug the darn thing into charge up.  Only had it a month now and have charged twice.  Charging takes well I don't know but over night plus.  But it is alot of Juice, so takes time.  Great product and came right on time.UPDate!  Had Summer off and Man I camped all over the northwest!  I can not even think about needing more power, Its still working just as it did the first day.  Can charge my two phones, tablet, E reader, and don't forget most used out in the woods the Blue tooth speaker.  Charge this thing with a Solar Panel I got on Amazon, and I can stay out weeks in the woods and never have to think about power.  Must have, I put the solar panel on the hood of Jeep, use a 10 foot cord to attach to this pack and keep it out of the sun, normally in the wheel well and I have power for the devices all night.  Many charges now, works great, best battery pack I have owned.
title: but this is the travelers best friend. I just spent five days camping and ...

author: Zophisticated Dove
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2018
review_content: I use this to keep my Samsung Galaxy powered up and it was the best purchase as it has kept me out of a jam many times while travelling.  To be honest, this is actually faster than charging my phone through a wall outlet. Works great and I only seldom have to recharge it, but when i do, I usually recharge overnight.  So glad I bought this.
title: Charges Fast!

author: D.J.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2018
review_content: We still haven't completely depleted the power from this. After using it a few times, my husband charges it just to top it off for whatever we might need. We have charged smart phones & a Kindle - try about anything you can think of that takes a micro USB. Very happy with it - we'll be buying another one for a Christmas gift this year.
title: Solid power source

author: Sean Manear
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2018
review_content: This battery lasts forever! I assume, at some point, if you keep charging stuff, this will hit 2 dots, but I've never seen it. I have forgotten my phone charger on vacation and used this several days and not even gotten to half way. The bag it comes in is nice. I usually roll up a Motorola cord on one side and a lightning cable on the other.
title: This battery lasts forever!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2019
review_content: Quality product. Super durable, I can throw this thing around at a construction site for a few days charging my phone and Bluetooth stereo multiple times without recharging this. Super awesome product.
title: Quality product!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2015
review_content: I've only had this item for a very short while and haven't put it through it's paces yet.  I have used it to charge my full-size iPad and it was strong enough to keep it from stopping (some weak plug in charges are not strong enough so my iPad will quit charging).  On the negative side, it did seem to take a while to charge it while it was on (but not being used).  Providing that it's stated capacity is accurate, I was able to get the item for a very good price and this would be perfect for long haul trips where you just don't have access to a plug in power source.
title: Portable power for the long-haul!

author: Jazmine M
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2019
review_content: When I tell you it is actually worth the $50 bucks...I swear it is. I had a friend recommend me this because we went to Mexico and my phone kept dying. So when I bought one for Disney world I fell in loves. DOES NOT die quickly like all of my other cheap chargers. AND it charges your phone to the complete 100% and the battery doesn't die itself. I use this where everI go especially when I don't feel like plugging it into a wall. It take a while to charge but I don't care it will last a long time so I try to charge my once a week because I don't use as much. but if you use it daily then charge 2 or 3 times a week.
title: AWESOME!!!!!

author: LSM
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2019
review_content: I carry it when I go on road trips or hikes.  It has been good for me.  For those of you that had one fail early after purchase, please use the 18 month warranty before writing a poor review.  Used properly,  this is a good tool.  The nature of manufacturing unfortunately means that up to 10% is prone to defect and may not be caught 10% of the time.  That is why customer service and warranties exist.Charge responsibly and Enjoy.When you charge irresponsibly use the power bank.
title: Charge responsibly

author: Paul M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
review_content: Very disappointed. Splurged and bought this based on the overall reviews. Got the unit and no matter what device I plug into it, it only charges for a minute or two then shuts off. Have to keep hitting the button to turn it back on or it stops charging. Constant process.
title: Disappointing

author: Ken Frazier
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2019
review_content: The first two are from JUL 2016 and no issues.  I use them for powering go-pros for time elapse photography so these have lived in a zip-lock bag on zero degree nights and have traveled all over the Caribbean in 100+ degree days with very high humidity.  They have run fans, camping LED lights, charged photos, cameras you name it.The two I just added will be going to South America soon.  so I wanted two new ones on that trip.I have never had issues with the airlines in traveling with these (2 in a carry on bag)Ken
title: Just added #3 & #4

author: James Earl Shagford
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2017
review_content: I'm very happy with the Anker PowerCore 20100, We bought it in anticipation of an overseas trip where we were concerned about there being a reliable access to plugs for charging phones & iPads which were needed for the trip (starting with the flight itself!), but I often find myself just using it in the house when I need to recharge but want to keep my phone near; it charges just as efficiently as a wall outlet, and the LED's let me know when it needs a recharge itself, which isn't that often.
title: I'm very happy with the Anker PowerCore 20100

author: J. Chavez
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
review_content: My product will not charge anymore. Worked great at first though....
title: Doesn't work after two years

author: CC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2018
review_content: I purchased this portable charge for my trip to Disney.  Once charged it lasts a very long time.  I was able to keep my iphone 7 charged the entire time while I was in the Disney parks.  I never had to worry about low battery power.  When I took the portable charger out of the box it was a little heavier that I had expected.  It probably weights around 1 pound solid.  But the portable  charger did its job and I still use it when ever I go out for long periods of time.
title: The best portable charger

author: Lanie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2020
review_content: This product charges especially fast ( when I took it out of the box it fully charged in less than 1 1/2 hours), it is compact and its charge lasts for a very long time ( multiple days).  I feel so much better about going out for hours at a time with no car charger and no time to sit and wait for my phone to charge!  A great comfort to be able to carry this slim charger in my purse!
title: Quick and long lasting charge!  Perfect!

author: Jim Smith
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2018
review_content: As usual Anker delivers the best of the best. The only downsides that I can think of are #1 when using this product with my Anker Power line cable it charges my device slowly when using the device. I would be using this power bank and my tablet at the same time and the percentages go up about 1% every 20 minutes or so. If I am not using my tablet then it will charge just as fast if not faster than a wall outlet. The only other downside I have is when plugging the cable into the power bank it feels a little cheap and loose I guess you could say. Other than that top notch Anker product as usual.
title: Anker as usual

author: C for ..
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2016
review_content: I use this to charge my Surface 3 and android phone. I love this as a back up since I travel on a weekly basis and sometimes I have no time or place to charge my gadgets. This where this comes in and has the ability to charge and keep my gadgets charged.A word of advice to fully charge this I would do this overnight as it takes several hours to fully charge 7-10 hours depending on where the battery level is.If you are a traveler or someone who is always on the run and doesn't really have a spot to charge your phone, tablet, etc.. get this.
title: I love this as a back up since I travel on ...

author: LorChaBud
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2018
review_content: Life gets busy these days and this is a great way to make sure my phone is always charged, especially when the day goes longer than I expected. It stays charged longer than anything else I've used. It's a bit heavy so I don't carry it in my purse if I don't have to, especially in the summer months. Then I leave it in the car. Worth every penny!
title: Stays charged for a LONG time! A must have.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2019
review_content: Loved this and VERY impressed with its performance! I took this on a canoeing trip where there was no electrical access for 4 days.  It charged my phone and 3 other phones for that time period. Afterwards everyone wanted to know where I got it and all the details!  It’s amazing.  It’s a little heavy to carry around in my purse on a daily basis so I bought a smaller one.  I bought some for my teens too! Love this brand! It’s amazing!
title: AWESOME- doesn’t disappoint

author: Sally
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
review_content: My charger had an 18 month warranty.Both ports stopped working literally 4 days after the warranty expired. I hate to be paranoid but it almost seems like there is a built in timer to stop it from working after you don't have a warranty. They are too expensive to have this happen.
title: It was great while it lasted.

author: Renee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2017
review_content: I ordered this several days before a hurricane was predicted to hit our area.  Unfortunately (but understandably), it arrived the day after our power came back on.  During the power outage, our entire family charged our devices with my daughter's Anker PowerCore and it was a lifesaver for having access to news and weather reports. This is a MUST HAVE for those in areas prone to lose power, as well as those travelling, using multiple devices as part of their work, etc.
title: Highly recommended!

author: FB
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2020
review_content: Got a solid 3 1/2 years out of this power charger.  Probably could have gotten longer if we didn't have to disconnect/reconnect USB cables more than a couple times a day, but this thing has worked great for ages.  Unfortunately something must have finally come loose in the USB ports, because now it charges my wife's S8 no problem, but doesn't push out enough power to charge my S10.Will definitely be buying more from Anker.
title: Great dependable power bank

author: nick
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2017
review_content: This thing is amazing. If you are someone who travels and hates trying to find a place to plug in your electronics, this is the battery pack for you. It is a little heavy, but you can maintain a charge on a phone for a week or more. I recently took this on a trip and was able to keep 3 cell phones and a Gopro charged for 4 days. I have bought several products from Anker and all of them have been cheaper than competitors with great quality.Pros: The capacity for the size is almost unbeatable. Also, it is one of the lowest priced power packs for it's size. Very good deal.Cons: It weighs average for power pack of its size.
title: Best Power Pack Out There

author: sparks
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2018
review_content: This was a really great product and overall buying experience right out of the box. The portable charger is slim, simple, and has a very clean design. I'm very happy with my purchase. I only have one recommendation for the manufacturer on this device: Please consider integrating a grip-friendly material or surface texture in future models. It's slippery! Otherwise, I love it.
title: Excellent buy

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2019
review_content: My sister has tried several different types and liked this one the best.  So I ordered one and I like it as well.  I bought one for my daughter for Christmas at her request after using mine.  Would definitely recommend.  Good price also.
title: Good performance

author: Rog
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2017
review_content: Purchased the unit a few months back and was very pleased with it. Worked exactly as advertised.Last week the charger unexpectedly stopped fully charging and would not hold the charge. I swapped cables and chargers but it still would not hold a charge. I contacted the support team and received a reply in a few hours. I provided the serial number and order number and within an hour I was informed a replacement was in the way.I'm so impressed with this level of service and support. Look, stuff happens and the charger died, it was a great unit while it worked but the support is what was worth the price of the unit.They have a customer for life at this point.
title: Outstanding Service & Support

author: J. John
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2017
review_content: I have owned this battery bank for over a year and couldn't be happier.  First and foremost, it just works.  I have owned a few other battery banks in the past and sometimes they get kind of flaky.  This one hasn't had a single issue.  Also, it holds a ton of power for it's size.  I use it when I travel and it recharges my cell phone many times over.  It also has great build quality.  Still looks brand new after 14 months of use.  I would by this again without a hesitation if i needed another one.
title: ... battery bank for over a year and couldn't be happier. First and foremost

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2019
review_content: Literally flew out to NYC for my buddy’s wedding and bought this a few days before so my phone wouldn’t die. I made sure to fully charge this before my trip. The moment I got in the plane and started using it, the battery (including lights) would shut off every 30 seconds by itself. I’m sure mine is just defective but that is 2 Anker products that I’ve ordered in one week.
title: Defective right out of the box

author: Living in PJs during Pandemic
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2017
review_content: After one day you have to recharge it.  I use it to recharge both my Iphone 6 and My Apple watch 2.  Both are recharged in record time.  But after 48 hours of use, you will have to recharge the power bank.  Still a nice power Bank and a nice size.  I have bought cheaper power banks ($15) on ebay.  However, it would only charge one item at a time and this took a very long time.  This power bank is powerful and charges probably faster than a direct connection to an electrical outlet.
title: Great Power Bank but...

author: wildintu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2017
review_content: This has come in handy so many times since I've received it. It's one of those items that you can't believe you went without until you get it. After fully charged, it has charged my iPhone 7 plus 4 different times as well as charged a friends Samsung Galaxy. And it still has some juice left over. It's compact and packs easily. It is a tad bit heavy. Comes with a sleeve to store in along with the USB cord to charge it. I highly recommend this for anyone who finds themselves on the go.
title: Best purchase ever!

author: Brett
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2017
review_content: Great powerpack.  I was in the market for one of these for a while and grabbed this at a deal over black friday.  It works very well.  It works with quick charge if you use the right cable.  I purchased a Pixel and this charges the phone with the USB 3 to USB C cable that came with the phone.  I have a third party cable that starts to charge my phone when I connect it to to this power pack and then it just stops.  I definitely believe fault rests with the cable instead of Anker and despite this minor hicup, am very impressed with this product.
title: Great powerpack. I was in the market for one ...

author: amunevar
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2018
review_content: I’ve never bought an Ankee product before and I was skeptical because I had never heard the name. But this charger is amazing. It’s heavy to the touch and I’ve already dropped it a couple times and it works great. It charges quickly and has two places where you could charge phones. It even comes with a handy mesh case.
title: Awesome

author: Christopher S. Cornette
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2015
review_content: This is my third 20k mAh portable charger, and by far it is the best.  It is about 10-20% smaller than the other two, and lighter as well (a big factor, since I carry this around with me in my backpack or briefcase).The IQ charging technology is also pretty impressive.  I've noticed a clear difference right away.  Most of these things have one 2.4 plug and one 1.0 plug.  The IQ tech allows each plug to independently sense the maximum charging speed and apply it.  Bottom line - it's easier to use AND works better.  Anker really hit a home run with this idea.
title: Best of the bunch I've owned, hands down.

author: Margarita
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2018
review_content: I live in New York and get very anxious when I commute or travel because my phone tends to die quickly and I fear being lost alone someplace with no way of contacting friends for help.This charger has charged my phone to 100% several times and I can now play games that I could not before due to battery drainage.
title: Finally a good portable charger

author: Roy Richardson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2017
review_content: I really love the Anker PowerCore 20100. I used it while traveling internationally as I knew I wouldn't always be around power sources and I wasn't sure what my power connectors would look like. I was able to charge my Samsung Galaxy S7 multiple times on a single charge as well as a friend of mine's iPhone and my Fitbit Charge 2. I believe this would easily recharge my phone completely four times. It was very convenient to have with me on my trip.
title: Great Device, charges well

author: bianca nery
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2016
review_content: Hello, the shipment was great and I couldn't be any happier receiving my items. However, I did encounter a problem and it has truly upset me. It's regarding my zanker power bank, at first it was working perfectly fine, then less than a month later, please note that I would never over charge the product. Now, it only charges up to the first blue light and that's how much power it would have for the rest of the day. Sadly, the item is basically useless since it can barely hold power for me. I'm not asking for a return/refund but I was wondering if I get an exchange. The product is defective and I just received this last month.-— 11/12/16Would just like to update everyone as I have received an optimal service from the support team regarding my defective power bank. I hesitated a bit upon returning my item as I was passed my return limit, but as a true customer care representative, they have acknowledged my inquiry in exchanging the product and I couldn't be happier as I'm in such need of the product. They are very considerate and I high recommend them. I will surely purchase again if ever that time comes 😀😀😀 A+++
title: One happy customer 👌🏼🤗👍🏻

author: Daniel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
review_content: Overall good Quality, only issue I have is that it takes several hours to recharge the battery itself, this hasn’t been a big issue because I just leave it overnight to charge, comes with a mesh pouch to help guard against scratches, dust, etc! I would say I get 2-3 full charges (iPhone) before the battery needs recharging.
title: Good Quality

author: Rajesh Devaraj
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2017
review_content: Great Product !! I bought this product last week and have been continuously using it since then. I was able to recharge my iPhone 6s five times and iPad mini 4 one time and my old HTC android phone once. What more can I expect from this monster battery. The only negative is that this battery took 10hours to get fully charged with a 2A charger. But that is just normal when taking into consideration the capacity of the battery. I love the sleek design of the battery and anker provides a storage pouch too in the package. I have been monitoring the output voltage/current of the portable battery with a digital multimeter and its just perfect. 1A rated devices just pull the exact 5V/1A from the battery and 2A rated devices pull exactly 5V/2A. So its pretty sure your devices are safe charging with this battery. Altogether I am highly satisfied with this portable battery in my last one week of use. Will keep updating my review based on my future usage.
title: Just the perfect power bank for a 2-3 days trip !!

author: Holden McGroin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
review_content: This was a good purchase.  So far a single powerpack charge can charge 4 phones at a time or a single phone 4 times. Remember to press the button before charging.  Sometimes this charges faster than the wall chargers.
title: Charges 4 phones

author: MChev
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
review_content: I’ve had this for about a month and when charging, it’s heating up to the point where I am worried to charge it anymore. The charge cord is severely hot to the touch. It is now taking forever to charge it fully. I would recommend you look elsewhere.
title: Not recommended

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019
review_content: I have purchased several different Anker products and have never had a problem with any of them and have always been more than happy. This is the 4th time I've purchased this product. I have 1 myself and the rest have been gifts. Everyone LOVES them, except the last one that I purchased mid December 2018 for a Christmas present has stopped taking a charge. It worked great up until a couple days ago. I've tried different cords and chargers to no avail. It seems as if I've missed the return date by less than 30 days, but I have faith that Anker will satisfy a loyal Anker customer. I believe it's unfair to give a bad review for 1 issue that I have faith will be remedied. I look forward to updating this review with good news.
title: Waiting to see if Anker satisfies a loyal customer.

author: Buffalo jay
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2017
review_content: This thing is amazing!!! I bought this to take with me to a music festival to carry with me in my backpack to make sure I had enough juice to get me through the day. It performed flawlessly. I love the double charging ports.Which makes it convienent to charge two devices at once. I was able to get 7 charges for my iPhone 7 and it charges extremely quick! I would say it takes about  minutes to get my phone to 80% or more.  I was able to charge my Nintendo Switch to 100% within like 2 hrs or so. The PowerCore still had enough juice in it to charge my iPhone 3-4 more times. If you have an iPad charger you can use this to charge the PowerCore which I due every now and then. This battery tends to last me. Now when I travel I have no fear of finding a power outlet or making sure I'm next to a charging station. The Anker PowerCore is worth it!
title: Quality Product! Fast Charging!! Charges Nintendo Switch!!

author: Kelley Brewer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2017
review_content: Awesome battery pack.  I've had mine for a while now and it's finally starting to slow down and I can tell I will need a new one soon but I HEAVILY rely and use this pack constantly!!!! so I am more then thrilled with it.  My boyfriend has the same one and has had it much longer but uses it less and more like you are suppose too so his is just as good as when he got it.  I will deffinently get this pack again when I do get a new one
title: Awesome battery pack

author: Linda
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2018
review_content: I thought Anker was a good brand but this one died way too fast.  For 60 bucks it should have lasted a lot longer.  I used it daily since August 1 and yesterday there was nothing left.  Won't be buying one of these again.Update:  This charger is working again, I started using a different cord to connect to my phone and that made the difference.  I don't really understand why - if anyone has info about which cords are best to use on certain products, I'd certainly appreciate knowing.  Thanks.
title: Died in under 4 months

author: Amy Clark
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2018
review_content: Purchased this charger and it worked great for about a year. It quit charging. Contacted Amazon who contacted Anker and they had me a replacement charger in less than 4 days. Absolutely wonderful customer service!!!! Love the charger and would definitely buy one of their products again or recommend them to anyone wanting a  good quality charger....
title: ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE

author: Jill
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
review_content: Battery no longer charges after 14 months.  For that price, I expected more!
title: short life

author: GREEK
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2016
review_content: This is the 2nd time I purchased something like this and it is twice the power size of the first one I bought and I got it for a really good price too. If used right it can last more than you think. I use it for my cell and tablet at night time as I use them both at the same time while i work and by morning when I wake the charge on it has not gone down much. Sooo worth owning one of these if not 2 for sure...when the power goes out this is one of the items you should have on hand.
title: This is the 2nd time I purchased something like this and it is twice the power size of ...

author: tangosf
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2017
review_content: Bought this recently in order to keep electronics powered up enough to get through the dreaded final hours of a long flight. After charging it up overnight, we were able to keep 3 Kindle Fires, 1 iPhone 7, and 2 newer Samsung Galaxies going through an entire day of travel. It is heavier than many other chargers I've used but honestly the weight is no more than a full water bottle. This charger has earned a permanent home in my carry-on luggage.
title: Just what I need to get through a long day of travel

author: Cruz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2018
review_content: This is a strong and good charger for stuff like vacations or long car rides. It charges all my devices faster than an outlet would. The only down part is that it takes a while to charge up the battery itself and it’s a little big. Besides that I recommend it to people who go on trips often. If you need a charger just for everyday life I’d get a smaller version of this one.
title: Great Charger for Vacations or Trips

author: Ashley D
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020
review_content: I LOVE THIS CHARGER. I get so many charges out of this (I have a Galaxy S6--old I know). I like that i don't have to leave my phone on the counter to charge I can bring it with me all around the house.
title: So convenient

author: Matthew Kusche
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2019
review_content: I've had this battery for two years and I just got to say what a fantastic battery life! Can still hold a charge for several days with constant usage before needing to recharge! Just as described! Have not noticed a drop in charge capacity over the time of using this product. Great for traveling and business trips as well!
title: Fantastic Battery

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2018
review_content: I really like this portal charger because I can use it for an entire week without having to recharge it. I typically use it to charge my iphone 6. I have been using this portal charger for months until one day it stopped retaining the charge. I was really glad there was a warranty on this product. I contacted Anker customer service and they express-shipped me a new one right away. I received 2-3 days after I was able to communicate to them what the issue was (via email). They really stand by their product and I can honestly say their product and customer service really impressed me. They were very professional and even followed up with an email to make sure everything was fine. This is my first time writing a review for any type of product which shows how satisfied I am with Anker portal charger.
title: I am really satisfied with the customer service at Anker

author: V. Chan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020
review_content: Lifetime of the battery is a little under three years; bought March 2017, died Dec 2019 (no longer charges despite hard reset and leaving it plugged into the outlet). Useful and handy for traveling while it lasted! Bummed that the warranty only lasts 18 months.
title: Lifetime of rechargeable battery ~ 3 years

author: Aaron Krider
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2019
review_content: Bought for a friend, kept for myself. Couldn’t be happier. Pack takes a good chunk of time to charge itself, but provides multiple full charges and can continue to charge even while phone is WiFi/streaming/gaming. Definitely one of the best inexpensive tech upgrades if you need some extra juice.
title: Very convenient and reliable. Make sure to charge the pack the night before needing

author: MrRich15
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2019
review_content: I bought 2 thinking we would need them both for our Disney world trip. Turns out we only needed one to charge my family’s (9ppl) phones throughout the day. And still had enough juice to charge my iPad at night.
title: Best portable battery ever!!

author: Caroline
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
review_content: Product is bigger and heavier then expected. Not ideal for light weight travel but great if you require lots of reliable power. Comes with a nifty case and micro-usb to use cable
title: Wins in the power category...not size & weight

author: Just An Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2017
review_content: Update:Anker support responded very quickly to supply me with a unit that works as intended. Customer service was prompt and courteous. After the initial complaint, a representative reached out to me by email to address the problem(s) with the unit. They determined the best course of action was to expedite a new unit to replace the defective one. The new power bank arrived after in like 2 days and I was all set.
