I will continue to purchase Anker products.Original Review:This is a decent power bank.Pros:I've had mine since November/December 2015 and it still works just fine.It has a high capacity for a great price.Cons:Can't charge two devices even though there are two outputs (what's the purpose there?)I never get the "fast charging enabled" like I do at home (with another anker product), I just get a regular slow charge with this unfortunately.
title: Great charger, great price, large capacity, amazing customer service.

author: Jim ONeill
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
review_content: Nice size for the power capabilities.  The short USB/Mini USB cable that is included for re-charging the battery did not work.  Used one of mine and it worked fine.  Not a big deal but should not have been an issue that I discovered when it didn't work.  Wish it had a high speed USB port (my old one charged faster) but most of the time that is not an issue.  I think it was maybe 5 full recharges while camping so lived up to expectations there.
title: Pretty good but...

author: Avinash
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2019
review_content: A must buy if you are a frequent traveler. I am using an iPhone 7plus and this charger when fully charged gives me around 5-6 times of charge for my iPhone.Bang for the buck!PROS - Does the job. Worth the price. The pouch is good.Cons - HEAVY! HEAVY! HEAVY!
title: WORTH IT

author: Perses
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
review_content: It takes a really long time to charge. I bought this to go with a an anker solar panel but it takes a lifetime to charge from wall let alone a 24w solar charger. It powers devices up ok but drains quickly. Disappointed in this as an older anker still works.  Thought a newer model would be better. Oh well.
title: Long time to recharge.

author: Lydia Preston
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2019
review_content: After I unboxed it, it took about 10 hours for it to charge up fully from 25% (my first red flag).The next day, I decided to try to use it to charge my cell phone. My phone started out at about 15% battery and was actually charging quite quickly until, about 20 minutes in, the portable charger stopped working completely. I know it was a fault of the charger because the cell phone charged fine with the same cable when plugged into a wall unit.I’m not sure if the product itself is at fault or it I just had a defective unit, but either way I’m extremely disappointed and returning it. Take heed before purchasing “amazon’s choice”.
title: Piece of garbage

author: Julian Pahre
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2019
review_content: I bought my charger in 2018 to charge my phone and tablet for international travel- worked better than expected for the traveling and day-to-day use. Quick charge port charged quickly, and I was impressed by how much charge it held. Worked very well for 9-10 months of use before suddenly ceasing to work. This was within the warranty period. Fortunately after contacting anker they were very helpful in initial troubleshooting and then providing a replacement when the troubleshooting didn't work. I would have expected the charger to last longer, but honestly I was very impressed by their customer service and the ease of getting a replacement.
title: Worked Well & Good Customer Support

author: ACustomer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2016
review_content: I had this for about a week and it has worked well, I charged 4 iPhones and one iPad before I had to recharge it (from about 35%).It does take some time to recharge, I left mine charging overnight and it was ready next morning.It is a little bit too big and too heavy for an everyday carry, however it would be perfect for those long trips or camping.  For this reason I bought a smaller one (candy bar size) that fits on any pocket and have enough juice for saving the day.
title: however it would be perfect for those long trips or camping

author: tituswife
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
review_content: Anker is always my first pick for charging accessories for my Samsung phone and phablet. This charger is heavy, and takes awhile to charge, but that's because it holds a lot of juice.
title: I always buy Anker. ☺

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
review_content: This is the best portable charger I have ever had.  It charges my phone almost as fast as the equipment that came with my iphone.  I would recommend this.
title: This things charges super fast!

author: Charlie B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2015
review_content: This battery rocks!I run a Raspberry Pi B, model 2, a 7-1/2 inch touchscreen, 1tb drive, usb hub, and wifi from it, with a run life of about 16 hours (or slightly more)You have to have a good charger, good cable to let it charge.  It is fully charged when all four lights go out.  Anything less and you're not fully charged.Only complaint - not worth taking a star off... is you cannot charge and use it at the same time.
title: with a run life of about 16 hours (or slightly more) You have to have a good charger, good cable to let it charge

author: diner007
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
review_content: For first one week it was great. Afterwards it started draining too fast. For example, once I fully charge it, it allows me to charge my iPhone 11 only once or twice maximum, afterwards the battery becomes fully empty! If I fully charge it, and keep it for 4-5 days idle without using, then it allows me to charge my phone only once and the whole battery becomes empty. This is totally unexpected! Very bad product!
title: Dont buy, battery becomes empty  after one use only.

author: Nots
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2019
review_content: Bulky but that’s the point. Saved the day for the music festival I bought it for. Charged 4 phones and portable speakers with power to spare. Still working three years later. Can be brought as carry on for airplanes
title: Would buy again

author: Jo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
review_content: I litterally had to stop it from charging due to how hot it got! Stalling on the second light for hours, how long is it supposed to charge? It gets way too hot!
title: Extremely Hot When Charging

author: corey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2017
review_content: It Holds A great charge and charges SUPER fast.  Charging the portable battery itself is slow but that's to be expected (it holds like 10 charges.) When it arrived the indicator lights were not showing the current charge properly.  Anker not only contacted me hastily and replaced it, but they let me keep the old one too! Anker is a great company with fantastic products. EDIT: I bought this for a friend awhile back. He dropped it at work IN A TUB FULL OF WATER. We thought it was done for...  Nope. Still worked fine!!! If I could give this 6 starts I would.
title: Great Product. Outstanding Company.

author: Stephanie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2019
review_content: Iphones eat battery like crazy so this saved my butt while I was traveling! Also while on the plane our usb ports werent working so the person next to me needed battery so it charged two phones perfectly fine. Would definitely recommend!
title: Lifesaver

author: Charles Jordan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
review_content: This little guy packs a punch.  It charged my phone to 100% twice in one day while also charging my vape mod and STILL had half a battery to go when I went to bed.  Perfect for traveling if you have a lot of tech or powered gear to attend to, will last all day with several devices and then some.
title: BEAST

author: J. Sjaaheim
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2017
review_content: The product is… MUCH larger… twice the size of the picture which makes it look like you could carry it in your shirt pocket… you can’t.  That said, the product is very well made, easy to use, you know what the charge level is and carries a lot of power.  I charge my phone during the day and a large battery at night and the product charges without overheating and no screen flare up (getting bright) when you plug the phone in so it has some form of over voltage during connection that actually works.
title: ... the size of the picture which makes it look like you could carry it in your shirt pocket… you ...

author: Glenn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
review_content: I purchased this on my daughters recommendation. My area experiences periodic summer power outages. This will save me from charging my devises in my car.Would but again.
title: Good buy

author: Danny Ossewaarde
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
review_content: I bought this about a year ago and it worked really well. Whenever it died, I charged it overnight to fill it up and it would get me out of some battery binds. About 6 months in, it started taking a lot longer to charge the bank. As of now, 1.5 years later and ~20 times charging the bank, I've had it plugged in all weekend and the 75% light is still blinking. This is a good buy if you expect to buy a new one every year.
title: This works great for about a year

author: M. Russ
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2020
review_content: I was skeptical, had bad power banks before. This worked great. I have an older phone and Pokemon Go was draining my battery in an hour. The pack is a little heavy to carry around while walking, but I stick it in a fannypack and can keep the game running for hours.
title: Great help for an older battery.

author: DG
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
review_content: Fabulous 2 usb charger , comes in handy when not near an outlet as well as travel .  Lightweight, doesn’t get hot.  Only negative would be that it takes at least 12 hours to recharge this battery which I usually do at night so not a big deal
title: Finally something that works as advertised

author: Preston
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
review_content: Box strangely came with a "lithium battery - not for plane travel" or something to that effect. Don't let it fool you, it's perfect for travel. Bought it for my international travel and it works astonishingly well. It charges my phone about 7, 8 times from nearly 10% or so, and quickly, which is more than enough time to find an outlet. My only issue is that the battery itself takes quite a long time to charge up, about 8 hours from dead, but it is a huge battery so it's to be expected.
title: Great for travel

author: Summer Vaughn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2019
review_content: Purchased two. One works as advertised. Second cuts out constantly during every charge. Plug it in to a device and within 15 seconds it has turned off.
title: Doesn’t work correctly.

author: Anthony Avila
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2019
review_content: Anker portable chargers work great. This is my second time buying one, my first one I bought was an older model maybe 6-7 years ago and lasted me about 3 years. This one is even better, charges my iphone 8 and 8 plus maybe a total of 5 times atleast. This anker portable charger is powerful and fast charging. I definitely recommend this brand over many other brands. If ur questioning whether to get it or not, take the risk and buy it. If you dont like it u can return it but I doubt u will return it. You will find out this is probably the best portable charger ever, charges faster than some wall charger to be honest.
title: Strongest/fastest portable charger on the market

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
review_content: I just recommended this product to my sister because after years it still holds it's the battery! I absolutely love it! She questioned some of the bad reviews, which have a quick response back from the customer service dept. and I wanted to acknowledge this great team.
title: WORKS FANTASTIC AFTER  2 1/2 years,

author: Erica L Marrama
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
review_content: In less than 4 months the charger itself will no longer recharge.  After contacting customer service they agreed to replace the charger.  The problem is I have to print out the label the sent me,  buy packaging to ship the charger back to them,  go to the post office and wait how ever many days for them to receive the faulty charger before they will release my replacement charger.  They informed me that shipping for the new charger typically takes 5-7 business days but could be longer based on COVID 19.  Really????
title: Doesn’t Last

author: carlsbad4ever
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2018
review_content: This is the one you want to have with you when you travel.  It is consistently able to provide a quick and complete charge.  BTW I have purchased multiple ANKER products and have found them, and the company that makes them to be first class.  Such a pleasure these days to find quality products that work and that last.
title: Works As Good, If Not Better Than Touted!

author: Jesus G.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2016
review_content: This has to be one of the best chargers that I have ever used! I would use friends chargers and either they would drain fast or not charge that much at all. With this bad boy I charge my iPhone 6s once a day and lasts me the whole day!!! No longer will I have to worry about my phone dying while taking a dump when I can take a dump and charge it at the same time!It's amazing how far technology has come! ...Also can someone bring me some toilet paper?... I brought my charger with me but I forgot to bring toilet paper
title: This has to be one of the best chargers that I have ever used

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020
review_content: I have another smaller one...but really needed a larger one for a 35 day Bike Trip in Sept '20. I've already tried it and it works exactly as described. Also bought the 10w Solar Charging Panel as well.
title: Awesome product

author: Kannu Wadhwa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2017
review_content: It started as a fantastic experience, I loved this power bank throughout my trips in Europe and India. However after using it maybe 15-20 times charging or so, it's dead now. Doesn't even charge anymore.  I'm disappointed honestly ,  I was hoping to use it for a longer time.
title: Dead after few charges.

author: K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2019
review_content: I can charge my iphone 6S around 7-10 times with this baby. It's even stood up perfectly fine being accidentally dropped on rare occasions- keeping in mind that I always keep it in its sleeve (I never take it out- there's no reason to). It's big, but if you work outdoors all day, it's a life-saver.
title: Excellent

author: Nicole
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2018
review_content: This has some weight to it, so take that into consideration if you plan on taking it with you on your travels. But, it does the job of charging. It can charge my iPhone 6s+ at least 3x at 100%. I’ve purchased other Anker products before and have had zero issues/complaints.
title: Execellent just like their other products

author: Theunknown69
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2018
review_content: It was great while it worked!! Charged up super quick, lasted for days!!A few weeks in, one of the USB ports stopped working...okay I'll just use the other one.....and then the other one stopped working....sigh..Also noticed it progressively took longer to charge.Will be weary of Anker from now on...
title: Both ports don't work! Avoid like the plague!!

author: Jon doe
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
review_content: I just got mine and it works well but my only issue is it's not a fast charger I would have given this a 3-star if it wasn't for all the deceptive marketing on this page that says "faster charging" trying to sucker people in to buying it thinking it's a fast charger and I'm one of those suckersFor now this product seems to work well but if you're looking for an actual fast charger do not buy the marketing is lying and companies need to stop saying "faster charging" when it's not a fast charger
title: Not fast charging

author: Brooke
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2018
review_content: This thing is amazing! I've managed to go days on onesie twosie charges for my phone (Motorola) and even got more than the recommended amount of charges for my iPad. This thing is a beast. Albeit it takes a few hours to recharge a completely depleted battery, but once it's charged it's good (for me) for weeks at a time. If I forget my wall charger, I use it. If my truly wireless headphones need a boost before I hit the gym, I use it. I just got the new Galaxy S9 and am anxious to see how many recharges I can get with it.
title: Just what I needed

author: lauren
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2016
review_content: Best external charger I've used. You can buy a couple of the cheap-o chargers for emergencies, or you can invest in something that isn't going to break or lose its ability to charge. Having an external charger on me at all times really takes the stress out of the end of the day.The massive amount of charge means that I can charge it overnight every few days (or a week, depending how much you use it), or charge it for its full cycle before a trip and not have to worry about finding outlets in various cities and places.
title: Don't cheap out on an external charger, besides this is one of the best deals you'll find

author: Theo d Husky
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2016
review_content: Great product! I initially wanted it for playing pokemon go and then we ended going on a trip to Europe! This little guy was a great help! It kept my phone and my wife's phone charged all the time. The only issue is the weight and size of the product. It adds a little weight on our bad and the size does not fit my wife's bag, so I always had to carry a bag!+ProConvenience of chargingCharge phone up to 6-7 times fully chargedCan charge up to two phones at the same timeGreat price-ConsSize and WeightIt takes time to charge
title: This is your travel buddy!!!

author: Abu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2017
review_content: Wow this product is great. It is a life saver . It literally charges my iPhone 6s like 10 times... this product is amazing ... I take it with me to work everyday .. and since I don’t have a plug near by this keeps me alive for the week with once charge . Sometimes my co workers charge their phone and it still has juice left at the end of the week. I recommend this to everybody. This also charges your phone very very fast.
title: Wow this product is great. It is a life saver

author: &rew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2018
review_content: This portable charger holds so much power that on one trip, I charged four different devices several times over three days - it charges up to two devices simultaneously, and devices charge very quickly.  It is a little bigger than my last charger, and its large capacity means charging it fully can take some time.  But it is well worth the time and space for emergencies or just plain convenience.
title: Great power and longevity

author: JTo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2020
review_content: Very good product!!  I fully charged it and used it a month after. The charger still fully load without losing any battery. This charger really can charge your phones over and over again before you've to charge the battery.
title: Reliable batery

author: Kate
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2018
review_content: I love this little beast. Worth every penny. It can charge my phone fully at least two times, probably three or four, but I always remember to recharge it before I get to that point. I run around constantly, and I live in earthquake territory. For both the day-to-day realities of a hectic professional life and also steadfast just-in-case backup power, this is a jewel. A heavy jewel – if you want lightweight, check the specs. This adds weight to my backpack, for sure. But it’s worth it
title: A must-have workhorse

author: Bob B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2019
review_content: Took this our our trip to China as a bit of security as we didn't know the next time we were going to have access to a power plus. Worked well, gave us confidence and helped us further enjoy our adventures. A bit heavy but any / all battries come with weight. Liked it so much I bought another for my daughter as a little surprise. Happy travels.
title: Having a source of 'additional' power when you're not near a plug.

author: Gary Hall II
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
review_content: Intermittent charging. While the pack is working, looks great. I tested it from 70% on my IPhone. Went to 90% in no time... but it was intermittent getting there. I kept having to re-turn on my power pack and unplug, then re-plug in the charging cable. Disappointed, and I need the product to power devices in the flight station as I’m a pilot. I’m disappointed in the reliability, not knowing if it will constantly power devices I have plugged in while flying.
title: Intermittent

author: John
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2019
review_content: 20100mAH is powerful. Charge your devices when AC voltage is not readily available. Anker has made the other 3 banks I own as well. Trusted name in Power Source Banks!! 4.8Amp output will charge them quickly!
title: Best Power Source

author: Brian S
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2016
review_content: This thing is a BEAST...I can charge my LG G3 and my G Pad 7 simultaneously and to full charge in around 3 hours and still have juice to charge my M4 Aqua and a friends device. With another single charge for either of my phones. Absolutely amazing power, a little bulky but given the performance well worth it. Comes with a very nice micro USB cable and mesh carry bag and the packaging was very nice. Definitely recommend! Only thing to bear in mind it is a 20k+ mAh battery and takes about 12-15 hours min to fully recharge.
title: Absolutely amazing power, a little bulky but given the performance ...

author: karinn glover
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
review_content: Have had this for about two years! One of my favorite items from anker by far. Only issue is it has started to stop charging and any cord I plug in my phone says it can’t recognize device. I know it’s not my phone and I’ve used different wires to make sure it wasn’t that. I’ve also kept the charger in great condition so it’s disappointing that this is happening but I guess after two years I’m not too mad. The bigger one I ordered also with this has been perfect fortunately.
title: Great charger but experiencing some issues 2 years later but overall great!

author: Atalia Lopez
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2019
review_content: UPDATEReached out to Anker directly and they are sending me a new device - I assumed that the warranty had already expired but didn’t know that Anker offer and 18 warranty as standard on products like this. Really happy with my customer service experience.OLD REVIEWStopped working after 1.5 years. Started to get a bit sensitive when charging after 6 months or so (had to adjust the position of the cord when setting it down to charge). Stopped being able to charge at all eventually. Wish I submitted for an exchange when I noticed it was being weird. Oh well.
title: 18 month warranty!

author: Maureen A. Ciliberto
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2017
review_content: This charger has been one of the best purchases I've made. Having bought less expensive chargers in the past that made promises that did not measure up, I was a bit skeptical about this one as well, but after reading so many positive reviews I decided to take the plunge and try it. I am so glad I did! I love that you can get 5 days worth of charging  before having to recharge the unit itself (I'm talking FULL CHARGE, not partial), and also that it can charge 2 devices at once. I've used it to charge my iPhone, iPad and FitBit and it charges quickly! I also love that I received it partially charged so I could begin using it immediately.The only negative thing I would say is that despite its compact size, it is quite heavy so it can be cumbersome to take along with you on a daily basis but that is a small price to pay for not having to worry about finding an outlet to recharge your device when traveling. I would recommend this to anyone who wants the peace of mind of having a reliable charger. Love it!
title: Exceeded expectations!

author: Tanna Jo Willimon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2018
review_content: I bought this especially for a family road trip they I was about to go on and it came in handy! Especially since the car didn't have a lot of plugins or ports for all of us to use. Got to the point everyone was asking if they could borrow my battery. Plus it charges your electronic fast and it charges really fast which is really nice.
title: Plus it charges your electronic fast and it charges really fast which is really nice.

author: Susan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2018
review_content: The charger is great for camping when no other sources are available to charge  cell phone.  It can charge up to 3 times without losing power.  I have used it camping and backpacking with no issues.  Only negative is if you are backpacking ultralite this is probably not the best choice to take along.
title: Really great for camping

author: Michael
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2017
review_content: I didn't realize how big this thing was when i got it but this charger is awesome.  I bought it for our trip to Disney and wanted to make sure it could charge multiple devices at once.  This thing was a beast.  I only had to charge the device itself 1 night on a 9 day trip.  I even used it as a charger at night when all other plugs were being used.  The other thing about this device is that it charges fast.  If you can get past the size of the thing you will enjoy this for trips.We charged my iphone 7 plus, iphone 6, and ipad air 2.
title: ... was when i got it but this charger is awesome. I bought it for our trip to Disney ...

author: Daniel W.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
review_content: I got this when Inwas going on a trip that would not have alot of electricity available. It was ment to charge my phone at night. I gotta say, it is a very good product. It used it for about 4 days before I had to recharge it. The only down side is that it takes hours to fully charge.
title: Enough power to charge my phone for days

author: Mark Henry
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
review_content: I use the Anker 20100 to charge an iPhone 6s and Samsung Galaxy 8. I’ve been getting 3 full charges on either phone. The charge time is faster than plugging the phone into the wall outlet. After 3 months of use, I experienced an unusual product failure. Sara in customer service was very responsive, concerned and wanted to make sure she worked out an immediate solution. She mailed me a replacement unit on the same day as my phone call and followed up with an email to make sure all concerns were addressed. I can honestly say that Sara gave me one of the very best customer service experiences I’ve ever had!
title: World class customer service!

author: chanelle
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2018
review_content: I bought this item about a year ago and I love it. When it came in I was expecting a smaller model but the size was still perfect to bring to my trips.. Once it's was fully charged it could charged my iPhone/iPad up to 4 times in less than an hour before it was time to recharge it. 2 weeks ago my Anker charger wasn't charging my items anymore. It lighted up to it fully charger mode but it just wasn't charging anything. I was so sad! Then I remembered the 18Month warranty plan Anker had. I contacted Anker about my issue and without any delays got a response back with a solution. I told them what was wrong, in less than a week I received my new replacement portable charger. After it was delivered I got a follow up email double checking the status of my new charger. I'm so blown away how incredible this product is and its because of their excellent customer service. THANK YOU ANKERRRR & ADA!!!
title: Amazing customer service behind an Incredible Product!!!

author: Cody S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2019
review_content: Get maybe 4-5 full charges out of this for my cellphone. It’s nice. Only downfall is it can take up to 7-8 hours to charge the battery pack. Other than that it’s nice.
title: Good

author: Tristan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2019
review_content: Have been very satisfied with this product. The battery seems to last forever, easily charges my iPhone X up to four times on a charge. After a few months of use one of the usb ports broke. I went to the Anker website and filled out a warranty form. The company replied to me the next day and a week later I had a replacement product in my mailbox! Good customer support is what keeps customers coming back. Thank you Anker!
title: Great Customer Service!!

author: karl sirotkin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2018
review_content: I previously gave a one star.  Turns out the problem was not the unit, but my USB cables.  I had one completely bad one, and one that allowed syncing, but, strangely, did not allow a charge.Took some trouble-shooting to track this oddness down!I am leaving the old ERRONEOUS review below, in case folks look for it and wonder what the story was.  I thought it would make the whole episode clear:--------incorrect assertions below-------My iPhone 6 would not accept a charge from this.  Of course Amazon's return policy made that only an irksome inconvenience, instead of and $$$ loss
title: Did not work iPhone 6

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
review_content: I was getting ready to go to Japan to hike Mount Fuji and got to thinking that a portable charger might come in handy to keep the camera and phone topped up, being an Anker fan, I made my selection from their offerings. I fully charged it when I received it and packed it away in my backpack. During the hike I charged 2 iPhones, 2 Android phones, my Fitbit and topped off the camera .....and most of the capacity lights are still lit on it!In my experience, Anker makes solid equipment that you can count on...and this portable charger is no different!
title: I was getting ready to go to Japan to hike ...

author: JenT
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2015
review_content: Update: After my first review of 3 stars the company contacted me directly and sent out a replacement. The replacement has worked as expected and I am super impressed with the customer service via phone and email. Back to 5 stars!!!I loved it at first but unfortunately it stopped working after a few weeks. After the first full charge had been used it would not recharge. I'll be contacting customer service and hopefully get the issue resolved soon. I do think it's a great product but I was unfortunate enough to get the rare dud. I have purchased 7 chargers(as gifts) from the company and have had no complaints.
title: Wouldn't recharge

author: Justin B.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2017
review_content: Went on a European trip and the Anker 20000mAh was an essential tool that enabled us to keep our cell phones (aka a travelers utility knife) charged on the fly, and provided us the freedom to have uninterrupted navigation. It charges phones at the same rate as an outlet, so with my Samsung S7 it took on average about 1-hour to fully charge (with fast-charging enabled). We would frequently charge 4 phones per day (Samsung S7, S4, Apple 6S and 4), and this thing would still have about 75% juice remaining - so easily charged our 4 phones over the course of two full days of travel (without having to recharge the Anker). The lowest charge I ever allowed the Anker to get to was 25% - and when I plugged it in that evening it was fully charged by morning. I am so happy I bought this as it gave us peace and security to travel without having to do without our phones to navigate foreign countries. I highly recommend the Anker 20000.
title: The Anker 20000, a must for every travelers backpack.

author: Richard A. Shirley
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
review_content: My unit worked great, but stop getting full charge. Amazon gave me Anker’s customer service to replace still in warranty product. I talked to Sara, who provided top notch customer service, Ticket # 41102268, She took the care to make sure my call was a one stop call. Everything was resolved before the call was finished including pre paid return label. My kudos to Anker for their 5 star customer service.
title: Anker’s Awesome Customer Service

author: Matthew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2015
review_content: while i dont have problems with my devices dying on my during the day, I bought this so when I am camping or just in an area that I dont want to be connected to a wall. so far its changed both my Samsung S2 tablet and Iphone 6 plus with no problems what so ever, small enough to carry around and it typically lasts a few weeks for me. great for those times when you are at conventions and want to get around to everything. A must buy even if you dont need to charge your phone bc who knows when you will lose power and it might be the only option.
title: Anker has done it again

author: Kurt Brown of Heber
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2017
review_content: Love this!!!I have a few Anker products for outdoor life. I purchase this to use with my Anker solar charging system. I haven't been out hiking g yet this year, but I have tested it out. I have a Galaxy S6 phone and I got 3 charges on this before I recharged it. But when I recharged it there was still at least 25 percent battery life left. This is a power house unit. Gonna be a life saver for me on the trails. Great unit at a awesome price...
title: EXTREME POWER HOUSE...LOVE IT!!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020
review_content: Used on vacation and for soccer tournaments. Always reliable.  Recharges phone very fast.  Used for all charging for 5 days while out of town when other plug in forgotten at home.
title: Excellent.  Fast recharge.

author: Erica
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2016
review_content: We've been incredibly pleased with our Anker thus far. It fits inside my husband's pockets (most of the time) or inside a purse (unless it's a very small bag or clutch). The weight is fairly substantial, but that is to be expected for a portable battery pack. Just worth noting if you'll be carrying it around in your pocket/purse. We've occasionally charged BOTH our Samsung Galaxy S6's at the same time, and we get multiple charges out of it. There have been times we've used it for nearly 4 full charges and it hadn't drained the Anker's battery by much. It promises 5 full charges for the S6, but you might be able to wiggle more, just don't quote me on that. The speed it charges at is nearly comparable to the "fast charge" our phones get with the wall charger. It's easy to charge and has worked wonders on long daily commutes, trips, etc. It definitely eases the pain of many battery draining apps as well (i.e. GPS related apps or *ahem* PokemonGO).
title: Fast, powerful, and incredibly efficient

author: JOwenr2
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2019
review_content: Like many others have stated one of the two charging ports stopped working, making this unit not as usefull as originally planned. I bought this unit too far in advance for my trip and now cant return thin half useless block of junk...missed my return window by one day...Lame!
title: Ports are prone to failure.

author: YC Tseng
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2018
review_content: Own a smaller version and it was pretty good, so bought this one to upgrade to a higher capacity. Working fine in general, however, it is quite frustrating when the charge level LED doesn't light up when charged, despite pressing the button to show the charge level. The button only works when it is not plugged into the chargerNot sure if this is by design or some malfunction, as my previous version does show the charge level when pressing the button, regardless if it is plugged into a charger or not.
title: Own a smaller version and it was pretty good, so bought this one to upgrade to ...

author: Gayle LaRocco
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2017
review_content: I needed a backup charger for 2 tablets & a phone for a 2 wk trip to the NIH with my grandson.  He's been selected for clinical trials for a rare disease & we have 2 wks of baseline tests. This means we spend a lot of time in waiting rooms.  This is perfect! I can charge all three items and not have to worry when our day lasts several hours.  I also purchased the Anker 2 port plug for better charging of the PowerCore.
title: Perfect for what I need it for!

author: jpeazy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2017
review_content: I literally have charged this 10 times and usually just charge one phone at a time. I tried charging 2 and hones at the same time and found out that one of the ports isn't charging. what a bummer, and of course it's too late to return to amazon.FYI, I just contacted Anker about this. Will update review upon outcome.UPDATE:  I really think I just got a faulty unit as I'm pleased with other Anker products I own. Anker's warranty and customer service is top notch!  They made everything right quickly and without hassle.  Great products, great service.
title: only one port charges.

author: Leap Ahead
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2018
review_content: The product is great. I use mine daily. It’s a little on the heavy side but you get used to it. It will charge my iPhone 6 4-5 times before needing a charge itself.Fabulous customers service! They kept checking with me to make sure I was completely satisfied. My product stopped holding a charge after about 10 months. They sent me a brand new one with very little question. Great communication! Thank you
title: Perfect customer service.

author: SeaOfStatic
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2018
review_content: *updated review.  Anker sent me a new charger and it seems to work fine, but I can’t give a 5 Star review based on the fact that the first one failed.  But this is a company that reached out to me, replaced a faulty product free of charge and followed up on it.  I will definitely continue to purchase Anker products knowing how they stand behind their chargers.Died within 4 months, won’t take a charge now.  Have tried multiple USB cables and rated power blocks, light only flashes once as if there is connection and then does not charge.  Of course used original power usb cord and charging block first.  It’s the device, wasted money.
title: *updated review, one failed, replacement seems great

author: Ivo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2020
review_content: I bought this battery last year and everything was perfect until it wasnt holding a charge recently but when I contact Anker even though my warranty was expiring in a couple of the did their best and sent me a new replacement. I received the new battery and so far everything is working perfect with it. I really appreciate all your help team Anker and I will continue to work only with your products. You are the best.
title: Best Battery and customer service

author: Michael Owens
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
review_content: Not literally. But this will recharge my Samsung S7 like three times. I really like the LED that shows how charged the battery bank is too.
title: Power for daysssss.........

author: Gokulanand I.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2017
review_content: An absolutely fantastic external battery. I bought this to replace the number of 2000mAh batteries that I had lying around and I have to tell you this thing delivers. I mainly use it to charge my iphone, and have even used it to charge my laptop! Prior to buying, I read that the new macbook pro could charge off ofusb 3.0 to usb c cable and wanted to try it. Most reviews said that the battery pack would only hold charge but not actually charge it up. I put this to the test, and sure enough, not only did it hold charge, but after letting it charge for 10 min it charged about 5%Now that being said, this is by no means going to replace carrying around your charger, but I have found it useful when I have needed to complete some urgent tasks with low battery, as this allowed me to stave off my computer from dying for just long enough. That being said, an overall great product that comes with a nice mesh case
title: Great fast charger that works with new macbook!

author: KRGraphics
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2017
review_content: This is an awesome battery pack! My original intention was to use to for powering the Perception Neuron mocap system but I am blown away at not only how well designed it is made, but how QUICKLY it charges my cell phone.It is a bit heavy in my pocket, no big deal. But it is a great companion if you're on a long bus ride where you can't charge your phone, or on a plane. (Will need to find out if I am allowed to have this in my carry on)
title: The perfect companion for travel!

author: Nicholas Auriemma
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2019
review_content: So happy with this. No more extension cords when trying to charge my phone while I need to use it (on my couch hahah). Also saved us on our Disney trip ...we use our phones so much for Disney app, photos etc and this was great!
title: So glad we bought! I’m spoiled now!

author: The Fikes
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2018
review_content: This is the second unit I have purchased.  This purchase was made prior to a family trip.  When I received it, we did not notice that one of the USB ports were broken until a couple days into the trip.  Once we returned home I notified Anker of the issue.  After supplying them with the serial number, they promptly shipped a new one out to me within a day of the email.  There was no arguing, no jumping through hoops, etc.  They just immediately made it right, no questions asked.
title: Still #1 for power supplies and cables!

author: Tara
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
review_content: Comes in a mesh back with a short mini-USB charging cable. Charges my phone quickly and multiple times over. Charges fully in about 8 hours and usually have to charge it once every 3 days (with routine use).
title: Works great

author: Vicky M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
review_content: I love this charger, I have purchased one for each family member for emergencies.  We have ‘killed’ one already but it was in near continuous useIt has two USB ports so phone and headset can charge simultaneously.  The feature I love best is that when on the go I can plug my phone in while I am talking and not miss a beat
title: Use all the time

author: chad chamberlain
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2018
review_content: Recommended from my cousin in the UK. Played around with his and charged up a few devices at once in no time at all. Had to get it once I got back to the States. Been more than happy ever since. There is a newer version that allegedly charges your laptop as well. Was a bit outta my price range and didn't need that functionality. Very satisfied with this product.
title: Satisfied

author: Kevin O'Riley
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2018
review_content: This thing is great, especially if you have multiple devices or friends nearby who need a charge. The battery capacity is massive, charging my Pixel several times (never counted exactly...) before needing more juice. It's a good size, fitting in to a pocket when needed, if you don't mind slightly bulky pockets ;-).Anker support is also awesome. I must have been unlucky with my first unit, as it stopped recharging itself after a while. Anker sent out a replacement quickly, and they were super nice and happy to help.I'm very satisfied with it... I might buy some as gifts!
title: Nice bang for your buck

author: JRooks
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2018
review_content: I have been using this charger for almost a year. It has become an essential item for our car trips, air trips, and long days out and about away from easily accessible power. My husband and I primarily charge our cell phones, my Samsung G7 and his iPhone4. I typically get 5+ full charges off of it, and it charges my phone much faster than my car's USB outlet (Mazda CX9). I have used it to charge my older iPad, but typically only get 1-1.5 iPad charges off of it. It's nice to have a reliable source of power for our modern device addiction.
title: Reliable Power Source for Our Modern Device Addiction

author: Aaron Snyder
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2019
review_content: Like the 3 other chargers I have that are made by Anker, this one is great. It takes a little time to fully charge up, but it lasts for multiple charge ups of my iPhone, tablets, headphones, etc. Love it. The only drawback is its a little big. BUT... that's not a huge deal. I also like that the chargers come with a little carry case where you can keep your cords along with the charger.
title: Great charger

author: David M. James
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
review_content: This is a great battery. It holds a charge for many months, compact and will charge multiple phones at a time. I have had it now for a couple of years and very satisfied.
title: Great battery

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2018
review_content: Came with charge and can charge my phone about 15 times, I use it for school and I only charge it once a month, I bought this when I went camping and my phone died and the two power banks I brought with me only charged my phone 25% all tegother, Pissed off with garbage quality power banks, I bought this and I love it
title: Love this thing

author: Wally from Florida
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2018
review_content: I haven’t had this a year and the battery holds maybe a 50% charge. I can charge my iPhone maybe twice if I’m lucky. Very disappointed. (this was my original review)So an update, I was just under the 18 month warranty and thought I would see what would happen if I tried to file a warranty claim. WOW WOW WOW.  I went to Anker's website and filed a claim.  After a couple of correspondences, I now have a brand new Anker charger.  They were great to work with and definitely stand behind their product.
title: Updated review - They stand behind their warranty

author: Pat S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2017
review_content: After enduring 5 days with no power due to a hurricane, I knew I had to get a portable charger. I nearly drained my car battery trying to charge up devices. I looked at reviews and decided to choose Anker.  It has not disappointed. The Anker device was pretty simple with easy instructions. It comes with it's own USB cord and a carrying sleeve which is very nice. The bonus is it can charge two devices at once which is perfect! It does very well holding a charge for an extended amount of time. I have used it to charge my iPhone twice now and the battery indicator light still remains at it's highest. I know this will be very handy and was a great buy. Definitely would recommend.
title: Great portable charger

author: Milo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2018
review_content: This charger was exactly as described and worked well but unfortunately started having issues after only a few months. It comes with a warranty and after contacting them about the trouble I was only asked to try a couple quick troubleshooting ideas and when they didn't work I was sent a replacement charger with fast shipping!
title: Will back their warranty!!!

author: Mr Spanky
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2015
review_content: What a great battery bank this thing offers a lot of capacity. I've had it for a few weeks now it had three of the four lights on when I received it which meant it was about 75% charged so I immediately put it on my chargio 2.4 amp wall charger and about 45 minutes later it was fully charged. After charging the bank I was able to charge my iPhone 6 from 17% to 100%, my fire tablet hd 6 from 22% to 100%, and my wireless Bluetooth speakers and it still had 4 lights lit up which tells me this thing is a true 20 amp hour battery.
title: Great and handy portable battery bank.

author: SubtleXplosion
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2016
review_content: Its been about 2 weeks now. This exactly what I needed for my WiFi Pineapple. The Pineapple can only be on as long as the smallest power source, so theres plenty of left over juice even after several after hours of work. I will be purchasing a second Anker 20100 for my kit soon.Pros:Size is perfect. Utilization of space is a major factor and this fits almost any application imaginable.Quality. Hard composite shell, with ultra premium packaging.Operation. This unit fit all my needs here too, 2.4 amp out (per port), 2.4 in 5v (per port), a y-cable makes those numbers meet or exceed my needs.Cons:None relavent.
title: Size is perfect. Utilization of space is a major factor and ...

author: Kelly Wakeland
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
review_content: Love this! It got me and three others through multiple days in Kenya without electricity and it was a godsend while going about my day without a car charger. Works awesome!
title: Lifesaver!

author: Jade Zakrzewski
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2020
review_content: I was told about anker portable batteries because they are great for traveling but my aunt. She was completely right! I have used this portable battery on my trips to Europe and just in every day! The battery life lasts forever! It is a great product to carry around whether traveling or just around the house! It also provides a fast charge as well! I love my anker portable battery and I use it all the time!
title: Great purchase!

author: Onur turnuklu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2020
review_content: a very heavy product. points to me are the points. Once there is no usbc connection. There is usbc connection in many batteries now, but this product does not. It also stops charging the phone before it is fully charged. I am using an original usb cable. It is not a perfect product you will understand. a medium grade product. Choose better devices for less price. thanks
title: don't expect much

author: tyler chu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2017
review_content: Me and my best friend bought these batteries at the same time. His charges his phone (iPhone 6) regardless of what he's doing on it but mine doesn't charge my phone (iPhone 5s) as much as heavily reduce the speed at which it discharges. For example, my phone has been sitting for twenty minutes with no apps running and screen off, and the power has remained at 96% the whole time. I haven't tried my friends battery with my phone or my battery with his phone so it might just be a problem with my phone, but I do know that my phone charges just fine from a 1A wall outlet whereas this supposedly 2.4A USB isn't cutting it for my phone.EDIT: my friend loves his and would rate it 4-5 star. My phone could very well be a bit dinky. Do what you will with this knowledge.Edit2: it's actually probably my phone's power sucking rate, not the power bank. Battery works well enough as far as far as I care.
title: It's high noot

author: Texas Gal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2017
review_content: I bought this Anker PowerCore 20100 - Ultra High Capacity in case we had an extended outage that would strand me without communication while the power was out.I have not had to rely on it for that situation yet but have been charging my iPhone and iPad since I received it from Amazon. It works very well, in fact it charges my devices faster that the wall outlet does.  It is a high functioning insurance product for an imergency.
title: A Great Charge

author: Rosh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2016
review_content: As a road warrior this device is fantastic.  It a little heavy, but I have no problem with it since it is always in my office bag.  I don't this this is something u want to put in your pocket.  I get a lot of charges on my tab and my phone.  I have never been disappointed with any Anker Product.  I have the S6 and It does not charge in fast charge mode but it charges in normal charge mode.  For me that still charges fast enough for me though fast charging will be faster.  The capacity is great.
title: Amazing Multiple  charge power pack for the go.

author: Jdynamite
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2018
review_content: I love this thing. I take it everywhere with me. I  put it in a backpack at work and randomly charge my phone or Wireless headphones.I can use it for about week before I need to fully charge it again.I’m thinking about buying a smaller one for when I go jogging since I use several apps that drain my phone quickly.
title: I love this mobile charger.

author: runnerman1830
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2016
review_content: I get a ton of charges for my phone on one recharge cycle (close to 10 for my phone).  I do think it takes longer to charge than advertised. Also, make sure you buy/have a 2 Amp charger for it as it can't charge off a cheap 1 Amp phone charger.  I made that mistake when I bought this & had to buy one of these: Anker USB Wall Charger PowerPort 2 (24W with 2 Ports and Foldable Plug).One drawback is I don't think this is something I would carry with me on a day to day basis because it is somewhat large & heavy.  It fits in the hand nice but for me it was bigger than I originally anticipated.Overall, it is a good charger & I would recommend it for anyone that has multiple devices to charge or will be going a couple days without access to an outlet.
title: Bulky, but Good

author: Lucas Rugar
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
review_content: Unlike most models when you hit 24k mAh, this one is just small enough to fit in your pocket. Great for those super long days, or even just having around the apartment to charge things in unusual places.
title: Sleek, powerful, reliable

author: HJB
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2018
review_content: Update: Customer service was quick to respond and sent a replacement. The replacement works as it should and I’m hopeful it will continue to do so.———-I've been lightly using the battery pack for 10 months now. 2 of the 4 LED lights no longer work so I can't tell when/if the battery pack is fully charged. Even if I plug in the pack to the wall for hours, the second LED light keeps blinking and the third never turns on. It runs out of battery more quickly now and doesn't seem to charge all the way.
title: Battery indicator lights don't work

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2019
review_content: I love this portable charger. I use it a LOT. Because I travel long distances a lot and can't charge my phone in my car. I can charge my phone like 3 times before the portable charger dies. The only thing abput it is the portable charger at self takes forever to charge, but in my opinion it's well worth the wait.
title: Holds a lot of charge

author: Bruce Elting
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
review_content: Bought an off brand. Ended up returning it. Replaced with this unit from Anker. Charged initially overnight. Next day charged a bluetooth speaker and phone, twice. So very pleased with this battery
title: 2nd times a charm

author: Jason
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2019
review_content: I’ve got two phones (one for work) and I spend my lunch hour playing ingress and or pogo. And I play during my commute and whenever there is an Ingress portal available. This battery keeps me going when the games run me dry. This is my second battery only because my dry bag leaked on a trip.
title: Ingress or pogo must have or one of the other models

author: EDUARDO ANTONIO URBINA MUNOZ
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020
review_content: Lo compre para ir de vacaciones a Disney porque me preocupaba quedarme sin batería para las fotografías y fue lo mejor que pude haber hecho, carga muy rápido y ha extendido la vida útil de mi iPhone porque solo lo cargo con esta batería, puedo cargar hasta 7 veces mi teléfono sin recargarla, es un poco grande y pesada pero vale la pena
title: No más baterías dañadas!

author: J.R.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
review_content: Excited when received the product. Thanks for fast one day shipping Amazon!!It had one blue bar when powered on so I decided to charge the powerbank first before charging my phone. Plugged in and waited for 3 hours and when I checked again the bar is still one. The power bank itself never charges. Will return.
title: Power bank never charge

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2017
review_content: Their product is simply amazing. The charge is incredibly fast and the product is very durable. I bring my charger to all trips and always got me through every event. Wether it be a music festival, out camping or just a weekend getaway, this charger is the best. I'm able to charge my items and my friend's without any worry.The 18 Month warranty is also something to marvel at. At 17 months, one of the two USB inputs stopped working. I think something got loose there, so I contacted their support team and Luana helped me out. She sent a replacement almost immediately, after some quick troubleshooting tests. When confirmed it was just the charger malfunctioning, I got my new charger in a few days. Totally free of charge. Simply amazing.If you're looking for an amazing product and customer service, choose Anker.
title: Awesome Customer Support and Fantastic Charger

author: cfun
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: this thing charges everything superfast! my phone battery was down at 14% when it came in the mail, i plugged it in and it was already 3/4 of the way full of charge juice, in 30 minutes, my phone was at 100%! it's a little bit heavy, so it wouldn't be ideal for backpacking or anything, but it is small enough that you could pack it in your purse if need be. I've only had it for a week, so if it becomes not awesome, i'll update, but so far I'm pleased and couldn't believe what a great price i got it for! i'll probably be purchasing more Anker products.
title: I dig it!

author: Dean A
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2019
review_content: I bought this power bank for while I was out in the field with the military. It worked great for about 2 months. I’d get a couple phone charges out of it, and it worked just as advertised. All of a sudden it just stopped charging my phone after about 2-3 minutes even when the power bank was fully charged. I have to hit the power button on it every 2 or so minutes in order for it to keep charging. I made sure it wasn’t the cable as well. It was kept clean and wasn’t dropped. It’s a great powerbank when it’s brand new but doesn’t seem to hold up very long.
title: Stopped working after 2 months

author: jball
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
review_content: Anker products are top notch and the company customer service is honestly second to none. Best experience I’ve ever had from a company. I have two of these chargers and one of them developed an issue.I reached out to anker and within one week there was a replacement product in my mailbox. Five stars no questions.
title: Quality product and company.

author: Gajab
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020
review_content: This long narrow power bank tucks neatly into most of the pockets in my backpack or briefcase. Like all Anker products it is very solidly made. I love it.
title: Superb

author: tina
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
review_content: Works amazing, takes a very long time to charge up fully (few days) but once it’s fully charged it will last for about a week & can recharge your phone multiple times m. Use this every time I travel
title: Lasts for days, perfect for traveling

author: Matt
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2015
review_content: This battery pack is really nice I bought this for a few reasons one because I need some thing for Hurricane season if I lose power at least I can charge my devices. The other reason is because I wanted to see if this could power my WiFi Pineapple or Reaver Pro II and sure enough it can I made a little video showing me using this Anker Battery Back feel free to check it out at the following link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_j-L2QVsD8It took roughly 1 hour and 30 minutes to charge my Nexus 7 2013 Tablet give or take.
title: It's really handy!

author: AC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
review_content: Great power pack to keep phone and watch charged when electrical outlets are not available. Recently used this power pack on a camping canoeing trip to keep iWatch charged. I’m going on 14 days of charging watch and power pack is still above 50%.
title: Lasting power and more

author: J-Ro
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
review_content: This has performed quite well.  Charges multiple phones quickly.  Sometimes I can go 3 Weeks between Uses and it always keeps its charge.
title: Great purchase

author: Jake Hoey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
review_content: I love this product, it is great for power on the go, and it lasts a long time. My only complaint is that it takes a long time to charge. Anker has another model that will fast charge (input) the device itself and it cuts the charging time in about half.
title: Wish I would've known this doesn't fast charge (input)

author: Serious Shopper
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2017
review_content: We live in Western NC and watched as Irma was headed our way. I received the Anker on Saturday, charged it on Sunday, and Tuesday morning our power went out. For 36 hours, we kept my iPhone and my husband's Android charged. We likely could have added an iPad, but not knowing how long we would be out - we didn't want to chance it. Love this product. I think I'll buy a smaller portable one for my aging iPhone 5.
title: Just in time

author: Jay W.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2018
review_content: I am a huge fan of Anker chargers. The multi-port wall chargers and vehicle chargers are fast on all devices. I expected the same from their battery. I bought it to provide charging for devices on my long motorcycle trips since I don't have an 12v outlet on my bike. I hve been very disappointed in the rate of charge of this battery. After 2 hours my phone went from 22% to 32%. I hooked the phone up to a smaller Jackery battery and was near full capacity in that same time frame. I bought this to avoid having to carry multiple smaller portable chargers on my trips but have ended up leaving it behind and carrying the extras simply for the shorter charging times.Swing-and-a-miss for a company that has repeatedly nailed it with their other products.
title: The Edsel of the the Anker line-up

author: Tim Nichols
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020
review_content: takes a long time to charge but it's great for travel or prolonged periods away from electricity when your power needs remain high.. I use it to recharge my digital camera, iPhone and laptop.
title: great for travel

author: Curt Norman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019
review_content: My children have purchased multiple iphone chargers. They were weak, short lasting, and often failed.  I finally went with the  Anker PowerCore and now realize how much money I have wasted with the cheap ones.  My daughter went to Europe and the Anker was a blessing where electrical outlets are few and do not accept US phone chargers.  Have something important to have power, buy the Anker!
title: Long lasting and QUICK chargings

author: Andy Foster
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2015
review_content: A life-safer for me! Great product - it does charge up as it promises. I have a gazillion of iOS devices due to having children and a wife. So it's great when you are on the road and need to keep these devices powered up for a variety of reasons.Also the design is very nice and well-made. It fits in my pocket easily. But I can imagine it'll be a bit weird for others to see a wire sticking out of my pocket and connected to my phone in my other pocket! I try not to do this in airports though - don't want to be on the news!
title: Great product - it does charge up as it promises

author: D. Patrick
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2019
review_content: I received the 1st battery.  It held a charge and charged my devices; however, it would  power-down every 5 minutes requiring me to push the button on the side in order to get the charging to start again.  Not what I expected.  It was obviously defective.I sent a message to Anker's Customer Support Team and they were sympathetic to my problem.  After they recommended a few troubleshooting tips that failed, they sent me a replacement battery and advised me how to properly/safely dispose of the defective battery.I would definitely buy another one of their products. Thanks Team Anker. :)
title: Anker's Customer Service Rocks!!!

author: J.H.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020
review_content: Dropped 1x, about a foot off ground.  Will not charge another device anymore. 1st trip with the battery charger. Very disappointed. Would give 0 stars if I could. Advice- put some no slip grip on the charger before placing in the carrying case.
title: No durability

author: Giovanni E.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
review_content: It works great but now after seven months, both ports don't want to charge like they use to. Before it use to charge my phone fully in less than an hour when my phone battery is at around 50 percent. Now it says it will take above two hours. I tried my regular charger at home and it works perfectly fine. So it's not the phone and I used a different cable but there is only a 20 to 30 minute change. It's still way above it the usual less than one hour charge.
title: It's a great battety!

author: AJA
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2019
review_content: Got this as a gift for my bf and he loves it. He works outside so no outlets to plug into when his battery runs out. With long days outside in cold weather his phone battery wears down and this has been really helpful for him.
title: Great gift!

author: Paul Bowman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2016
review_content: They say Dynamite comes in small packages and let me say,  This thing is great!This is by far the best charger battery I've ever owned.Not just capacity but ease of use as well.The form factor is perfect for slipping in and out of deep pockets for charging on the goor even while using your phone.  If you # Ingress, a lot,  you are going to love this battery.I'm 100% happy with this unit.Nice job Anker!(No I don't work for them)

author: Andres
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
review_content: Let me tell you, I bought this about 3-4 years ago and this continues to be a life savor! It does take about a night to charge but for about 7 full iPhone 8 charges over the day it evens out! This honestly has been the best portable charger I could have chosen. The one I got has been through hell, droops, rainy days and to this day it still works to it’s full potential. I do not dislike anything of this slick and sick made charger because to my opinion there is not “best” since this one takes the spot!
title: THE BEST!

author: Linda Her
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2019
review_content: We bought this charger to take it to Hawaii.  Man did it help us on the plane and while on the road on the islands.  Charged 2 phones full charge in an 1 or so.  Its not too heavy and light enough for a purse.  Id recommend this one.
title: Super Charger

author: Bartek Krolikowski
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2017
review_content: Bought it 19 months ago (wow) and it works as I got it the first day, used it extensively in different temperatures (from 0), charges my phone really fast and never had any problems with it. This was the best decision of my life. Love the quality and it is just perfect. You can take it on the plane around the world because it follows the TSA and other international standards.
title: The best thing I ever bought!

author: chavelitabella
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2019
review_content: I've used the portable charger for several months and it worked perfectly. Unfortunately, after 8 months of use one port stopped working. I was hesitant to reach out to customer service but eventually chose to explain what happened.AnkerDirect Customer Support responded quickly and sent a replacement really quickly. I appreciate their response and help.
title: Quick customer service after issue with portable power bank

author: Kayla Williams
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020
review_content: I love everything about this portable charger it’s amazing. Not only is the charger amazing the customer service with Anker was also outstanding!! Thank you so much to Karen from Anker for all your help it was greatly appreciated. 11/10 would recommend this portable to anyone, even if you happen to have problems with it, like I said he customer service is amazing so you have nothing really to worry about.
title: Amazing Portable Charger

author: Diane K.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2017
review_content: I am pleased with the Anker PowerCore 20100 because it holds enough power to charge several devices without having to recharge the Anker.  I was disappointed in the amount of time it takes to recharge a device, even my cell phone.  The cord which came with the Anker is too short if I need to make a call on my cell phone when it is out of juice. I better have a pocket on my blouse to hold the Anker while I hold the cell phone to my ear.  Yes, I  could put my call on speaker but I would rather not have everyone around me hear the entire conversation.
title: I am pleased with the Anker PowerCore 20100 because it holds enough ...

author: Vanessa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2018
review_content: A few years of owning this battery pack, the battery pack still is running very strong. Feels like it’s still the same quality when I first bought it. Still takes forever to charge fully but that’s how it was when I first bought it.Not really a heavy user but I used it on weekend trips and or long drives. Pretty much any time I’ll need a backpack or luggage, this battery pack is something I always bring with me. I use it to charge two iPhones and UE speakers . Never had any issues. Hopefully it can stay this way for a few more years.
title: Review after owning for a few years now.

author: Austin Schroeder
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
review_content: A bit bulky for everyday use, but amazing capacity. Used for about a year, then gave it to a friend who has been using it for almost 6 months. Great for anybody who uses electronics frequently
title: Great value

author: VINCENT M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2019
review_content: -Quick to fully recharge anything plugged into this.-Long lasting power (I’ve averaged 5 full charges on my iPhone 8Plus).-Very handy, good for traveling.-Durable. I’ve dropped this so many times and still does the job like new!
title: Long lasting power

author: Karl T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
review_content: This product did not work at all.  I bought is specifically for a trek on the Inca Trail and it didn't work at all.  It kept turning off in the middle of charging and just stopped.  I would have to keep turning it on again to make it keep charging my phone (and it was fully charged when I took it) - and then it would only charge very slowly for my iPhone 8.  Not only that, I just sat down to return it as I recently returned from my trip and apparently I just missed the window to return the item.  Don't waste your money!
title: Terrible - and no refund...

author: Dallin Clark
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
review_content: More charges than needed on my phone throughout the day (better too much than too little)durable (have dropped it more than a few times, maybe only like a foot off the ground but still works)
title: Durable and long lasting

author: Calvin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2017
review_content: Purchased this less than 2 weeks ago, and drained it once. I attempted to charge it today, but even after a full day of charging the the 4th LED does not light up. It is not that big of a deal since the battery still holds charge and can charge my phone; however, it is a little disappointing since it will be more difficult for me to tell how much charge is left. Well I added an extra star because Anker was able to give me a replacement battery.
title: Okay

author: sLaNj
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2019
review_content: Granted, I bought this about 8 months ago.  However, now it won't take a charge.  Just sits there blinking...  I really expected higher quality, I don't put much of a drain on but I do charge around once a month.  I thought it'd last at least a year.  I'm pretty disappointed, Anker used to be good quality.
title: Supposed to be a good brand.

author: MommyOf3!
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
review_content: It’s big but definitely worth it. I took it on a camping trip for 4 days and it charged my phone enough for the entire trip. I definitely recommend it.
title: Best Portable Charger

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2018
review_content: I gave it only one star because of the one usb port working. I usually only need one at a time but still a quality control issue. I will say this the product charged my I phone for over a week without recharging bank. Amazing ! had the other usb port worked this would be 5 star.Maybe Anker will respond let's see.
title: only one usb port operable

author: AlyKat
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019
review_content: It’s a tad heavy but I really appreciate its convenience...my family has shared  it at hospital stays, vacationing so so handy to have. It really can charge 8 phones back to back. I have the white one, my roommate ordered the black one and this one I ordered for my neighbor, he noticed ours and asked me to order him one.
title: Sooo convenient!

author: The dude
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2019
review_content: This thing is amazing.  I went on a 9 day vacation fully charged and wondered Paris using GPS all day and charged my phone every day with this.  To my surprise, when I checked the charge level it was 3 out of 4 lights at the end of my trip.  Simply amazing.
title: Amazing, I'd give it 10 stars

author: Burke Family
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2016
review_content: Tons of charges in this thing.  Galaxy S6,Got it for playing Pokemon Go, and I can play for 4-5 on this without making a dent in the charge.  If I start playing on a low battery, it will still charge pretty fast while it is actively being used for a power hog of a game.It's also not that big, and fairly discreet to carry around in my pocket, though it is heavy for it's size.The jacks attach firmly and securely, very good construction.
