author: RJM33311
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2018
review_content: I had taken this item with me to a conference and was able to charge both my work phone and personal phone without having to find a plug. Other similar products I owned couldn't do one as well as this does two.
title: Brick, but durable

author: Melissa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2018
review_content: My husband and I use this every day for our phones, tablets  etc. My mother was in the hospital out of town and this kept my son's tablet . my tablet and phones going for 3 days without recharging it.
title: Great Charger

author: Maria
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2017
review_content: I just received my Anker 20000Ah Portable Charger PowerCore Friday August 11, 2017.  I charged the charger all night so I can use it the next morning.  When I used the cable that came with this charger to charge my phone, it would charge for about 10 min and then the charger would turn off. I would try to turn the charger back on but it would not stay on until I switched it to the other port and then it would turn back on to charge and do the same, turn back off after 10 mins or so and it seemed like my phone hardly charged.  I know the battery on my phone is good, it been tested.  I have a Samsung Galaxy S7 edge.  What I did was switched to another cable and it looks like it is charging my phone now and its been over 10 minutes, so I will see if this works.  If this product requires us to use the Anker cable that came with the charger, could I have a bad Anker Cable?
title: Anker cable may be no good

author: Peter Cap
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2015
review_content: I love Anker products. I basically go off-grid and don't charge my phone with an outlet or computer, except when I'm in my car! I just use this behemoth! Paired with an Anker  Anker 6ft Nylon Braided USB Cable with Lightning Connector [Apple MFi Certified] for iPhone 6s Plus / 6 Plus , iPad Pro Air 2 and More (Space Gray)          , throw this in your backpack and snake the cord through your hoodie and you will survive a zombie apocalypse for at least a week (iphone 6 plus) or more!
title: BRUH.

author: Lori
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2018
review_content: I received my Anker PowerCore 20100 before an international trip. Plugged it in, charging lights indicated progress...until it would not take a charge beyond two lights. Nothing I tried worked so I emailed the customer support team. Their suggestion was to try a completely different cable and then, if that did not work, to send a screen shot of my order and a photo of the end of the unit where the serial number is located. I did so and also told them that I had a very short time before my trip. They quickly shipped a new PowerCore, which promptly took a full charge. And they checked with me to make sure I was happy. Shae, my customer support representative, was absolutely wonderful. I am giving them five stars for customer support.
title: Fantastic customer service

author: AmazonCustomer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2015
review_content: Can't say enough good things about this charger!It kept my girlfriend and I fully juiced on our trip to and from the Grand Canyon. Charged two phones and a vape, maybe used 25% of its capacity. This is THE BEST battery pack on the market right now, and at roughly $40, it's a great deal.It's a bit too bulky/heavy for even a jacket pocket, so, I'd recommend carrying this in a backpack with your other gear and running a power cord to your device, if you plan on using it while you're charging. That is the only drawback.
title: Can't say enough good things about this charger

author: Lam T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2016
review_content: This is a great product and charges my devices many times. However, charging the PowerCore itself will take you about 3 days from empty. It's a little disappointing because I expected more from Anker.
title: Good Battery Pack But With Flaws

author: Austin J. Peterson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2017
review_content: I literally use this every single time I go out of town. It is soooo easy to keep in a small daypack with a charger chord and keep my electronics powered up for multiple days. It has at least 5 full phone charges in it and I even can charge up my Bluetooth headphones once or twice. Super sturdy and well built.The name Anker will always mean 'quality product' in my mind after buying this and one of their lifetime guaranteed iPhone charger chords.
title: Could not recommend more to anyone looking for on the go charging.

author: warrior
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2018
review_content: It work with Nintendo DS, DS Lite, 3DS, 3DS XL, New Nintendo 3DS XL, PS4 controller, USB LED light, USB fan and more. I love it! Great quality! :-)Don't use quick charge on Nintendo DS, 3DS, PS3/PS4 controller that can overheat! Use normal charger is more safe than quick charger.Also it should work on most mobile phones too.
title: I love it! Great quality

author: Devang
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2017
review_content: This battery is AWESOME! I can't believe how slick and compact Anker has built this thing. I've had this battery for over a year now and it's still kick butt. It's an all around great battery for frequent travelers such as I and it'll hold its charge for months if you lay it sitting it around. This thing can charge my phone up to 7 times and it can last me a week without recharging at times but it just depends on your power needs. It can fully charge my iPad Air 2 almost twice.Cons1. Recharging takes forever, close to 12 hours at times (I use my iPad 12V wall adapter but Anker has some super chargers if 12 hours is a lot for you)2. The mesh bag it came with broke after a few months of use
title: No battery gets better than this

author: Gamer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2019
review_content: i’ve has this for 3 years and never had a problem. takes around 10 hours to charge the battery, i get around 4 and a half phone charges before i need to charge the battery again. i have an iphone xs max- takes about 45 minutes for the phone to charge.
title: best battery

author: Darieus Veltri
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2019
review_content: This thing is the best for traveling. I went to Italy & Greece in 2018 with it for two weeks and it is an absolute beast. My phone never died the whole entire trip because of this portable charger. I still use it very often when I go out instead of bringing my actual phone charger. It lasts long, charges fairly fast, and is durable. Mine has been dropped and scuffed up tons of time and I have yet to experience any problems with it whatsoever. I definitely recommend snagging this one!
title: Best Travel Purchase!

author: Alicia D.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
review_content: I recommend 1000% you will not regret.  Avoid dropping a lot if you do you will not have your moneys worth. It's a bit heavy.
title: Fast charging battery

author: Robbie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2018
review_content: Normally I ward away from doing reviews but this time I felt this particular product deserved recognition.  I do a lot of outdoor activities and I needed a portable charger to facilitate my craving for music during these adventures.  I currently own 8 UE Megaboom speakers that have fantastic battery capacity.  I found that the speakers had a far better battery capacity than either of my music sources hence my purchasing the Anker 20100 mAh.  The product is well put together and charges as specified.  The dual port is most useful under the needs required by enthusiasm for constant music at all times.  Completely satisfied and highly recommend.  I will add that purchasing a hard case is beneficial if you do outdoor activities.  You can never be to cautious with electronics and the elements.
title: I currently own 8 UE Megaboom speakers that have fantastic battery capacity

author: Ky
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2019
review_content: I bought this for some upcoming travels but its already been so useful in everyday life! Its quite a bit heavier than I thought it would be, but it holds several charges and is great for camping and traveling. It takes a while to charge it, but if you just plug it in overnight you should be good. Love this!
title: Useful

author: Patricia Malchiodi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2020
review_content: I bought it for my daughter because of power outages. She would take it to work charge it then have it for devices in the evening.
title: Good item to have.

author: Liz P. C.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2018
review_content: I can get 5-6 phone charges off this thing and god knows how many vape charges. It's great for vacation when I can just walk around and charge my phone as I go around taking obnoxious amounts of photos or even just to plug in my vape while camping so I can charge as I smoke. It's definitely one of the best purchases I've made.
title: It's great for vacation when I can just walk around and ...

author: Hayley Rawahneh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
review_content: I love this device! It really comes in handy! The battery life is amazing and the charging power is quick! Get it if you haven’t. Way to go, Anker.
title: Charges fast, keeps long charge life.

author: Jmw274
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2016
review_content: I use my iphone 6 plus quite heavily and when fully charged this battery keeps it going for 2 days or more. I've been very happy with its performance overall. It was charging slowly at first and I called customer service - got an immediate answer with minimal dealing with a computerized menu. The customer service agent explained the type of charger output I needed and since correcting that, it charges completely overnight.About six months in one of the usb ports broke. I rarely use them both at the same time so I didn't worry about it. Then at about 10 months the second one broke. After less than 5 minutes on the phone with customer service I had a prepaid shipping label for the return and I had a brand-new replacement in my hand two days later.If you have't used one before it may seem a little heavy, but in my experience, not much more so than a much lower capacity battery you would get at Best Buy. I bought the newer 26,000 for my girlfriend as a gift and this fees much lighter by comparison.
title: Works great with my 6 plus, excellent customer service

author: locoboof
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2016
review_content: This thing is sleek! Upon opening it you're greeted with how to use instructions as well as "are you happy" card. Which is your warranty info.I do love the matte finish on the outside,it keeps it from being a fingerprint magnet. Also you can see in the pictures how the 20100MAH is slightly larger than my 16000MAH battery pack. Yes it's still thin.I've charged two iPhone 6s's and I'm still at 75% (if not more). I'd say it charges your devices at about 1% per minute.  It takes a few ours for the baby to get fully charged,but after that you're good to go for a very long time.  It comes with a nice carrying pouch,USB cord to charge the device all in the box.If you're looking to have some serious power on had for charging multiple devices or in need of power for a long time,this is it right here.
title: I have the power!

author: Harsimran B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2019
review_content: On my second Powercore 20100 and still throughly impressed at how well it charges. It's not much bigger than a cell phone ( a little taller, but not as wide) and is easily portable if needed. I did have an issue with my first Powercore 20100, but Anker sent me a new one right away as it fell under their awesome 18 month warranty. They didn't even want the old one back, so I didn't have to deal with shipping. A huge plus. I have many Anker products from the Powercore to a Nebula Mars projector, and will continue to use Anker products for a long time. Solid quality products and excellent customer service.
title: Excellent Product/Excellent Warranty/Excellent Customer Service

author: staite
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2018
review_content: This thing is awesome.  I keep it in my purse and it charges my iphone at least twice.  It can take a while to charge itself so I make sure to let it charge overnight..  I love it. I can no longer leave home without it. Charges more than one item at a time which is also a plus.  Great for a day of errands or amusement park.  Charges my phone rather quickly.
title: Awesome!

author: Eva-Lise Carlstrom
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2015
review_content: I use this charger daily because I play a power-sucking GPS-based phone game, and it serves me very well, lasting me a couple days of my heavy use, or about four days of normal phone use.  I've tried lots of other brands and other Anker models, and this is my favorite.  Fits in pocket or purse, letting you use and charge your phone simultaneously without taking up a hand.  If you're a heavy user too, get two so you can have one charging as a backup.  Be sure to get Anker-branded cables too for maximum charging efficiency.
title: The best option I've found for Ingress

author: Sherlea J. Christman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2018
review_content: I have found all anchor Chargers to be of exceptional quality and also to be extremely efficient. I'm not sure how I would keep up with my battery charging without my anchor Chargers. Of course, it is always important to use the correct connecting cord. I feel grateful for their power and for their efficiency. I own three of them, and I have given one as a gift to a friend.
title: Anker Chargers are very reliable.

author: scsimaster
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2019
review_content: From day one, I was never able to fully charge this battery. It will not charge beyond the second light charging indicator. I do not recommend this battery bank at any given price. its just a paperweight, a total waist of money.
title: Never Worked Properly

author: Chris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2018
review_content: Have it with me all the time. I rarely charge this battery since it does not runs out of battery that quick, but it does charge my battery very fast too while using my phone for work. It is a bit heavy, but that should not comes surprise for anyone or anybody matter of fact, its a perfect packet for the get go.
title: Excellent Item.

author: Justin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
review_content: I really like this power pack. Bought it for a two week trip to europe. It fit really easily into smaller pouches on my backpack or in my pocket. Had enough juice in it for about 4 full charges of my phone Galaxy s8+. Everyone in my group needed it at least once and since there are 2 USB ports we didnt need to keep passing it back and forth so our devices didnt die. It is a must have for any of my trips now. I will not travel without it even if it's just a day or so.
title: Super useful yet small charger

author: J. Cannestra
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2019
review_content: My daughter uses it for traveling.  Hold almost 7 charges on her iPhone Xs Max.  The powerpack has worked every time she has needed it.  Prepare ahead of time if you drain all of the battery, it takes a while to get a full chargeback in it.  Almost overnight needed.
title: Great Purchase

author: Biggus Diggus
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2019
review_content: Had to warranty after one of the usb internals broke. Customer service was a breeze to deal with. Had a replacement within 5 days (and this was over the holidays). Constant communication and following up during and after. It's the only reason I'm bothering to write a review as there are plenty reviews about the product already. There was a slight difference in the plastic with the replacement (which was a brand new bank, btw. Packaging, instructions, cable were all new). The new one had a slightly rougher finish to it, giving it a bit of grip. Very nice touch. Will buy again if needed.
title: Customer service is 5 star

author: Public Name
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
review_content: Used twice and now the unit stops charging my device a few seconds after connecting cable. Not a bad cable. Tested with multiple cables. Same result. Quite disappointing, considering I own many products from Anker and believe in the brand.
title: Stopped working after two uses

author: Hunter
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2019
review_content: Cannot complain about this portable charger. I’ve used other portable chargers before this one. I believe it was worth the money for how much battery it gives my phone. About 6 phones worth of battery life. I’ve traveled with it, how fast it charges my phones even with another phone is awesome. NOTE: It will charge your phone faster if you only have one plugged in the USB slot. Because it only can output so much battery into 1/2 phones. Would/have recommend(ed)
title: Amazing

author: Andrew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2019
review_content: The product is ok. However you do have to worry about the cord that you plug into it.  Sometimes it stop charging after 1 min. I have to keep pushing the button to get it to charge every min or two.  Other then that battery life is great.
title: A Good buy!

author: Javier Villanueva
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2016
review_content: I purchased this product and it worked great for the first 5 months or so and then it wouldn't hold a charge passed 1 bar.  Anker's customer service department reached out to me and sent me a brand new one at no cost.  So far I've had it for a week and it's working great.  They also mentioned that I have an 18 month warranty if anything goes wrong with it.  Now that is what I call great customer service...I highly recommend this product and this company.
title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!

author: Mary
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
review_content: This thing sucks. Heavy takes forever to charge not very many charges in it. You get what you pay for in this thing sucks buy some thing else
title: Sux

author: Nivlac S
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2016
review_content: So far I am actually amazed by this charger. I have only had to charge it twice since I have had it. I had purchased the 10,000mAh charger about a year or more ago, and was very please with it. My girlfriend liked it so much that I just needed another one. I had a relative in the hospital where we had not charger access and my entire family used this charger continually. I could not be more pleased with a product. It is simple and does what the manufacturers say it will. Thanks
title: So far I am actually amazed by this charger

author: Bhagmattie Singh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
review_content: Only owned for about a month before it stopped working properly. Cannot charge anything for more than a couple of minutes before it stops and needs to be turned on, only for the same thing to happen again, regardless of the device it is supposed to be charging. And yes, it is fully charged. Disappointed because I've heard great things about Anker products and this is my first. Unfortunately would not recommend to anyone.
title: Quick to malfunction, save your money

author: Tony Thai
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
review_content: Been using it on a  daily basis to charge my phone at work or on the go. Takes about 8 to 9 hrs charge time. On a full charge I am able to get 3.5 full charge out of Samsung S8 plus. So far no complaints, been owning it for over a year now
title: Never had a problem with Anker portable battery charger

author: Mimi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
review_content: Purchased Anker on October 18,2019 so it is relatively new. Worked great, then after two charges can not charge it again.I was expecting this charger to work longer then a couple of months. I'm hoping that someone from Anker will help with this issue
title: Anker

author: Carlos Sampson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2018
review_content: After a brief issue i had with the charging cord Julia went out of her way to take care of me including sending out a replacement that was even better than the original. On top of that she also checked up with me numerous times to make sure i was happy now with my charger and to see were there any other issues that needed to be addressed. I must say that because of Julia's customer service and level of commitment to all of their customers is why i have changed my rating to a 5 from the previous level of a 3
title: OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE

author: George
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
review_content: It's able to charge my Samsung S9+ phone 4 or 5 times before a recharge is required. I am very happy with this purchase.
title: Excellent Performance

author: Belladonna
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2017
review_content: I love this power bank so much. It charges my phone a full 3 to 4 times. Not going to lie, its a bit heavy but does the job. I always carry it in my purse and even purchased some for my boyfriend,  sister,  and mom.  I especially appreciate how fast it charges my phone - pretty much as fast as plugging it into the wall. Just keep in mind it takes around 2 days to fully charge the power bank.
title: I love this power bank so much

author: Deanne
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
review_content: Only drawback upon receiving is that it is half charged. Have to use that almost up before you can get it to fully Charge. However at half capacity it was able to provide 4 full recharges on a camping weekend for my cell phone. Would recommend to others and will be looking to purchase for several family members in the future. Great thing to have during an unexpected power outage too!
title: Awesome! Great value for price!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
review_content: Brought this because of all power outages we have in our area, this has a lot of battery power and can charge quick. great to have for traveling as well never out of power.
title: Great to have

author: Mohamed El-Turki
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2016
review_content: Firstly i'm a loyalty customer to anker for this I will not stop buying from them, i have bought one of this Anker powerbank 20000mAh, The device works really good, but when i try to charging the device it self  there's nothing happened, and the its case is too big !! Currently the machine entirely unuseless, I've already write to technical support and they send a case of the device alone, now it will automatically shipped to me in Libya by Aramex account and it cost me double the price of the device because of the shipping cost, very disappointing.EDIT : AnkerDirect Customer Service reslove the problem, thanks to them.
title: The device works really good, but when i try to charging the device ...

author: Joel Mathew
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2018
review_content: I have a book bag so its not so bad for me. This brick is bulky and so if you have a purse I would not recommend it, but more so for people who do not mind something kinda bulky and has adequate place to put it. Lasts me 4-5 charges (to 100) on my galaxy note 5 which is a pretty big battery, so iphones would get more.
title: Great for city life.

author: Wheels
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2019
review_content: We love this charger. It charges fast and will charge my car phone a few times before I have to plug it in. I even use it in the house to plug in my baby monitor when it needs charging and I’m moving around the house.
title: Great charger! I will be buying another one.

author: Analog Guy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2019
review_content: This is a fine product but I can't say much about it. I've never had much use for this or another larger capacity pack I bought. The things you find out after the fact. It seemed like I needed these - until after I bought them.
title: I wish I had something good to write about this..

author: Olaf
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2017
review_content: The Anker PowerCore is just excellent. Bought about 4 of these so far for my own use and for friends and never had a single issue with it. I always charge it up and then use it to charge my iPhone. This device is durable and has a premium look to it. I have been using it daily for over 16 months now. It's not pocket friendly (because of its weight) but gets the job done. If you need it then just buy it now. No regrets.
title: The Anker PowerCore is just excellent. Bought about 4 of these so far for ...

author: Sepi Hokafonu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2020
review_content: I've had 2 of these portable chargers for 7 months. One of them, the charging input DOES NOT WORK!!! I can't charge up this Anker. I've tried both wires. I even tried other wires I had that fit, even tho Anker recommended me not to do that..I just had to make sure. Is it because it's a Chinese product made in China?? Somebody help me out, anybody else had this problem yet??? I should've known these were made in China🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️
title: Faulty input port

author: Scott D.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2015
review_content: This is the second Anker product I have bought because I lost my first one.  I used to buy the charging cases for my phones but switched over to the external battery packs because it allowed me to keep my phone light and less bulky.Pros:- Good Battery life- I have an iPhone 6 Plus and get about 4-5 charges from this pack.- Good Design- The black matte finish provides a nice look as well as a good grip for this.-Size- This is not something I carry on me but rather with me.  It is slightly heavier than the old one I had but that was also because it had less storage capacity. For what it is and how much it does, the weight is not bad at all and it fits in my pocket with about an inch or so sticking out.- Fast Charging- This battery pack gives me the power I need.. Fast!- Two charging ports- I can charge two different items at the same time.Cons:-The only complaint, which is a small one, is the USB cord that comes with this is like a lot of other cords that with any movement.Overall, I would definitely recommend it to someone who is constantly using their phone. Don't waste time buying a car charger, just buy one of these and get more use.
title: Useful Charger

author: huffnpuff1151
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
review_content: Just exactly what we were looking for to use while traveling. This unit has charged our Blackberry, Kindle, I Phone and LG tablet. I would recommend that you also purchase the 110 outlet charger for the Anker and maybe the car lighter attachment.
title: Accurate description

author: Elaine Nola
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
review_content: I got two of them to power my two fans and my iPad and iPhone during the fires Ca had recently. Work great power up fast
title: Great powerbank

author: I. Gonza
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2016
review_content: I have grown to rely on this product more than I would have imaged. The charging rate is phenomenal and the capacity of this thing is INSANE. It chargers my iPhone 6+ in no time, at times I would rather charge it using this portable power charger instead of my normal charger just because of the speed! The battery will definitely last you a couple FULL charges of the phone. I use it to power mainly that as well as my JBL Flip 2 portable speaker as well as sharing this battery supply with my friends and family when they need it. The fact that this comes with two usb outputs is a true blessing in disguise, you never know when you need to rapidly charge two things at a time but it is definitely something to keep in mind.As for charging.. Make sure to use a rapid charging block or else it might take muuuucch longer than expected. I tend to connect it to my quick charge power block and leave it plugged in overnight. But it's a sacrifice that I am more than okay with living with since I only need to charge this thing maybe twice a month. As a college student this thing is a NECESSITY. No longer will I have to walk around scouring for a friend to let me borrow a charger when I leave mine at home, or never again will I need to wait in the airport for someone to finish using a power outlet. It gives me freedom. Oh and if you go camping EVERYONE is going to love you!
title: A college necessity

author: Ning
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
review_content: I bought this item back in May 2019.  I really loved it.  It was working fine until one night I charged it and I got the blinking blue light.  Not sure what that means but I used to see 4 steady light now, I see one steady blue light and one blinking blue light.  I really love this item from the start.  I hope Anker has an answer to this problem.  I don’t know if they'll replace mine.  I hope so.
title: Love the item

author: techhusky
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2015
review_content: I recently purchased this charger to prepare for a week long hunting trip. I read books on my Kindle HD during slow times and during the evening hours.  I use my smartphone heavily for GPS mapping, email, texting, communicating with the hunting party during the day.  I got tired of my phone and/or Kindle going dead so I decide to give this a try.  Amazingly, I was able to keep my phone and Kindle at adequate charge all week long without having to recharge the unit.  There was still one dot left of charge when I packed it up to leave.  It charges the devices blazing fast.  Much quicker even than my wall socket adapters (whatever I manage to scratched up in the house) that I typically use.  This unit will be a permanent resident of my hunting backpack.  It is quite big and a little heavy, but that makes sense given the charge time you get out of it.  It reminds me of a small laptop battery.  Oh, and the last few days of my trip the temps were around freezing and it still functioned very well.  I was worried it would be much less effective in lower temps.The only minor con I've found is that it does take a long time to recharge.  I'm perfectly OK with that though, given how well it functions when it is charged. I just got it so I can't speak for how well it will hold up over time.  I'm really impressed with it so far.
title: A new hunting buddy

author: Nicolette Valentine
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2017
review_content: These are little powerhouses. We bought one for my parents and one for my husband and I right before Hurricane Irma hit Florida where my parents live. They were able to charge both of their iPhones with it until their power came back on. They were particularly impressed at how quickly the phones charged with this device as well. I would recommend this to anyone without hesitation.
title: Perfect addition to an electronic dependent household

author: Stace
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2018
review_content: Great product that has helped me out in several unforeseen circumstances. When the battery begin losing power a year after purchase, Anker stood behind their warranty & sent a replacement immediately.  Great customer service, professional, & easy to do business with. I’d recommend them to everyone.
title: Thank you Anker for your great product & attentive customer service!

author: Andrea
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2019
review_content: After using this battery daily for over a year, it stopped accepting input charge. Anker has an 18-month warranty on these batteries. Contacted them and quickly was sent a (refurbished, like-new) replacement. Very pleased.The battery itself charges devices very quickly. I've ordered several Anker charging devices over the last year and am very pleased with them all.
title: Anker's 18 Month Warranty

author: chris busch
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2019
review_content: Anker contacted me and sent a replacement. The purchase was well beyond a reasonable return time, so they did not have to respond at all,  but good to know that they are listening and will stand behind their products...Thank you and 5 gold stars for over the top customer service!  This was my original review-  I have had several products from Anker and have always been pleased, but this one is dud.  I can only get 2 or 3 cell phone charges from the power bank.  I bought for extended trips and thought the heavier weight would equal more power capacity.  It hasn't worked out that way.
title: Update- replacement  of Low Power Life

author: VeronicaGraterol
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
review_content: It’s unbelievable how fast this charges my IPhone 8+. It takes less than 20 minutes and I’m already on 50% of battery. Even if I’m using the phone.Update April 2020:I have purchase this battery pack 4 times now, I keep recommending it to friends and family and it doesn’t disappoint.
title: Fastest

author: jennie gangi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2020
review_content: I take this charger everywhere. My battery never runs out of a charge.  Lost electricity and and my battery never ran low. I recommend this product to everyone.
title: Never loose power again.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2018
review_content: Charges your devices very fast! Comes with a cushy and soft fabric case — love this battery! Traveled with it to Alaska and was able to fully charge several iPhones on a single battery life. I never even drained it! I’m bringing to Europe with me for a trip to Paris - I’m confident it will be able to support all my devices while sightseeing.
title: Small but mighty.

author: mpg509
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2017
review_content: Great portable charger.PROS: Fast charge. I've had 3-4 full charges and it has lasted over 4 days without having to recharge it. Long lasting battery, can charge two products at once and it comes with a nice storage bag.CONS: Long and heavy - just as long as the iPhone 7. As fast it charges it also takes a long time to recharge it.Overall, greatly satisfied and suggest.
title: Charges your phone quick.

author: DONNAS
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2018
review_content: I purchased the portable charger before taking a safari trip-of-a-lifetime to Tanzania—I wanted to make sure my iPhone 6sPlus would always be charged for picture-taking. While the originally ordered unit, unfortunately, did not work (it simply wouldn’t convey the charge), the company’s customer service rep made sure I immediately received a replacement unit, which DOES work perfectly. It loads up quickly via a 5v adapter (the unit doesn’t come with this so make sure you get/or have one on hand) and easily charged up the phone. I want to emphasize the prompt and responsive communications with Anker customer service —they couldn’t have been better.
title: Excellent customer service and product

author: David Z. Fritzson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2016
review_content: A bit of background about me; I worked in tech retail for a few years and sold portable chargers when they were starting to become more popular a few years ago. It was usually brands like Mophie, and Anker was always dismissed as being "cheap" or "unreliable".Given I don't work at said place anymore, I wanted to get something like it for a five day camping trip. I previously bought a similar model from a lesser known brand for a quarter of the price of this. Lo and behold, you get what you pay for, and that one didn't even charge. I discovered it two nights before my trip, and bought this given I've heard the name Anker before. Charged it up the night before the trip, and it lasted me the entire time! It was even able to charge a few other devices (various iPhone 6/6 Plus models). It had a few close calls near water, and still performed great.Way to go Anker, thanks for making me feel way better about your line of products!
title: It was usually brands like Mophie, and Anker was always dismissed as being ...

author: Christy H.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: Huge capacity, which is perfect for families and vacations.  I recently took this on a trip to Disney World, and with 6 devices, we still brought it home at the end of the night with some charge left.  I really like how it turns on automatically when something is plugged into it; another battery I have doesn't do that, so sometimes I think it's charging when in fact it's not, as I forget to turn it on.  Works well, even when charging two devices.  No complaints whatsoever!  Awesome battery pack!
title: which is perfect for families and vacations

author: ALV
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
review_content: I have only been having this pack for a couple weeks, so maybe I should wait to write a review.. But I thought it was worth saying that I have charged my phone 3 times without EVER charging the pack itself (straight out the box) & it is still showing it has 50% of life (since straight out the box).That is pretty amazing is you ask me.
title: So worth it.

author: DC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2017
review_content: I bought this because I've heard such great podcast reviews about Anker and they had a terrific price on Amazon (which I read about on AppAdvice). I'm rating it based on packaging and shipping, because I decided to give it to my dad as a gift later this year. Shortly after this, they had another great offer for a smaller/lighter one which I purchased for myself. I took that one on a recent vacation and I'm very happy with it.
title: Would recommend!

author: kellen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2017
review_content: Love the huge capacity. It's probably too heavy for some but for me it's perfect. Use it on the golf course all the time for my GPS app and picture/video taking. I have no issue putting this in my golf bag while carrying my bag for the entire round. Also used this in a drawstring backpack during the Mardi Gras Parades in New Orleans. Phone lasted all day and helped charged a few strangers phones as well. Can't fit in your pocket but that's not what I wanted out of it. I wanted something that wouldn't have to be charged all of the time.
title: Great Charger - Recharge once a week not daily

author: Cat H
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2018
review_content: I bought this as a gift for my 11 yr old son in Nov. 2017. He uses it all the time and it works great.Last week it stopped charging up (1 blue dot would remain lit and a second blue dot would flash but the battery wouldn’t charge up)I went to the Anker website and filled out a simple form (my info and description of problem)and included a screenshot of my amazon invoice which I retrieved from my amazon acct history.The next day I received an email from Anker saying they would send me a replacement and I got the replacement in the mail 3 days later.Thanks for the awesome hassle free customer service!  New battery works perfectly!
title: Great customer service!

author: Chris Channell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019
review_content: Charges devices quickly, holds a charge well, and recharges quickly.  Very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend.  Still working great and have been using it on a regular basis for probably about a year.
title: Great Battery

author: Linda Rose
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2017
review_content: Gave this as a gift to my daughter who has an older iPhone that needs charging more often. She took it with her on a trip to the west coast. She and her friend were out and about playing Pokémon and they both used it to charge their phones. She loves it and after using it a number of times it still had a lot of charge left in it. She is very pleased with it and apparently I made the correct choice when purchasing it for her.
title: Great product!

author: Judy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
review_content: Bought it April 15th 2020. This is September and it will not charge past the 2 blue lights. I would not purchase this again.
title: Did not hold up well.

author: Jason
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2020
review_content: We bought this for a recent camping grip.  Was able to charge 2 phones as well as 2 bluetooth headbands over a 3 day period with no issues.  Still has a 50% charge left!
title: Great charger

author: Jane DeVor
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2018
review_content: I've purchased two Anker portable chargers. One has worked perfectly, but the second one started giving me trouble after about six months. I contacted Anker and their support team asked a few questions to clarify the problem I was having. Within two days they sent out a new charger...no problem. I can't believe how amazing the support team was. I won't hesitate to purchase more of these chargers...especially with hurricane season quickly approaching. Thank you, Anker!
title: Wonderful customer service!

author: Jordan Rosenthal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2015
review_content: This product has not to many cons and not enough prosPros- Long lasting- ports are labeled- inexpensive for charging capabilityCons- Does not charge when charging itself- only has USB charging(not through wall outlet) which is very slow- USB charging cable is short and doesn't come with wall adapter- a little heavy(but all charging battery's this size may have same problem)overall I returned this product after a week of using it cause you cannot charge your phone when charging the battery but it is worth the price if you can get pass this lack of featureAfter I submitted review I was contact by Anker Customer support and the offered to give a replacement battery because of this issuehttp://www.amazon.com/Anker-20000mAh-Aluminum-Multi-Voltage-Technology/dp/B005NGLTZQ/I have received the battery and it it is great, exactly the functionality I was looking for, it charges quickly, has 3 ports not 2, with 9v & 12 v option, plus I can charge my phone while its charging. Anker customer service is first class, so if you are unsure if the product will work for you, have no fear they will make sure you are satisfied with your purchase
title: Good Price but Bad Functionality

author: Justin Gallo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2016
review_content: I originally ordered this battery as a backup for concerts and the like, where I would be out for an entire day away from easily-accessible outlets. This battery has served me well, and will charge my phone (iPhone 7+) seven or eight times. Something that was not anticipated was the size of this battery, although it can be easily worked around. The battery is slightly longer than my phone, although it is fairly thick in comparison. It is also fairly heavy. Regardless, I can still carry it in a front pocket fairly-comfortably, although I typically leave it in my backpack and run the cable out the side to my phone in my pocket.The only downside I would note about this device is that it takes forever to charge. I can plug this in at night, and in the morning, it will be about half charged (two LEDs lit). A full charge typically takes close to 24 hours in my experience. However, this is still a massive battery, and even a 50% charge should be enough to get the average user through a few days.
title: Massive battery, but gets its job done very well.

author: alice horst
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2019
review_content: Can I use my APPLE cords that I charge my computer/Iphone/IPAD with this 20100?I like the reviews but don't know what cord to attach to my APPLE products.I don't know about battery life because I can not use it yet.My first mobile power bank had cord with it to charge my APPLE products.HELP, I need an answer as I am going to be traveling soon and need to be able to use it.Aliceahorst@comcast.net
title: I bought this but don't know how to charge my IPAD?

author: Eric Y
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2018
review_content: Solid product that can hold a charge for several devices at once. Charging the battery can take awhile but it's worth it when you're in a pinch and need power. You can also recharge multiple devices at the same time which is nice. I would purchase this product again if given the opportunity
title: Anker PowerCore is a solid product.

author: Chimi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2018
review_content: This was a gift.  I had no idea how much I would use this until I had it.  You can’t go wrong with anger products.  Spend a little extra and get this quality unit not those cheap power banks that promise big things and don’t deliver.  I wish I had another one because everyone at home uses it so often.  Anker please send me my own so I can enjoy more often 👍
title: Anker please send me my own so I can enjoy more often 👍

author: Sean Walsh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2017
review_content: Really great battery pack, takes a while to charge, so do it overnight.  I’ve had this for over a year now and it is by far the best battery pack I’ve had.  It has enough juice to charge my iPhone 5-7 times on a full charge.  My only complaint is that one of the charging ports only works part of the time, but that was after about 6 months of use.  The other port still works fine.  Other than that, it is super durable.  It’s survived a few drops now (the charging port issue might’ve come from this).  Would definitely recommend this as a gift for anyone, especially if you need your phone for a while and won’t be able to get to an outlet for a couple days.
title: Review after a year of use

author: Madde623
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
review_content: This is my second one that I ordered.  We have a second home and I need a charger while we are there and this works beautifully and stays charged for a long time.
title: Great charger

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2019
review_content: Like the blue lights on the PowerCore - lets you know how much battery life is remaining (25%, 50%, 100%).Like that I could charge 2 cell phones at once and in about the same amount of time it takes to charge when plugged into a D/C outlet at home.
title: Great battery life, great for charging 2 items at once

author: clifton harris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2017
review_content: I purchase this battery, the advertisement for this battery did not state that I needed a Anker charger. But I just happened to have one used it to charge this battery the battery will never fully charged. The battery has four bars indicating a full charge no matter how long I charge I can never get more than 3 bars
title: Battery won't fully charge

author: Argue
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2018
review_content: Constantly forced to unplug and replug my cables. It randomly stops charging. It great when it works right. Which is 3 out 10 try’s.

author: onefastricerocket
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2017
review_content: this charger can charge my phone from 0% to 100% SIX TIMES before I need to recharge it (I have an iPhone 6).  I love it!  Its heavy, so for those of you who are looking for something lightweight this is not for you.  Too big to fit in your pocket, i keep it in my backpack all the time and just run the cord out to my phone.  I would recommend this to everyone...  My wife has one also she keeps it in her purse.
title: Awesome!

author: Kory W.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2017
review_content: I have two of these batteries. Good news, One of them is still working great! Bad news, the other has had an issue with the charging port. I have had to always adjust the charging cord just right for it to charge. I should have sent it back and had it replaced when I got it but didn’t get around to it.. I primarliy only use them when i go on my hunring trips so I forget about them and in turn forgot to have it replaced under warranty.. When I can get the battery to charge it has worked great along with the one that has always worked.. Overall, I think it is a decent quality product. Just the nature of electronics to have a defective charging port sometimes.. Would have given 5 stars for the one that works and 1 star for the defective one but a drag to have a faulty unit so averaged two stars...
title: Defective charging port :(

author: Maeve Robinson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2017
review_content: Anker's customer service is amazing! I stated in a previous review about how I accidentally purchased a larger Anker Portable Charger when I meant to purchase a smaller one since I had lost mine. I got an email within a few hours offering me a smaller charger for free. I was able to locate my smaller charger, so receiving a smaller one was no longer an issue, and I decided to keep the larger one based on good reviews. Even then, I was given a 20% refund and am extremely grateful. Thank you for the excellent customer service, Anker! I look forward to trying your product.
title: I am hoping this charger works better than my previous one since my smaller one died ...

author: Brett
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020
review_content: This is one of the best Chargers I’ve ever owned. The only problem is it’s exceptionally bulky for its capacity. It does charge very fast.

author: A. Goon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
review_content: Great while it lasted. Now it has trouble charging itself, and charging my phone. Now my phone asks whether it should be charging the connected device, or whether the connected device should be charging my phone, and it never used to do that. Now I can't even figure out how to charge the battery itself.

author: Alejandra Machiwalla
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2019
review_content: UPDATE: The company reached out to me and told me they would resolve my issue. They sent me a new charger and it works great. Super annoying, I had to pay attention to my phone everytime it would stop charging and I would have to push the button for it to start again. I was so excited about the product since it had such great reviews but after using it i am so disappointed.

author: Syl
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
review_content: Never let it get totally empty it takes too long to charge I like that you can charge two devices at one time but it’s so big, battery last a long time

author: Jane
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020

author: Harlygrl
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2019

author: Jim Goldschmidt
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2018
review_content: ANKER delivers again with high quality at a competitively low price. I like the large capacity, which is more than enough to charge two android smart phones at the same time. author: Albert Ansiso
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2016
review_content: I purchased this item on cyber Monday and was excited considering I'm on the road hours at a time and needed another battery source for my galaxy,  the portable pack would constantly switch from on and off with the cord provided when I attempted to charge my phone. I thought maybe it was just the cord, I tried with my actual samsung cord, and same thing. I literally have to ensure it is charging and not even touch my device or it will stop charging. And no it isn't my device my device charges flawlessly with a wall outlet.
title: Great mAH but actual device isnt great.

author: Ritu Gupta
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
review_content: This worked for a few weeks and then crapped out. I didn't drop it or get it wet. Just died all of a sudden, right after the return window closed. I am EXTREMELY disappointed in the product and the seller, who seems to know about this according to older reviews. I still want a refund for selling an absolute lemon of a product.
title: Do not buy!!!

author: FitConvert
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2017
review_content: How have I travelled all of these years without a portable charger! This charger saves you from the headaches of tracking down outlets, fighting for outlets at airports, and fear of 0% battery life on your phone, tablet,etc. Amazed at how fast it charges and the number of charges you get from it. Will never travel without it. It's small, lightweight, and reliable. Will buy again
title: Amazed at how fast it charges and the number of ...

author: Charles Edward Harrington
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2018
review_content: I absolutely love this product! I use it when I am camping!I can charge my iphone from completely dead to 100% charge about 8 times on one chage with the Anker. The Anker also charge my phone faster than just plugging into an outlet.Also great to have in case you lost electricity due to bad weather.
title: Great product!

author: Chad
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2020
review_content: Bought two of these before living in rural Ghana for 1 year. Due to temperamental electricity access, having big battery packs was essential. It also provided me with a safe way to charge my phone instead of plugging it directly into the wall socket which had precarious voltage fluctuations. 2.5 years later, they still hold an incredible amount of charge despite all of the abuse (not to mention the 90F average temp they endured daily).
title: bulletproof and resilient

author: Alexus T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2018
review_content: This is the third portable charger I bought. The other two were not as good of quality as this one. Hands down. I cannot even express how awesome it is. The battery life far exceeds what I expected and it's still small enough to stow away in a bag or backpack while charging at the same time. I love that it came with a little carrying pouch to keep it safe. I have found myself putting it in my back pocket while walking around outside to charge quite a few different devices. And the 18 month warranty? No complaints here. :)
title: Durable and Long Battery Life

author: William
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
review_content: So I received the Anker 20100mAh power bank, charged it all the way up to four bars, and plugged it into my iPhone 6s plus only to see it charge from 5% to 90% and stop charging.  At first I thought it was the cord so I tried several different other cables only to have the same result. Tried a iPhone 8 as well and it quit charging around 95%. Sent the original Power Bank back and Anker sent me a replacement which did the same thing. I would not recommend purchasing one of these power banks until Anker gets their charging flaws worked out with the Newer versions.
title: BEWARE --- Turns itself off -- Don' t waste your money

author: Jane
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2018
review_content: It seems to work very well.  It took about 20 hours to charge it on a "regular" charger when I first got it and it had two lights.  I used it to charge my iPhone and tablet and got three charges on the iPhone and one tablet charge before it was one light.  I'll find out about TSA next week but it shouldn't be a problem.
title: Nice

author: Reviewer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
review_content: I am in emergency management and bought this prior to and in anticipation of Hurricane Florence, and the potential for power outages. It comes with a handy, mesh carrying case and has charged my IPhone 8 at least 4 times without needing to be charged again (I believe it can charge up to 8 times).Only downside is it is very heavy so be prepared for that part. Otherwise, it serves its purpose well and I would highly recommend it.
title: Heavy duty charger

author: Shay Cruz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
review_content: LOVE this port. Completely well worth your money to buy. Unlike other charging ports this batterie lasts for days. Live saver. Only bad thing I can say is that it takes a while to get the unit charged but when it finally is it lasts for DAYS. Speed charging too.
title: Amazing buy. WORTH THE MONEY.

author: ML1980
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2016
review_content: Worked well the first couple times i used but then it stopped charging. I charged it pretty much all day today and it only was lit with one bar, wth?! Not sure whats wrong with it, i just got it last month, ughh**UPDATE** after a few days from my review, Anker got in touch with me regarding my problem- they sent me a replacement right away and the new one has been working great!! Excellent customer service! I'd highly recommend this product :)

author: SampleSS3
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2019
review_content: A little bulky but overall has good battery capacity and charges devices quickly. Only (major) issue is that the battery takes FOREVER to be recharged. I’ve tries different cords and adapters, but no improvement. I’ve literally had it on the charge for 36 hrs and it still seem to only get up to 3/4 charge in that time. I’d you need a workhorse charger where you need it to fully charge overnight, look elsewhere.
title: Lots of capacity, but very slow to recharge.

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2018
review_content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.           I like having a charger that can charge my iPhone to 100% quick. Thanks Amazon/Anker 👍🏾

author: sicklink
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2018
review_content: This is a really great battery pack.  Definitely one of those devices that you don't know you need until you get one and realize how much you can use it.  I am an IT guy so I tend to carry a lot of rechargeable devices.  I tend to use it a lot more than I expected, to recharge my phones, flashlight, headphones without going to another room where all my chargers are plugged in.
title: This is a really great battery pack

author: AskTheNanny
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: I got sick and tired of drained batteries and no available plug, so I got this on Black Friday for myself. It is SO nice to be able to charge devices anywhere with no issue . Bought the dual socket charging plug to go with this. You just have to give it a good while to recharge, overnight is ideal. Its heavier than I thought it would be,  but comes with a mesh bag for it and a charger cord which all slips right in my purse Anker has the BEST stuff, never bothering with another brand again
