author: Ben Lemco
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2016
review_content: Don't think about it and just buy this already. I bought the amazon one for $20, it stopped working after a month. This one lasts ferdayz and has worked great for 6 months with very heavy use. I use this instead of plugging my phone into the wall. It's just so easy to throw this on the couch next to you or pick it up and walk around the house while still charging your phone. It's a little heavy but yolo. Anyway, g2g ttyl lylas!
title: This one lasts ferdayz and has worked great for 6 months with very heavy use

author: Terri A. Moon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: So far I'm loving my charger, it fast charges my phone much better then a car outlet and my other portable bank that doesn't hold as much energy. It's sleek looking and comes with a pouch bag to protect it from being scuffed up in my sling bag!  Having such strong large holding power bank on the go is a must for anyone going to conventions no need to wait in the room or hunt out a power outlet, as well you may ending up being a hero to a friend with a dead/near dead cellphone!!!  Also the price is great for all your getting with its, not to mention you can charge two things at once.
title: Great fast charging laege energy holding portable power bank, never leave home with out it!

author: Evan Lawyer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2017
review_content: I bought mine in November of 2016. I've used and abused it on many vacations. This thing is a life saver when travelling. I have never had a single issue getting it through airport security, and it has reliably been able to store ~4-5 charges for my phone. I'm writing this at the end of 2019 because I see it's currently on sale for the holidays, but I am happy to report I don't need to purchase another one. I haven't used it as much this year, but recently found it after not using it for 6 months... Still had about 80% charge despite being left in the console of my car. I used it to keep my phone charged while I drove 12 hours. I would buy this again in a heartbeat if mine broke.
title: Best portable charger on the market. Used mine for over 2 years.

author: Sumaira Zareef
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2018
review_content: Bought it in July 2017 for travel. It easily gives 4+ full charges for my Google Pixel. It supports rapid charging of upto two devices.UPDATE: In January 2018, one of the charge indicator LEDs malfunctioned. The unit still works fine. But since Anker provides 18 month warranty, I was shipped a replacement as soon as I report it to them. And today (just after 3 days) I already have the replacement. During all this process their personnel were very professional in handling the case.I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable power pack -- it is absolutely worth the money. PLUS, I am super impressed by the customer service I received from Anker Direct.
title: Great product, excellent customer service

author: solardude
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2015
review_content: Strong performance. I have several Anker products bought over many years. They don't break, are reliable and feel solid build. I also take one with me everywhere including overseas, the beach and test them with various portable  solar panels. They just work. This one is to replace my old workhorse Anker 10000 9/12v/USB power bank that's still going strong after 4 years of daily use.  It feels a little heavy but not too much. It holds up well to testing with various windows phones a tablets.
title: Good product!

author: hani
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
review_content: I bought this product because I liked other baker products that I have purchased. However this device didn’t last more than a year. I bought the second one and it’s  the same thing. This was compared to a free product that was gifted from a car dealership.
title: Quality

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2018
review_content: I bought this 05/17. Now it no longer holds a charge 1.5 years later.  It worked fine while it lasted but no longer.Update. Their customer service is awesome. They replaced the battery that failed on me. I still worry about the long term quality but they did stand by their product. We’ll see what happens. Last one lasted 15 months. Let’s see how long the warranty replacement lasts.
title: Only last 1.5 years

author: Jonah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2019
review_content: I have the Google Pixel 2, this battery easily holds about 6 full charges for my phone. I like the simplified 4 pips that show charge level and has become a standard for in the car, office or camping to ensure I will have a phone charge in emergencies.
title: It Just Keeps Charging, and Charging, and Charging...

author: autofocus
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2018
review_content: I've had wonderful success with anything Anker!!  Lightning cords, powered chargers and portable battery chargers have all been top notch. This company has a great reputation and I understand why. I look for their name when purchasing any charging accessories for my iPhone.
title: You can always count on Anker products!

author: Jeremy Zaucha
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2017
review_content: Updated 12/17I have 2 and gave 2 as gifts last xmas. Both mine and my wife's batteries have now failed after exactly one year. It wont charge her iphone at all, and my galaxy s8 says slow charging but doesnt seem to charge at all.Update 1/18Anker support was extremely helpful and remedied the issue fully.  Excellent customer service!
title: Excellent customer service

author: Justin G
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
review_content: This portable charger is the best I have ever bought! Battery life is awesome, came with carrying case and charging cable and is an absolute beast of a portable charger. Charges my iPhone 8 + crazy fast and I highly recommend. Great job Anker! Another fantastic product!!!
title: Absolutely Awesome.

author: Jose Guadarrama
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2018
review_content: Ankers service was great, lluvia helped out a lot when i had a problem with my first one. Wasn't charging phone any more,it was just holing charge as long as phone or device being charged was not used. They send me a couple of email with questions just to make sure that the charger was the problem. Once confirmed they sent me one ASAP and they even checked in to make sure i got it and was happy with it, i'm already putting in my order for 2 long charging cords since i'm buying a Van and the distance from cigarette lighter to cell phone holder.
title: LOVE IT

author: Pugfugly
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2016
review_content: So far so good. This charges my phone very quickly and certainly has enough juice for several phone and ipad charges.Works great for travel as I just set in on the nightstand and charge my phone and my wife's phone simultaneously overnight rather than digging around behind beds to find outlets. The internal circuitry prevents overcharging so I don't have to keep an eye on it. Its not too bulky either and comes with a little pouch for storage. Make sure you have a 2-amp usb plug so you can charge the battery quickly in the outlet. I can't speak to the durability yet as I've only had it a week or so but i'm very happy so far.
title: Great for travel

author: Charlie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2019
review_content: Two weeks into owning it my wife said it doesn’t stay on. So I tried it and it would initially connect and charge but after a bit it turns off and I have to hit the button again. My first Anker FAIL.
verified: Test it cause it might fail

author: Justen Martian
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2017
review_content: Here’s what makes the Anker PowerCore 20100 brilliant and an essential for your Disneyland vacation:Two USB ports allowing for two devices to be charging at once (if you have more than one Twitter user with you, you’ll thank me later).It’s the size of a pocketbook, so it will fit easily inside of a purse or backpack.Charges a dead phone up to 7 times to 100% depending on your device(does not recharge humans, that’s what Dole Whips are for).You’ll find that everyone wants to stand in line with you.There are very few outlets at Disneyland (and even if you found one, who would want to wait and pay all that money for their phone to charge?).This will increase your Snapchat score because you can snap people all day.
title: Here’s what makes the Anker PowerCore 20100 brilliant and an essential for your Disneyland vacation

author: CMK
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2019
review_content: Worked great for 5months now it does not charge phone or iPad. Very disappointing.it says it has full charge but does not work .
title: Worked for 5 months

author: Steve Oh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2019
review_content: I purchased this for my upcoming travel in Europe and I think this will free me from the low-battery stress! I really like the design and if you like the simple design like me you’ love it! Also it is highly portable since it fits right in my hand. However it could be a little heavy but that is inevitable since it is 20100mAh!The cover case is also of good quality and it fits perfectly with the power bank!Add it to your cart right now!
title: Great purchase and is highly portable

author: Leigh O'Brien
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020
review_content: Bought this charger back in April. This was the second Anker charger that I purchased. The first one got wet and stopped working. Bought this one to replace that. Worked at first but stopped working out of nowhere. Contacted Anker and I received a quick response and a replacement charger. Has worked perfect since I received it.Would recommend this product.
title: Purchased had an issue. Returned and works like a charm.

author: Michael
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2018
review_content: This is not a fast charging device.  Battery life is great, but charges slowlyafter posting a 3, anker contacted me about the device I purchased.  they pointed out that the device was not a QC, or quick charge device.  While disappointed that the description said it was for fast charging, it also clearly stated, later, that it was not QC compatible.Anker provided me with different a 20kmA, QC device, and i must say i am very pleased.  it holds a charge, and charges my phone/tablet very quickly.  While I am satisfied with the new device, I am blown away by the customer service.  For Anker to reach out on a 3 star review, look into it and replace my device...  Stunning.  thank you!
title: Anker solves a problem

author: E. M. Fueyo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2017
review_content: When it comes to a phone accessory, cable, charger, battery backup, Anker is the only brand one needs to remember. This particular item was amazing. Charged it as my main backup while on a family trip to London thinking that the whole family could use it (cell phones drain quickly when using for maps, Uber, subway info, etc). As it turns out I was the primary user and it wasted the entire week on 1 charge. Used daily though not always for a full charge. Regardless, it more than beat my expectations. Just got a USB MagSafe cord and look forward to seeing how well that works. Anker is the best.
title: This particular item was amazing. Charged it as my main backup while on ...

author: Birdatemyface
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2020
review_content: I really love this portable however it is little heavy to carry in your pocket. But it lasts longer! I’d say this is worth it if you want something longer and powerful.
title: Little heavy but super strong and able to charge fast.

author: Brian
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2017
review_content: I've been using this more and more as I travel for work, and it holds quite a bit of charge!  I have both my personal phone and work phone with me, and have been able to keep them both at a good level of charge throughout the day.  While I haven't had to do a full charge of my phone with this, I've been using it over the last week and a half through the day and I still have half of it's capacity left, from when it was charged about a month ago.
title: Holds quite a bit of charge, works as expected

author: Jackson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2019
review_content: I power my midi controllers with this for wireless keyboard performance! This is the battery charger for that!Can power 2 midi controllers simultaneously and works for hours, have never run out of power at 8 hours of playing.
title: Amazing!

author: T. Davis
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2018
review_content: This charger lasted me almost a week without needing to recharge it. I love it and bring it everywhere with me if I know I am going to be gone for long. Even if I don't use it for awhile I still get a full charge. One of my favorite purchases ever. Also like how I can use it for multiple devices.
title: Charges fast, long lasting charge

author: Tom
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2016
review_content: It arrived with a 75% charge on it. Built in meter that only comes on when you push the button or are using it. I charged it overnight. Have run USB heated gloves and a small USB hand warmer for less than 30min charged a Samsung S4 twice from less than 20% to full. Anker still reading 100% battery life. I would definately use the USB cord that comes with it for charging, it seems to be a bit heavier gauge wire and still got warmer than expected. Not hot, I could hold it in my hand.  Still for the capacity and convenience of using a standard USB charger. I don't think they could get it to charge any faster, without giving up the USB style charging, which in my opinion is what makes it so great. Charge it in the car, at the house or at work. Great so far...
title: Great so far... I would expect this unit to have to charge overnight. It's a lot of power to store.

author: April
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2016
review_content: I'm impressed at that quality of this product. Even the packaging impressed me with its quality. Anker truly takes pride in their products. I bought this to replace my previous portable charger. I had an energizer which I believe 4,000 mAh, so this is quite an upgrade for me. This one was also cheaper. Super glad I bought it. I also bought the 6 ft micro usb from anker to substitute the no so lengthy one that comes with it.
title: Impressed even before I opened it.

author: micfen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2017
review_content: I LOVE this charger. If the phone is off I can charge my iPhone 7 4+ full times before recharging this battery, fewer times if I'm using it while it charges. Bought a mophie flexible charging cord to easily connect. It's a little longer and thicker than my phone but it is narrower. I can comfortably hold the charger and phone together while charging and it fits easily in a smallish/medium sized purse.
title: I LOVE this charger

author: C. Norris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2019
review_content: Great accessory for international travel. Quick charge. Ready backup. A bit heavy so watch your toes.
title: Super charge

author: Dru
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2016
review_content: This is the best charger I have owned thus far. I have used it for cross country road trips as a passenger in a car that's interior usb charger doesn't work very well. I can keep my phone charged while using it with battery draining apps for 10+ hours and it still has more battery to go. It is heavy, so carrying it in one's purse will weigh you down. I have a Samsung S4. It's the perfect backup for travel situations. I haven't tried it with multiple devices charging yet.
title: Works well for travel

author: TomMan67
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2016
review_content: Very good battery for the price. Will charge my Galaxy Note 4 about 5 to 6 times to full on a single charge. It doesn't take long for it to charge my phone to full. The only problem with this battery is that it takes forever to recharge it to full. Takes more than a day when using the Samsung Note 4 charger to charge it. That's my only reason for giving it 4 stars. Everything else is really good. Pouch and micro usb is include which is really useful.
title: Very good battery for the price

author: James
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
review_content: This product is either faulty or fake. It charges my iphone XR only four times. From the very beginning the battery capacity seems to be about half of what is advertised. I previously had the 10,000 aMH version and it was about the same. This was supposed to be twice as large of a battery but obviously there is some kind of issue. Will be returning unfortunately.
title: Does not work as advertised.

author: Er Gu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
review_content: this is the only battery i have ever bought, but i feel like i was born to buy it. it has a lot of charge. because of that, it takes a while to charge from medium or low charge, but why are you in such a hurry. take a breath (or a hundred) and let this thing charge up in its own time. you won't regret it.
title: best battery i have ever boughten

author: Bradford
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
review_content: I bought this pack new and used it once after I was able to charge it.  Now every item I've plugged into to re-charge the pack has failed. It has been on some chargers 8 hours and not gone up 1 light bar.  4 hours in a computer and same thing.  Its extremely frustrating and feels like a giant waste of money.The company needs to issue the proper plug system to re-charge it. NOT simply just a cord with the pack.
title: pack charging

author: Lcayabs
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2019
review_content: I Order 2 Battery Charger, That I’m gonna send it Back Home in My Country, That Saturday Delivery was Perfect But @ the Time i Open it 1 of the Charger cord was Missing, so I have to get one that I already Have Just to cover the missing Cord, I was , this appointed, First Time it Happen to all my Order.
title: Missing Charging Cord.

author: Akay
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
review_content: Stopped working just after the return window closed. Charges for 2-4 minutes and then stops. Tried both charging ports on multiple devices but all had the same failed outcome. See attached photographs. Hard to understand how this product got the “Amazon’s Choice” designation. Anker products are usually of good quality but this one is a disappointment!
title: Failed within weeks of use!

author: Kindle Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2018
review_content: I finally broke down and bought this battery. It was definitely worth every penny I can charge my phone and my iPad and this battery charges both of them and the battery itself last for days without being recharged. I'm going to order two more for Christmas to put in each of my sons stockings.
title: Awesome battery

author: Reader
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2020
review_content: Love the portability! I get about 4 complete charges on my IPhone 7. The only thing I dislike is it takes about 12 hours to charge (from zero to 100 percent. Plan on charging overnight!

author: L. Moreno
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: I love these charges from Anker. I'm not sure the total number of recharges I can have on my iphone 6 because I normally recharge this battery before it drains, but I already used to charge 4 times, at least. The charge is done really fast also... I fell like it's faster than the charger that comes with the phone... but this may be just my impression.This is my 3rd charger. The other two were so popular with friends and family that I "had" to give them to relatives.

author: Daniel Alexander Velasco Moreno
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2020
review_content: My friend was disappointed with this gift. The next day she admitted she uses it all the time, and so does the rest of her family. Now they all want one. Incredibly practical, useful, reliable.

author: Joseph
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2019
review_content: I received this product and expected average performance regarding it, After fully charging it overnight it has charged my Note5, 6 times, my turtle beach headphones 2 times, and a bluetooth speaker 2 times. It is impressive how much battery capacity is in this thing! (on 1 charge)IMPORTANT, you MUST use the cable provided with the unit or it will not charge your device.

author: Rich
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2018
review_content: But seriously, this thing can hold so much charge. I've lost count of how many times it can charge my phone before I need to recharge it again. I've now picked up a few of these on deals and spread them all over the place for whenever I need an emergency charge. Keep one in my bag, one in the car, one at the office. They're great!

author: ADD
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2019
review_content: I bought this with the idea in mind to keep my phone charged while still being mobile and not anchored to a wall for a convention. It worked great. Very beefy design, it comes with a nice little sleeve to somewhat protect it from scratches. I highly recommend buying the accompanying wall charger too. Amazing product, would recommend.

author: Saffire Dragon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2019
review_content: This charges everything I plug into it faster than any other I've used. Also, it holds more charge so I can charge things multiple times off of it where other chargers recharged things only once.

author: fawnskin mudpuppy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2017
review_content: I bought this device for a six week trip to Europe that we took in the fall. With multiple iPads and iPhones and work to be done while on our vacation we needed a back up for airplanes and hotels. This little jewel was perfect. It has a long life, good output,  and great results for us.  We keep it plugged in at the house also as a back up when we forget to charge our devices,  hanging outside or on errands.I highly recommend it.

author: Natasha
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
review_content: Battery life is amazing !!!! I took it with me on my international flight and it lasted two days until I had to charge it again. Light enough to fit in a purse or small bag if needed to.

author: Power lifter
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
review_content: Charger worked great for the first 30 days , now will only charge to 75%.Not sure this was worth the price.

author: One Savvy Shopper :)
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2019
review_content: You NEED this!!! Stop getting the little chargers that only do 1 charge and then you have to charge your charger for another 8 hours! Just to only have 1 charge for your phone. This Anker Charger lasts me soooo long before I have to charge again!!! It has come in handy so much!!!
title: GET THIS!!!

author: Lawrence Bustos
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
review_content: Product worked great for about a month and now it won’t take a full charge after being plugged in for @ 8 hrs. Only the second blue light blinks. Contacted Anker and the graciously and rapidly sent me out a replacement without hesitation. Excellent customer service from Anker. Thank you
title: Fantastic Customer Service by Anker

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2018
review_content: The Anker PowerCore 20100mAh has saved me quite a few times over the months I've had and used it. 4.8A is enough to charge my iPad at the same time as it powers my Stratux (a device for use in small aircraft), and the 20100mAh capacity means it can do so for over 4 hours. Today I charged it for the first time in at least a month or two, and it was still at over 50% capacity. I carry it in my bag at all times, and I haven't had to worry about my phone's charge level since I bought it. I really can't recommend this enough, and if you haven't already bought one, it's well worth the money.
title: More power than I'll ever need

author: mirza
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2019
review_content: Hight build quality.Bit heavy but it's normal for 20 000mah :Dcharging time is longer than i expected.I used regular Samsung fast charger for it but adapter is heating up after 2 hours so i'm disconnecting and reconnecting it  few times before full charge.
title: Cheap and good quality

author: Retired
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2017
review_content: I was given an Anker 20000mAh Portable Charger as a gift
title: it came in very handy after Hurricane Irma hit. Since then I have been given an addtl Anker and purchased another. They're excellent and have been a life saver. I recommend them highly and other family members have purchased it based on my recommendations and their seeing the performance. GREAT product.

author: arog
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2018
review_content: Update - The company was great about sending me a new charger and following up to see how it was working.  The new device works well and the customer service was great.  I appreciate them working with me on the issue.Doesn't really charge my galaxy phone.  It would take 4+ hours to charge it.  The best I can hope for is for it to maintain the charge it has.

author: Daniel Plaza
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2016
review_content: I purchased this battery charger pack to replace an older version I had from Anker. The older one stopped working and I immediately contacted Anker customer support. They got me a quick refund and I instantly purchased another one of their portable battery packs. It holds a pretty long charge and I can use it multiple times to charge my phone and tablet which is great when I'm on the road. Definitely recommend anything with the Anker brand name on it.
title: It holds a pretty long charge and I can use it multiple times ...

author: M. Pearson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
review_content: Heard these were good, but that was wrong. It’s simply a defective  product and a waste of money. It would stop charging the phone after a few minutes - even with a new cord. Read online about others having this same problem. Contacted Anker customer service and they wouldn’t replace it since I bought it on Amazon and not purchased directly from them. Talk about a great “warranty.”’ Now I have a nice new paper weight. Avoid this company and product.
title: Defective as a charger- nice as a paperweight. Avoid!

author: cheli
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2018
review_content: Aug.29, 2018 This product arrived super fast (3days) for normal shipping so I was happy to be able to take it for my camping trip the next day. The packaging was nice and clean 👌it already came with 50% charge. The device has a matte feel that is nice and doesn't feel slippery while holding. I also ordered an anker usb-c charger cable for my phone and wall plug (does not come with) to keep the brand consistent for better use/charge. So far it's worked great and charge it during the night if it was in use so not sure bout the charge time when it's at 0%. It fully charged my phone under 2hrs while being used.
title: So far so goooood

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2019
review_content: I bought this specific charger because it was recommended by my cousin. I think mine is defective because even though it is full of charge, I have to be on my phone to charge my device. If I put my phone down, the charging stops. It’s driving me crazy! I also have to put my screen turn on in order for it to charge!!
title: Doesn’t charge

author: Carmalita T.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2019
review_content: Anker chargers are the best! Don’t waste your money on any other brand. Everyone in my house has some model of Anker charger. We are all happy with the chargers and rarely leave home without them.  We are free from searching for a wall plug everywhere we go. The customer service from Anker is AMAZING!!! I had an issue with one of our chargers and contacted Anker. They responded very quickly and addressed my issue without delay. I am a loyal Anker customer and highly recommend their products!

author: Margie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2019
review_content: I keep this on my desk at work, it goes nowhere else! It started bulging on back, and in the same day it cracked. Of course it's outside the return window.

author: michael willis
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
review_content: I’ve bought both the 13k and this one and I love them. Whenever my phone is dead I can always count on this to fully charge it even quicker than my wall. I only have to charge the battery bank every few weeks and although it takes up to 6 hours to charge I get up to 5-8 full charges of my iPhone 11
title: Won’t buy from another brand again

author: Atif Hussain
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
review_content: little heavy so it could get a little too much if you're walking and carrying it for a long time.it takes a while to charge it up to full capacity when totally drained.  I  liked the product design. But this power bank charges super slow
title: Using this Power Bank since May 2019

author: Chelsea Davis
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2018
review_content: I rarely write reviews, but I have to for this. 3 months ago, I bought this for a week long trip to France. I fully charged it before I left, used it every day to keep my phone charged because it's all I brought to take pictures. I dont recall recharging it on my trip at all. Tonight, I realized I forgot my phone charger at work. Since my phone is my alarm, I started panicking a bit. Then I remembered this power bank. I want hopeful since it has been 3 solid months since I've used it. It still has 50% power!! What?! Now my phone is charging and I'm congratulating myself on money well spent. It's a bit heavy if that's your concern, but I carried it around Paris for a week and have no complaints.
title: Holds Charge for a LONG Time!

author: Phoebejean
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
review_content: My son had this and I saw how quickly it charged his devices. Charge your brick every night and it is good to go all day long!!!
title: portable charger

author: PM
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2018
review_content: This power pack is the third Anker product I've purchased, and it absolutely delivered. I ordered this product more than a year ago to keep in my "go bag" for emergencies. Fortunately, I hadn't need it to use it for a true emergency, but I did lend it to a friend earlier this month for her trip to an amusement park. More than eight months after its last charge, this power pack not only powered her phone on her day trip, but both of our phones and my iPad on an weeklong international vacation. I unpacked today to find it still at 75 percent! I highly recommend for actual emergencies AND trips to Disney World. Great job, Anker!
title: Exceeded Expectations

author: happygolky
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2020
review_content: This is the best charger I have ever owned. Takes less than an hour to charge and charges devices very quickly. I would recommend highly.
title: Charges quickly!

author: eliotz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2019
review_content: Best quality and battery life. I've had several battery packs and they usually disappoint when it comes to keeping charge and number of charges. Although my most recent purchases have been Anker products and each time they have impressed me and left me pleasantly surprised on how long they stay charged and how many charges they can provide. Excellent product, Excellent brand!

author: Uncle H
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2016
review_content: I've had this for 6 months and it is worth every penny!!!  I travel with this charger. It's a little heavier than the other one I have, but it gives you more charges. It can charge my iphone like 5/6 times before I need to recharge it! My only issue is it's weight, but that's the trade off for a work weeks worth of charges on the bus and train!!! author: djginyc

author: Farzad
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020

author: Val your pal
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
review_content: I purchased this charger for my elderly parents. Small enough to fit in my mother’s tote bag. My parents love it.

author: krollin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2018
review_content: This is a good power bank. Use it when I go on trips, out to the park, camping, doing anything where there is no power and it works good. I’ve bought Anker products such as power banks and lighting cables and based on my experience they have pretty solid products. I haven’t had any problems with any Anker product I’ve bought.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2019
review_content: My mom love it. Work perfectly. Una carga dura como 7 días de carga para tu cell. Pesa un poquito.
title: Mom love it

author: Alvin Jones
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2017
review_content: Beautifully elegant packaging and presentation. Comes with a cable and a very nice foam/netting bag. Arrived with about half a charge. Charging it up to full capacity now.  So far, a very good first impression. All of my Anker purchases have been stellar, the same is expected from this product. Will update after using it for a day/week/month.
title: Beautifully elegant packaging and presentation

author: Pauline (ketomomofone)
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2016
review_content: review Edit:  turns out it was user error. I researched what might have happened and realized the charger I was using was not a great one. Put it on my laptop wall charger and woke up to it fully charged. Love the size and feel of it. Fits perfectly in my purse and has multiple charges before it needs a recharge. If charges pretty fast even while still using the phone. I also ordered an Anker wall charger for future charges.
title: works perfect and I love it!

author: Nzinga
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2019
review_content: I use this battery almost daily to keep my iphone and ipad charged on the go. This powers up well and lasts about a week of heavy usage between recharging. I’m si happy my daughter, who has one, recommended it to me.
title: A Great Way To Stay Powered Up

author: Mrs. Review
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2019
review_content: Works well for us here at Bulletproof Pet Products Indestructibone dog chew toys - especially when we are doing trade shows and run booths that do not have electricity. Charges our phones and IPADS well all day!
title: Holds a charge.

author: zachary
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2018
review_content: I've been steadily using this product now for week and a half this is by far the best power bank I have ever used at a great price this can easily give my Samsung Galaxy S8 two full charges and I was still able to charged my vape 2 to 3 times. I have not tried it on a laptop or tablet but I'm sure it will get the job done the only downfall to this product which really isn't even a downfall is that at 0 capacity it does take quite some time to fully charge but I think this is due to the company using a trickle charge system to keep the battery's life longest lasting as possible I would recommend this product to anybody and would personally buy one again if I needed in the future
title: Best power banks by Anker

author: LoveThatDirtyWater
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2017
review_content: Really fast charges,  nothing but great since buying.Update: Had this for over 1 year and 3 1/2 months. With heavy use, this has lasted me well over a year until it wouldn't hold a charge anymore. Please make sure this is used for backup purposes and not everyday charging use. Made that mistake and killed the battery till it doesn't hold a charge anymore. Great product if used correctly.
title: Love this powerbank (Heavy use, lifespan about 1 year)

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2018
review_content: I love this charger. I charged it before my vacation and was able to charge my phone and my husband’s multiple times over 4 days and it still had power. Plus I love that I can charge 2 devices at the same time. It’s a little heavy for its size but I didn’t mind.
title: Holds a charge for a long time

author: A. Blanche
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
review_content: Use this for charging my phone while in the field (no or limited electricity for up to 5 days). It takes one or two days to charge but fully charges my phone several times over. It is a bit heavy for backpacking but definitely worth the weight for the peace of mind. Mine stopped discharging a year in but Anker quickly replied and replaced it - great customer service and fast shipping.
title: Reliable company and product

author: Andrew Patrick
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2018
review_content: This portable charger only worked for around 5 months before it completely died. I hadn't used it very much, especially compared to a couple of older, cheaper portable chargers that still work fine. I'd hope this would be an upgrade since it is smaller than the older models, but it turned out to be a piece of junk. Look elsewhere for your charger needs.
title: Died after less than 6 months light use

author: Rashmi Lalvani
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
review_content: Well I got this item yesterday and its been charging almost 24 hours now. The battery came with 2 dots of charge and it is still at the same with the 3rd dot flickering away. I unplugged it and its at 2 dots. I purchased this to replace my last Anker pack which wont even charge 1 phone now. That one is 18 months old.
title: Takes forever to charge

author: Nick G.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019
review_content: Took this into the mountains for a 5 day trip. It kept my S10 charged the whole time, and I am a heavy user, I was constantly using my phone for GPS, tracking distance traveled, calls and messaging (when service was available). I got home from the trip and the battery still had some juice left, while it isn't the lightest or smallest battery out there, if you need a lot of power, this will deliver.
title: Fantastic

author: SKY
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2017
review_content: I initially purchased this as a gift for someone, but ended up buying another for myself. I traveled overseas on vacation and used a pocket wifi where ever I went to access the internet/text my travel buddies and used the powerbank to charge it up, along with my cell phone and ipod. I don't know how I would've gotten around without this power bank. I wanted something that was durable and lasted a long time since I would be using it all day, everyday for my 2.5 week trip. It was dropped (accidentally) and worked completely fine with no scratches. The size is good and fits in a small purse. Although the weight is kind of heavy, it was worth it to carry around for my purposes. I made an effort to charge it every other night, but it would've been usable for about 3 days non-stop without any charging.
title: Perfect for traveling and non-stop use

author: Elizabeth A Fields
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2019
review_content: Love this charger!! Battery life is amazing! Traveled all the way to South Africa and never had to charge! Charged my phone & laptop several times! Excellent product! A must have for long flights! 24 hours +
title: Excellent product! Must have for long travel!!

author: Jonathan Mikhaylov
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2019
review_content: I've had this charger for three years now. It's been dropped countless times and it still works great. Over time one of the USB ports started losing its shape and almost broke but I just started being more careful and the port works fine now. The only thing is it does take a while to fully charge but I love being able to charge it on a Sunday and just have it in my backpack for the next two weeks.
title: Love this charger

author: Chuck Spencer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
review_content: To be honest, I have bought so much stuff from Amazon for electronics before I found this Anker line of chargers and power packs... All of them have been wonderful!!! Long cords that work great, power packs that really y work good and fast. I could not be happier if I tried!!! Thank you for a great product line! I will be back for more!!!
title: Great charger pack!!!

author: -b
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2017
review_content: so i ordered this product back in Oct '16 and had issues with it holding a charge in March' 17.i notified Anker of the issue, and after a few suggested fixes they sent me a replacement w/ 2day shipping.... and it works amazingly.i regularly charge my Moto X, Samsung Tab 4, TaoTronics and LG headsets continuously for days straight before needing to recharge this beast overnight.Anker's customer service is exemplary, as are their products... just buy it.
title: so i ordered this product back in Oct '16 and ...

author: Toyn
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2018
review_content: This was not what I expected. It's heavy and not as compact, but it charges relatively quick. If you want something that doesn't add weight to your purse, this ain't it. Also, I wanted something that I could have in my pocket while charge. I've only used it once, so I'll amend this review accordingly.
title: Not pocket portable

author: Wisconsin Ben
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
review_content: Battery stopped charging after about two months of use. Only used it around the house so it’s not like it took a beating or anything, can’t believe it stopped working so quickly. My final verdict is that the unit I received was junk, don’t know if they’re all like that, but mine certainly was.
title: Junk- stopped charging after 2 months of around the house use

author: dbassplayer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2019
review_content: I've been using this product for 2 yrs since writing this review and its absolutely great and reliable. It charges everything that uses a USB connection. Well in my case it charged my phone, mp3 device, bluetooth speaker, and lights... and still had juice for 1 while night. It's a great device!!!
title: Great for Camping!

author: miike
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2019
review_content: I've owned this for a while now and have charged everything, phones, tablets, gaming remotes etc. It takes a while to charge, but I can charge my phone 8-9 times on 1 charge. Great when traveling and no problem getting it onto a plane
title: awesome

author: Freddy C
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2019
review_content: I had issues with my first portable charger. The customer service department reached out and made things right. I highly recommend buying this charger it takes a few hours to fully charge but it will last 7-8 full charges on your iPhone XS.
title: Top notch product and excellent customer service!

author: Wayne
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2015
review_content: This is my fourth Anker product, and the quality continues to impress. With the amazing 20,000 mAh capacity on this thing, I can charge my Samsung Galaxy Note 4 phone (3,220 mAh battery) 6 times from completely dead, and still not have emptied it. And it's fast! as well as compact. A previous model (10,000 mAh verson) was shaped and sized to be almost identical to my phone, which had some aesthetic advantages, but this one has twice the capacity without being twice the size. It stores nicely in my truck's center console for convenience.I have seen other such devices with a built-in flashlight, or other gadgetry, which would be a nice complement to this product, but for the price and capacity, I can hardly complain about that.
title: Another home run, Anker!

author: JF978
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2017
review_content: I purchased this power bank for a trip to Costa Rica and was extremely happy with its performance. The trip was 7 days and included a lot of travel time through mountains with sketchy cell reception, killing my phone's battery. I ended up using this as my go-to power source for the entire trip.I charged the power bank a few times overnight when I had the ability to do so and never dropped below 50%. This is a big and heavy power bank, so I'd recommend carrying it in a purse or backpack. The build quality is great and  Anker's custom service has been exceptional to me in the past.
title: ... for a trip to Costa Rica and was extremely happy with its performance

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2018
review_content: Holy smokes. I didn't know these chargers worked this well. Sucker took a good 12 hours to charge up at first, but it charged my phone at least 10 times. Only thing I would like to see changed is perhaps adding the ability to "charge through" this battery pack. Basically you can either charge the pack, or charge from it, you can't do both at the same time. seems a bit strange that you cant but, maybe thats impossible for some reason. who knows. anyways. good product.
title: Sucker took a good 12 hours to charge up at first

author: JudyS
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2018
review_content: This battery pack is amazing.  Yes, it's a little on the heavier side, but with one charge it kept my phone and tablet charged for 4 days while I was on travel until I was able to get a proper converter to plug into where I was traveling.  Super reliable!  Highly recommended.
title: Life saver

author: Jack Wilkie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
review_content: This worked great for the past 10 months. I used it briefly when on international trips and it was a great back up for that. Unfortunately, now it only seems to charge up about halfway and only 2 of the 4 blinking charge lights show.Update: Anker reached out and offered to send a replacement. So far it's been working perfectly! Great customer service!
title: This was great while it lasted.

author: Treasure
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2019
review_content: I love this battery charger the best but sadly I have to return it because I didn’t return the other brand on time and I only need one so I am stuck returning this one but I liked this one the best.
title: I’m sad I have to return this!

author: Enrique A.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2018
review_content: I bought two Anker portable batteries. One from Amazon, one from Walmart. The one from Walmart is defective and AnkerDirect support will NOT provide a replacement even though the SN is still covered by their warranty.EDIT 09/24/2018 -- I completely forgot about this review until last week. I had no idea AnkerDirect replied to my review. I contacted them and they made things right. AnkerDirect proves (yet again) they are the best. THANK YOU!
title: Bad support -- UPDATE: THEY ARE AWESOME!!

author: Teo49ers
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
review_content: This is the greatest charger I own. I use it for my iPhone. And my Pokémon Go plus and my Bluetooth speaker and still have juice for more. Is practical enough that I can carry it in my pocket no problem.

author: David P.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2017
review_content: As advertised.  This battery will charge my G6+ 5-6 times on one charge.  I have been in the bush on a Safari and this was awesome.  One thing I wish I could do, charge the Anker PowerCore and plug in my G6+ to charge both at the same time.  You can only charge the Anker PowerCore.  With one power supply, it would be nice if you could charge the Anker PowerCore and other devices that are plugged into it at the same time.  I highly recommend this product.

author: JLarson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2016
review_content: Awesome.  I can recharge my phone quickly multiple times before needing to recharge this battery. Very handy for Pokemon Go.  If you are actively using the phone while charging, it will charge slowEr and may only maintain your charge but does charge quickly if screen is off and phone is on.  I only need to recharge this device once a week.I recommend using the Anker 24W Dual USB Wall Charger to recharge this battery.
title: A lot of power for on the go

author: Deborah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2018
review_content: My husband is very pleased with the performance of this charger.  He used it throughout his conference this week and it still has almost full power!  If we had one negative it would be that it’s a little heavy, but is is slim enough for him to carry in a regular pants pocket. GREAT product!
title: GREAT PRODUCT!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2017
review_content: I bought this battery pack a few months back for long trips when I need a charge. A few days back I chose to use it and I completely drained the battery pack. So I charged my battery pack for a few hours, after a while I noticed it didn’t charge at all. Than after a few days I gave up, this battery pack came Defective. Can’t return this product due to amazon not giving me the option to anymore. Was hoping Anker could give me a replacement or explain to me what’s wrong with this battery pack.
title: Defective Battery Pack [Warning if purchasing]

author: Damon Ransom
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2016
review_content: This charger is absolutely fantastic. I've owned it for several months and still love it. It'll charge a phone for nearly a week (and I have the Samsung Galaxy Note 5), and you can charge two items at once if you need to. The 4 blue status lights let you know when the charge is diminishing, so you know when to charge it. It does take quite awhile to charge, plan on charging over night for a full charge. Highly recommended!
title: Excellent charger, great value. Will charge for a week!

author: EMN
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2019
review_content: I loved this battery at first, but after about eight months it became very difficult to charge it - I’d have to spend time wiggling the charging cord and propping the battery up just so.  I tried a number of different f cords, and it is clearly the battery input port that is failing.  Now I can’t get the battery to charge unless I’m holding it up, which renders the battery useless.  It’s too bad, because I generally find Anker products to be reliable.
title: Worked well at first, then stopped recharging

author: mdkirk1
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2017
review_content: Worked very well for a year. Then occasionally wouldn’t charge even though the blue lights would indicate it held a full charge. Now it doesn’t work at all. I tried changing cords and draining fully and recharging. Nothing worked. Very disappointed because it was working so well.EDIT: Anker responded very quickly and helped me with the product!!! Outstanding customer service. All my anker products have worked so well in the past. This must have just been an isolated issue. Highly recommend them for their quality and customer service.
title: Had an issue, Anker fixed it!

author: Khaled
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2019
review_content: It was great the first months, but after using it for a while, the performance has dropped significantly...
title: After using it for a while, the performance has dropped significantly

author: Emily Park
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2016
review_content: I saw the picture and thought oh what a cute little charger with amazing juice.When I opened the package, I was very surprised to find a huge thing bigger than my Note 3. (Longer but much narrower)I thought how the heck am I supposed to carry this around, I wanted something "portable."However after taking it out a few times I grew accustomed to it. It carries enough power to fully charge my Note 5 (no longer 3) at least 3 times starting at 1%. I haven't calculated how long it takes for it to fully charge, but it is enough for me to be satisfied.Some cons are that it takes forever for the actually charger to charge. I can't charge it with any other cable other than the one it comes with. (A detail I learned the hard way after connecting it to a different cable only to find that it did not charge at all overnight.) I'll just connect it to a wall charger and forget about it until the morning after which I can just slip into my purse and head out.It's bulky, but it does its job well, so I'm not complaining. It's much more reliable because it carries more power and I don't have to recharge it as often. To each their own.
title: Much power. So wow.

author: James R Sachleben
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020
review_content: Nice sleek design. Simple operation. I wish it was using something more rugged than micro USB, but otherwise will be very usefull.
title: nice

author: Brett Gray
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
review_content: It is a nice power bank that holds good charge and charges my phone quickly. The only downside is that it takes a very long time to charge the power bank, usb-c port for fast charging would be a great addition.
title: Works great

author: Tracey Narinesingh
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
review_content: Love this! Has become one of my essentials for my technology driven life. Great value for the price. Will charge your iPhone at least 7 times. Charges iPads at least twice. Powers my VR Headset for at least an additional 5 hours. You can’t  go wrong!
title: Great power bank!

author: Sam B
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2018
review_content: I bought this for my mom for Christmas as a replacement to a different brand that she had that died. I have the small, lipstick sized Ankler and it works wonderfully. She doesn't remember to charge her items as often as she needs to, so I opted for this size and she loves it. It gives all of her devices multiple charges.
title: Great Item

author: Veronica Marie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2018
review_content: This battery pack is a life saver!! It charged everything for me while I traveled, and I only had to charge it once or twice on the whole trip. While all of my friends were worried about their phones or cameras dying, that wasn’t an issue for me. This is definitely one of my best buys!!
title: Amazing!!

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2020
review_content: Just recieved the product I was so exited to use it. This is not my first time using anker power bank but this one took more than 10 hours to recharge. It’s been almost 12 hours and the third light was flashing, it didnt reach the forth light yet . Its taking longer than What its written in the description thats why I am goving it 3 stars
title: Take longer than 10 hours to recharge

author: Katie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2019
review_content: Broke after 1 charge. It will carry a charge. But after 1 use the USB ports are not working, so it won’t charge my phone. And the return window just closed. I had it for 1 month and 4 days before it broke
