author: Joey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
review_content: I'm using this to power my camera rig. This battery works great, it's compact enough for me to attach it to my rig & has enough amperage to work with my two step-up converters simultaneously. Pretty good battery life too.
title: Great battery!

author: Josefina
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2019
review_content: It charges my iPhone X very quickly, it has a very long battery life, but it gets lots of tiny scratches. You can cover it up or protect it with the bag it comes with.
title: Amazing

author: Aly T
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2018
review_content: Very durable and great battery life. It is a bit on the heavy side but not horrible. I keep one in my tote for work and we traveled Europe with them. Great at charging multiple items multiple times. The blue indicator lights are a bit hard to navigate on how much battery is left we just kept it charged when we weren’t using it.
title: Multi item charging and great battery life.

author: Gaming enthusiast
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2016
review_content: Bought this a while ago, to replace my broken portable charger. Worked out great. It can charge my Iphone 6 about 8-9 times. I can last about a week from only charging with this. You just need to put this in your bag and you are good to go. If you pair this with the Anker power line charger, you are good to go. The only downside is that it takes about 10 hours to charge, but I just charge it when I sleep, so it doesn't really bother me. Thumbs up for this.
title: Worked out great. It can charge my Iphone 6 about 8-9 ...

author: Patricia Garcia
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
review_content: Loved this product. I needed a new power bank for when I'm on the go. This thing can keep charging my phone for hours. Didn't charged at all for the times I was at AX for 4 days. A good product to buy.
title: Amazing

author: Brian
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
review_content: This definitely doesn't charge a phone 4 times. While it does charge the phone fast, the charger itself charges super super slow. I've had better ones for sure
title: Slowww

author: Gina C.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2015
review_content: I love this portable charger. I got a few comments that it's big, but I'm fine with that, given that I can charge my phone 7-10 times before this battery needs to be charged. I travel with it. I don't have to worry if I have an outlet close to my bed with this portable charger. At home, our couch is nowhere close to an outlet, so this has come in handy. We bought an additional one so both of us have our own. You can charge two devices on it, which is great. All around I would recommend this!
title: I love this portable charger

author: Chad Fontes
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2016
review_content: I have purchased a few different Anker products over the last few months. All I can say is "Wow!" The design and build of this battery pack is amazing. It charges my iPhone and iPad simultaneously with no problems. It fits easily into my back pocket, and takes up hardly any room in my backpack.I just went camping this last weekend with no electricity and this kept my phone charged and available. My friends asked to borrow it multiple times and it served them well.I have previously purchased the "Sentey Power Bank 20800mah" from Amazon, which worked well for awhile, but the 2.1A usb port crumbled and the battery doesn't hold a charge too long anymore. This Anker Powercore is 10x better, and faster!If you are looking for a quick, portable, long lasting battery pack at an affordable price, this is the pack for you.
title: Quick, portable, stylish, and Awesome!

author: Anthony Bauer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
review_content: I have two of these, I can charge various devices for days on end with just one. I'd recommend this to anyone. Charging it can take a while depending on your power source so keep that in mind, I usually leave (one of) mine plugged in overnight.
title: great battery life

author: Adam W.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2016
review_content: I recently purchased the Anker 20000mAh Portable Charger for work and personal use. It arrived promptly and with a 50% charge, ready for use. I took it with me on a week-long business trip, and used it to charge my own and coworkers devices almost constantly. As soon as I started using it to keep my iPhone alive, everyone was lining up to borrow some power! I didn't keep perfect track, but it charged about half a dozen iPhones to full on the first night going from 100% to 75% charge. I'm sure several of those charges were not going from dead to fully charged (or we would have exceeded the manufacturer's specifications several times over!) but I can say one thing - it charged them FAST.The device is also quite durable, I accidentally dropped it several feet onto a concrete floor and it survived with just a nick on the finish. The device was inside the protective bag that it ships with at the time, but I will probably purchase something a bit sturdier to protect it in the future.Awesome product, I recommend it wholeheartedly.
title: Excellent Purchase - Durable, Quick Charging, High Capacity

author: Brenda L
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2016
review_content: I really have enjoyed this Power Bank.I recently was on a 5 hour flight in which the Inflight power service failed.  Things like that happen. Fortunately, I had the Anker Power Bank in my purse & rotated two Galaxy s5's & two music players to keep them charged. The husband was happy!We love to camp, so I plan on taking the Power Bank along. I don't mind roughing it, but it's too quiet at night to sleep so my music player helps with that.I use the original cables that came with the devices & I have experienced no problems.  Everything charges relatively fast. I really appreciate the carrying case that was included.I also purchased the   Anker 40W/8A 5-Port USB Charger PowerPort 5, Multi-Port USB Charger for iPhone 6/6 Plus, iPad Air 2/mini 3, Samsung Galaxy s6/s6 edge and More           to charge the Power Bank & other devices.So Far So Good.
title: So Far So Good

author: Deborah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
review_content: I purchased this battery for so I be able to charge my phone on the go and it works perfect for my needs. I used it on my recent trip to Florida. I highly recommend this product.
title: Great battery

author: Akeel Omar Taylor
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2018
review_content: Great portable power bank. I keep it in my edc bag and it keeps all of my electronics powered up when ever I need it. I have an iPhone X and I went from 20% to 100%  charge cycle 5 times and still had 50%  charge left according the power banks charge indicator. I highly recommend.
title: Best power bank I’ve boight yet.

author: Elaine Clayton
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020
review_content: I’m so glad I purchased this item. It’s perfect when I’m traveling or out all day walking around. It fits in my crossbody bag and charges my phone quickly. I really like that it has two USB ports. The battery holds many charges.
title: Perfect for travel

author: Gina Brown
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2020
review_content: This is an amazing item. I have had several chargers before but this is by far the best. Keeps its charts for hours and charges phone quickly.
title: A must have l item

author: Elisalouk
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2018
review_content: This thing saved me when I was traveling and didn't have access to electricity to charge my devices. I was able to do 4 cell phone charges, 3 fitbit charges and 2 wireless headphone charges from one full charge. Also, it was not too bulky to have around AND the two usb ports was perfect for charging 2 things at once.
title: it was not too bulky to have around AND the two usb ports was perfect for charging 2 things at once

author: Jowie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2017
review_content: Mainly bought this for an international trip and was the best thing I could've done, it kept everything charged. Two people have bought ankers after using mine! Though 10000 and 13000 which are like both like half the size and feels like 1/3 of the weight lol (not a fact). Charges phone faster than a wall outlet in my experience. It takes forever to charge though, (like 24 Hrs) with a 5w charger so I mostly use the 12w iPad adaptor. In hindsight I would've maybe bought the 13000 because this is so heavy but still A++
title: Great buy!

author: Skyler Storm Campbell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2018
review_content: This thing, I carried with me everywhere. My friends would charge their phones, I'd charge my phone. Lasted for the longest time. And when it eventually died, one overnight charge would bring it right back up. Worked so well, my girlfriend decided she needed it more hahaha now, to buy another one
title: Keep nearby

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2018
review_content: I bought this portable charger back in September 2017. It recently stopped getting fully charged as the fourth battery light kept on blinking after 12+ hours of charging. It usually takes 4-6 hours. When I contacted Anker's Customer Service, the response time was reasonable and up to their promise of responding within 24 hours. They walked me through troubleshooting the issue. After that did not work, they offered a replacement. The replacement came on a timely manner and worked perfectly. Overall satisfied with the customer support!
title: Great Customer Service!

author: wendy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2018
review_content: worked extremely well on a long trip - held its charge and allowed multiple devices to be charged quickly including and iphone 8 and ipad.  only downside is it's a bit heavy but i guess that is to be expected for such a robust power source.  we recharged it overnight and it shut itself off after the charge was full.
title: worked well on a long trip

author: Michael D. Anderson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
review_content: I think the product is great. I only wish that it had a USB type C port that I could use to charge it instead of the normal USB type port. Also I'm sure this power is durable but I wouldn't want to drop it. I know I would scratch the plastic and ruin the aesthetics.
title: #PowerCore = #PhoneLife

author: Tamara J.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
review_content: This is the second portable charger I have purchased from maker. The chargers are excellent. Super durable, and hold a great charge. I did have one minor issue with my last one. I called them, they asked for pertinent information, and sent a replacement right away.I highly recommend this product, especially for the price point you pay.
title: HONEST- AVID PRIME MEMBER HERE!!

author: Paul S McCurdy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
review_content: I charged my iPhone 11 and Apple Watch both four times. This little brick is going to add a lot of peace of mind while traveling or in next power outage.
title: Worth it

author: C K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2018
review_content: This thing is absolutely phenominal!! Brought it to disney for a week and it charged all of our phones (iphone 7,7+,8) very fast multiple times per day.The battery doesn’t seem to drain if not being used for a long period of time either which is good.It is a little heavy for the size, but man it is worth it.My wife was skeptical of me getting it but now she uses it all the time!
title: Best $40 I’ve ever spent!!!!

author: Judy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2019
review_content: What are the best battery pack I ever bought. The only complaint I have is is quite slippery when handling it. I wish I had some texture to it. The battery life is phenomenal I have a Samsung s8 and  I could charge it on there for about 5-6 times
title: Great!

author: Dana Murphy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2019
review_content: I’ve had this portable charger for 2 Years and still works as amazing as it did the day I got it. It holds a charge really well and I can get about 5 iPhone X charges out of it. Added bonus of charging my phone quickly. My only complaint and it’s not that big of a deal...is that charger itself takes longer to charge than I would like. If anything ever happened to it I’d definitely buy another one!
title: 2 Years Old & No Issues

author: Lauren Eichler
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2019
review_content: Wow this battery saved up on our trip to Paris and Ireland. This thing has so much power! Plugged it in over night to completely charge my IPhoneX (it was dead). It charges quick too! Worth the money!
title: Amazing how quick it charges itself and phones

author: Mike Armijo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2019
review_content: Iv been using Anker products for about 4 years now and everything from there phone cords to there portable chargers has worked great.
title: Very durable

author: Andrew Mason
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2017
review_content: If you travel a lot or go outdoors a lot and use video equipment, then this is essential for your bag full of gear. It's not much longer than an iPhone 7+, but it is triple the height and 25% narrower. Very compact and easy to travel with. The performance is awesome! The only way you'd be disappointed is if you received a defected item or expect it will last for 1 million years.
title: Perfect for outdoors and traveling!

author: Todd Sebra
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2019
review_content: I bought this to use when we are at my sons wrestling tournaments. Never enough outlets around the gym. I have used it several times and it works great. You can charge two phones at the same time which is nice and we have no longer had to deal with the dying cell phone.
title: Great charger

author: DRandazz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2016
review_content: This has been exactly what I needed.  I own a small business and have 2 cell phones, iPad Pro as well as a potable mifi.  I can charge these devices as neede and be on the run all day long.  I have not had one issue with it dying before I have completed my day.  I am hard on my electronic devices as they are in use from 530 am until 8pm on average.  I have never had thePowerCore die.  It has gotten low but never died completely.
title: Outlasts my usage!

author: M Clark
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019
review_content: Used this when traveling from home from USA. Charged my phone, kindle and tablet plus my husband's tablet and phone and still had lots of life left. A little heavy but not too bad that I wouldn't take it out with me on a daily basis to top up my phone.Sleek design and a nice little bag to carry it and the cords.
title: Great value

author: Jamie Haskell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2018
review_content: Anker makes a good battery pack. My phone would die every day and I desperately needed a solution to this problem. My mother was angry when she couldn't get a hold of me. This product helped so much. It's very portable. I bought a case with to carry my cables and I even have cables for my friends. This charger can charge my phone about 6 times before it dies. And the beautiful part is that it can charge multiple phones at once (up to 2 devices). I have left this thing around for weeks and go back to pick it up and get a charge and it's still at the percent I left it at. I strongly recommend this product. I worked hard comparing the price of this product and the mAH it provides and found it's one of the best deals on the market.
title: Anker makes a good battery pack

author: Nicholas Madia
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2018
review_content: Product stopped working. Never dropped or scratched it. Simply stopped working. Very disappointed in the product..... I got in contact and they replaced my item for free within 4 days. Used it every day since and no issues. They took great care of me and I will continue to buy using this brand for all my tech needs
title: Truely a great experience

author: D Marquardt
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2019
review_content: This is bigger & heavier than I expected it to be. Didn’t want to take it hiking for the GoPro but great for everyday iPhone use when not needing to carry it. Has 2 ports which is very nice.
title: Big & heavy

author: David S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2019
review_content: The description says: "for use with virtually any device that charges from a USB port". And it claims to charge MacBooks USB-C. So I thought it would charge my hp laptop through usb-C. And it DOES NOT. It does not support the common USB-C fast charging protocol.
title: It does not charge my laptop. The description was confusing.

author: Amit G. Kachhia
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2020
review_content: Very disappointed,,  after going out of charge under 2 years. They are supposed to be a great product but not much of a long life. Called customer service and they couldn't do nothing about it but only offer me 10% off on the new one.Why would I want the same product if I wasn't satisfied with the first one?
title: Only gave it three stars because I got no help at the end of the deal but it is a great product

author: Bankerbill
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2017
review_content: This charger does the job!  It's a quality product.  Works well with my iPhone and iPad Air, but my iPad Pro will pretty much drain it completely.  It takes about 10 hours to fully recharge the Anker PowerCore.  When I first plugged it into my iPad, it didn't charge.  I found that I had to unplug the USB cord and plug it back in so the little blue lights were lit.  It would be helpful if there was a separate light that shows that it is actually charging, for example, an orange light during charging and a green light when fully charged.
title: A quality product that does the job.

author: Belinda
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2017
review_content: Haven’t even had it for 3 months and it has stopped charging!
title: Stopped charging!

author: Sharon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2016
review_content: *Update*. After leaving my original review about the unreliability of one of my batteries, customer service contacted me and went above & beyond to get me a replacement battery and to make sure it was in good working condition.  I am impressed with their commitment to make things right.Original review:  Bought two of these and one of them only work sporadically.  It just stops charging right in the middle of a charge even though it still has power.  Very frustrating.
title: A hit and miss product that works sporadically.

author: Justin Kang
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2017
review_content: The convenience of being able to charge my phone anywhere from my back pack is awesome. Should have bought this a long time ago.It charges my Note 3 about 3 times before I need to charge this thing up again. It charges pretty fast as well. Definitely worth the money.I would buy it again if I needed another.
title: ... charge my phone anywhere from my back pack is awesome. Should have bought this a long time ago

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2018
review_content: Excellent product. Used it on a trek in Nepal where electricity is undependable or not existent. We charged 2 phones at once and also kept my camera charged. This power core charged quickly. It retained its charge incredibly well. A bit hefty but for something this important, I will carry it.
title: Great product!

author: A. MORALES
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2020
review_content: My 1st one was black.  It was stolen from me.  I seen it in red and liked the color.  Purchased the matching case in red too.
title: This is my 2nd purchase

author: agrolove
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2016
review_content: Charges my cell battery 6 times per charge...great for camping etc.**Charging by solar panel may be difficult to impossible depending on weather etc.I've a 5v panel,which charges all of my other electronics fine,but which will only charge the Anker power core with full mid-day sun without clouds of any sort.As recommended by the manufacturer use a wall charger with this item for best results.Even then it's an overnight charge.
title: great for camping etc

author: Mary Elizabeth, Maryland
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2018
review_content: Bought this to charge my phone bedside on my nightstand since I don't have a plug nearby. it charges my phone to 100% every night for two weeks without having to be charged again. It’s also my trusty travel companion, giving me charges for all my travel items: iPhone, iPad, etc.  Really happy with it!
title: Great charger, use for home and travel

author: Gamer23
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2020
review_content: This portable charger is great. I use it just about every day I’m out of the house. I like that I can go a while without having to recharge it.
title: This Portable Charger is Great

author: Missy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2019
review_content: This battery holds a charge much longer than I would have ever expected.  It's not the smallest, or lightest, but it's not much bigger than my phone either.  Stout, durable, with two USB ports to charge multiple devices.  I'd buy this again.
title: Seems to hold a charge forever!

author: MgV
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020
review_content: I love this product so much but after 9 months she completely stopped working I’m so sad!! It was a dream for traveling and held my phone life up for days, but this is the second time I’ve had to purchase a new one in less than a year.
title: Short life, good while it lasts

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2019
review_content: Everything is great with this power supply. It last forever and fits in all my backpacks. Only oversight on my part is that I thought it would turbo charge my phone. Still really good and highly recommend.
title: Lasts forever

author: Keith
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
review_content: The first Anker I received did not charge for longer than two minutes. I reached out to Anker and they replaced the did with a new charger that works fantastic. Would definitely buy more Anker products great customer service.
title: Great customer service

author: Earl Clark
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2018
review_content: It does take a while to charge but that doesnt bother me. I can get at least 4 charges of this on my Samsung S8+. Love that I can charge 2 devices at once. If just laying around for a long time it seems to lose a little charge but not bad. It is heavy but I dont regret the buy
title: Love that I can charge 2 devices at once

author: ndcColorado
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2015
review_content: We have some smaller 2300 mah chargers, and those don't work very well.  I absolutely LOVE this one!  It takes a long time to charge, but I keep it with me (in the nice padded case) and am able to charge my phone  at least 5 or 6 times, or power my handheld radios (that have USB ports) for a long time! It is pretty large, but that doesn't bother me.  I try to keep it on the down low so my teenagers don't steal it from me because they would love it, also!
title: Can charge devices SEVERAL times with the huge capacity of this unit!

author: Kyle
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
review_content: I used this battery nonstop almost for a year while i was playing pokemon go. This battery has been very good to me, but 3 years later it has died. The controller board inside fried itself. My guess is a design flaw with the negative a positive inputs from the batteries being so close to each other, an arc could be created easily and fry everything.Overall, not a bad purchase at all. I expect most electronics to last only a year or two, so I would still recommend it.
title: good battery, lasted 3 years

author: Maria M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2019
review_content: I purchased this for my daughters trip to DC/NY.  She only had to charge it once loaded over the 4 day trip.  Handy because her phone has to be charged everyday to coordinate with teachers schedules etc.  small and compact .  I highly recommend
title: Highly recommended

author: Elizabeth Alm
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
review_content: We had issues with this portable charger.  Possibly a defect we are unsure.When we would plug our phones into the portable charger we had to constantly have to have our hand on the button or would it would stop charging. It was super frustrating when u are in disney world and just want to plug it in and put it in your backpack to charger. We had to constantly make sure ot was charging.
title: Very frustrated with this product

author: Lisa Lisa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2018
review_content: I absolutely love this charger. I actually bought a second one.  You can charge items three or four times without having to recharge the battery. My only complaint is that it's a little on the heavy side to carry around in your handbag, but I still do it.
title: Excellent charger for the price

author: Shenanuke
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2018
review_content: A very good quality USB battery for charging devices, but I've found that the size and weight of this particular model is a bit too much for my everyday needs.  I prefer the Anker Powercore 13000 as my usual USB charger, and bring the 20100 only for trips when I think I won't have power access for days on end.
title: Great product, but I prefer a slightly smaller Anker Powercore model for my everyday needs.

author: Shelby Buescher
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2017
review_content: Fantastic product with an outstanding warranty. I took this charger across the globe, using it almost daily. It charges your device quickly and reliably. After a year of use, the second USB socket stopped working but they had a new one at my door in under 5 days once I reported the issue. The main issue that I see with this device is that it takes a while to charge initially but I think that's more of a limitation with current technologies than anything really related to this product. Overall this is a fantastic portable charger and I would fully recommend this to anyone looking for a powerful charger that's built well and backed by a great warranty.
title: Fantastic product with an outstanding warranty

author: Kylee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2017
review_content: Always a fan of Anker products. Everything I've bought from Anker has proven to be reliable - none of my Anker products have stopped working to date, and I've been ordering from them for over 3 years now. I always get my charging cables from them, and I had heard great feedback about their PowerCore series, so I gave it a shot. Owned mine for about a month now, and have taken it on three pretty long trips so far. I've only had to recharge this guy twice.
title: Reliable and high quality, as expected from Anker

author: Spiff
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2017
review_content: Edit: I have had this since September and it now won’t fully charge.
title: Five Stars

author: Maggie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2018
review_content: The capacity on this battery is astonishing. We used it to charge 4 phones and a Bluetooth speaker and it wasn’t even halfway used up after that. It is a little bigger than I expected, kind of the size of a laptop battery, but with the capacity offered that should have been expected. I love it!
title: Alittle big, but did its job perfectly.

author: Kimurq
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2018
review_content: External battery takes a very long time to fully charge itself (overnight), but once charged I can keep my phone charged all week with it!  it is pretty heavy though so it's not one that I carry around with me when I'm out and about. I use it when I'm not near a handy outlet (my side of the bed, for example or when watching TV and my family is hogging the available power sources). For a long weekend of camping, my phone didn't even make a dent in the battery reserve. It's probably more power than I need really...
title: Strong battery

author: Josiah Cowden
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2016
review_content: I haven't found a better portable battery than this one. can charge multiple devices at once, does however slow down charging speed if you have two smart devices at once. If you are looking to run any mobile app forever this batter will last an entire day (24 hrs) and then some at full charge no problem. (IE. Pokemon GO as resource heavy an app as it is, can run all day.)Also have found it is pretty durable, have dropped it several times and did leave a scratch in the plastic but no function or structure problems at all.Id say the only bad thing if i was really pushed to say something, would be that it does have quite a long charge time itself, i think from 50% it will take 6 hours on a normal charger, with a super charger (4amp) you can get it down to about 3-4 hours.
title: I haven't found a better portable battery than this one

author: Keith Frank
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2015
review_content: This is my third portable charger and, by far the best yet.  It charges my Samsung Galaxy S4 from 15% to 100% in about 90 minutes.  It also charges my Kindle Fire HD tablet in about the same amount of time.  And those charges do not drain the unit either.  There are four lights on the unit that indicates the level of charge in it.  After charging my phone or my tablet, there were still three out of the four lights still lit.  It was well worth the money and a bargain at the price.
title: Definitely worth the money!

author: JD
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
review_content: The Ankor portable charger is powerful, well built and priced fairly.  Great to have while traveling or just as a power back up at home.
title: Excellent well priced portable charger

author: ReaderWriter
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
review_content: It’s a heavy item for travelling (I use it to charge on long distance hikes) but that’s the only knock I can give against it. It charges devices fast, holds a charge forever (put it away for nearly a year and it still had four bars when I took it out) and is super durable. Quality device
title: Quality charger

author: Arima
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2017
review_content: After almost a year with Anker I am changing my review. It is actually has a decent charging speed when plugged to 2A+ power adapter and it's 2A usb output comes very handy with newer phones that support higher votage. My only complain is that powerbank is heavy AF. I tried other products by Anker brand like usb cables and they also turned out to be fine.
title: Incredibly slow at charging. I have a noname chinese ...

author: Ryan Mathews
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2016
review_content: This was recommended to me by a friend who played Ingress, and now plays Pokemon Go (as I do as well) and I think it's amazing. It can give your phone probably six or seven charges before you need to recharge the anker. It's portable enough to fit in your pocket, and it's a monster. The only thing I can see as a drawback is it takes a long time to fully recharge your anker, probably three to five hours, I haven't timed it but it seemed like that long (the last blue light was flashing and it stopped charging my phone, so I knew I needed to charge it)But I can fit the battery in one pocket, and my phone in another and charge my phone while I'm away from an outlet, the IQ sense of Anker makes sure your phone (regardless of what it is) charges at its full speed. But I also made an amazing friend partly due to an Anker 20000 charger and Pokemon Go, so technically, this battery could change your life! (for the better)
title: Buy this battery, save your phone from dying away from outlets

author: Angel M.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2020
review_content: The product worked better than expected coming at a relatively fast estimated delivery. Has one of the best costumer service I've seen for a company that sells portable chargers/power banks. I have bought over 20 power banks which sounds crazy, and I can't express enough of how much I love this charger for my everyday need. Recommend to everyone, will not disappoint
title: Great product Overall! Loved the Out come

author: Caitlin K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2018
review_content: So far it's a decent power core.But it's only been a month, and I've only had to use it once. And that once took my phone from 12% to 98% in about an hour, while I was running Pandora.So that wasn't bad.Will update this @ the 6 month, and 1 year intervals.
title: Decent, so far

author: Janette Vietze
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2017
review_content: Very impressed with this product. I bought this for my trip to Italy, and it arrived within 2 days. I took a lot of pictures with my phone, and that drained the battery quickly. Once the phone was down to 12% and after hooking it up to the Anker, it charged up to 90% within 20 minutes. This was while I was still taking pictures and navigating!  Awesome product, and I would buy it again.
title: Awesome product, and I would buy it again

author: bekstar
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2020
review_content: These are seriously the best portable chargers. I have actually bought 3. Sometimes I even charge them overnight and then the next day instead of plugging my phone into a wall charger, I plug it into one of these and it's at 100% way faster!!
title: Best charger! I've bought 3!!

author: Nicole Dallin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
review_content: This baby has been all throughout Europe. On my many trips and it’s my best Disneyland buddy. Charge once and lasts nearly 4 months with just my usage. If I take with me to the parks and others use it or I use my phone tons. It lasts a few weeks. Highly recommend it for anyone who travels and needs a strong/high quality portable charger.
title: Durable/Long lasting battery

author: Regina
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2019
review_content: I have bought 2, and honestly might buy a third.  This is life changing!  Charges so fast, it’s so handy.  If you’re on the fence, buy it!!!!  You will not regret it!  Great customer service also.
title: Perfect

author: Zippy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019
review_content: It's a little heavy for daily use while sightseeing, but worth taking. It's great that it can charge two devices at once. We never let it run really low so I can't comment on how many full charges you can get.
title: Solid and dependable

author: Kara
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020
review_content: This thing gets used SO MUCH in our house. I can charge my iPhone almost four times without needing a recharge. Can’t live without this.
title: Old faithful

author: Coco Kokiatso
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2018
review_content: Awesome charger. It’s huge and heavy though. Since I am the only with a purse in the family, It come with me. Kind of annoying because on top of the charger, I have my husband or my daughter’s phone in my bag also. Did I say it’s heavy? It’s HEAVY
title: Heavy but useful

author: KenW
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2017
review_content: This PowerCore is awesome.  It has earned elevated reviews from the Techie gurus on YouTube.  I agree.  I have used it extensively while traveling the congested USA interstates when driving my old Jeep Wrangler not having USB ports.  I use it when Sailing not having to worry about water splashes although using caution.  This power core is awesome for charging my MP3 player and my iPad.
title: Amazing!  It does what its supposed to without worry or hassle. Great $$ value. Highly rated by the YouTube techie gurus.

author: TLSmith
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
review_content: I have had this less than a year and it will no longer fully charge, no matter how long I leave it plugged up.  It was great at first, but doesn't last and for $50 I expected more.
title: Disappointing

author: doglover813
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2018
review_content: Anker makes a great product! I got over 5 full 100% charges from this product on my Samsung S6. Not that heavy and fits ok in a purse. Well worth it.
title: Good Quality Charger

author: Hilton
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2016
review_content: I first wrote a good review, then I had problems, now it is working well.  I'm not sure why it lost its charge, but I did encounter something - I disconnected my iPhone, but the LEDs on the Anker stayed on (and probably some circuitry inside).  Perhaps that is what caused the battery to lose its charge (more than once).  Seems to be a bug in its on/off logic.  I haven't really tried to reproduce it.  This battery takes a long time to charge (even when using a high amp charger).  I keep it in the conference room, then whenever my phone is low, I top it up.It's not perfect, so I'll give it a 4.5 and round it up to a 5.  :)
title: I like it again

author: glenn gonzales
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
review_content: I had bought this charger a couple of months ago and it wasn't working as intended. So I reached out to the Customer Service and within a day I was given a response that they would send me a new one for free with no extra charges. The support was super friendly and very helpful.
title: Amazing Product and Awesome Support

author: William Riegel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2017
review_content: This is an excellent high capacity battery and I would recommend it to anyone who has multiple devices to charge and is not picky about the size of the product.  One word of warning.  The time to charge the battery is inversely proportional to the time to charge you device.  For example: your phone is at 20% power.  It took me about 20 minutes to bring it to 60%. However it took an hour for me to get the battery itself charged another indicator light.  Thats fine with me but just be aware.
title: An excellent product

author: Kia Thompson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2020
review_content: I will add additional stars but 5 stars for the product itself because it came wirh everything. Im currently charging it via usb from my computer. Im using it to power my dashcam for my ride. If it holds up to its expectations i will add more rating stars.
title: Nice and sophisticated

author: Garys Javier
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
review_content: It is perfect for because my cells battery is broke and need charge everywhere.

author: Jenny O.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2016
review_content: This has a TON of charge to it. I brought it along on a backpacking trip for both my phone (using it as a camera) and my nook, and also in case anyone else that was along needed to charge something. It's heavy (not the lightest thing for backpacking) but it did the job. I will definitely be taking this when traveling and outlets aren't easily accessible.
title: I will definitely be taking this when traveling and outlets aren't easily accessible.

author: Marc
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2016
review_content: I have used this for a few weeks now and I really like.  It does just as they describe.  One feature this does not have it (& most do not) is a power pass through.  It would be really nice to be able to use the battery while charging it. Other than that little wish, it works great- put it in your backpack, with the battery charging and get to your work/school/campground, with a full battery.  Also great in areas where there are frequent power outages.
title: Great Battery

author: Beachcomber
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2019
review_content: It is a bit heavier than most portable chargers, but using it for heavy duty laptop graphics plus smart phone, it gives me 8-10 solid hours.  Takes overnight to charge.
title: A powerhouse!

author: Rhonda
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2019
review_content: So far so good. It works best with original Apple cords for charging devices for me so far. It doesn’t like cheap ones. Lol
title: Great device

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
review_content: As others have noted, sometimes will turn off unexpectedly after a minute or two of charging. Then you have to press the on button again. Over and over again every minute or so as it keeps turning off. Wouldn't buy again.
title: Shuts off without fully charging device

author: Anne
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
review_content: I love this product. The battery life when fully charged is long. Will buy again from seller for other products.

author: Lauren B.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
review_content: Not as fast as I would’ve thought considering it’s size. And it is large!! Not very portable, & not lightweight

author: Ken
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2019
review_content: This battery is a beast! Bought this to keep my oculus quest charged while playing, works very good. Excellent battery life before needing to be recharged, recommend completely
title: Great battery pack

author: Andrew Priebe
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2017
review_content: My wife and I took this along for some recent international travel and could not be more pleased with how it held up for the trip and it's subsequent usage back home. Used this to charge our tablets while in transit both in the air and on the ground. It's size is decent for carrying around and not too heavy. It didn't receive a second look while going through airport security through multiple airports on our way to and fro.

author: WKW123
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
review_content: Best portable charger I’ve had yet. A little heavier/bigger than I anticipated, but charges quickly and consistently.  I can charge my phone several times before I have to recharge the charger itself.
title: Worth it!

author: moskigirl
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2018
review_content: Charging your phone to 100%, only after it has dropped below 20%, helps to extend the life of your phone battery.With this I can always charge my battery to full capacity - my son’s iPhone battery is already failing, but mine is still like new!
title: Don’t know how I’d live without it!

author: Daily Wod
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2018
review_content: I ordered this because a friend of mine also had one, and swears by these things. The one I first ordered, I opened up and it did not charge at all. I wrote in to Anker and they had me do some troubleshooting. None of it worked, so they sent me a new one. I received the replacement within two days of writing to them about the problem. The replacement works GREAT. I am able to charge my phone about 6 times, and a laptop. THis company is great to work with. They are very honest, and want you to have a good experience with their product. Thanks so much for the help!!!
title: An honest company - amazing product

author: RONALD PROULX
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2019
review_content: I've owned 2 of these power bricks and used them extensively for keeping my devices charged both for everyday use and for travel. Its small slim form factor makes it perfect for keeping in your backpack or bag for any occasion. Another awsome perk when you buy an anker product is their extended warranty for their products. After one of my power bricks stopped holding a charge after a year of constant use their customer service team helped get me a new powercore.
title: Amazing product, amazing customer service

author: CJ DoWerk
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2019
review_content: Purchased as a gift for my mother-in-law and she loves it. She told me she only has had to recharge it once since Christmas.
title: Anker ROCKS!!!

author: Gabriela Delgadillo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2019
review_content: This product has been passed around in my family for over 3 years now and it is sturdy! The battery life has not decreased any and it is still working like day one. I’ve recommended this product over and over through out the years!
title: A NEED

author: Ian E. Christiansen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020
review_content: A guest at my job had this and recommended it. So I got one, and am very happy with it. Takes a while to charge, but takes twice as long to drain - I can charge my phone fully at least four times and my laptop twice off this battery. Portable and light - I love it. Also great for backup charging when traveling. Has two ports for cables.
title: Terrific Portable!

author: William E Quatman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2016
review_content: I don't like to rate a product until I've had and used it for a while, so I waited almost a year to comment. So far, this has worked very well. I will in fact charge my phone and IPad at the same time, then have plenty of energy for charging more phones. I use it for travelling and sometimes when I"m using the iPad for an extended period. It takes it a while to charge up, but once it does, it has plenty of energy for several charges.
title: I don't like to rate a product until I've had and used ...

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2016
review_content: Great portable charger! I've had It for over a month and it's amazing. It can charge an iPhone 6 five to six times (my personal experience) and it will charge to 100% in less than a night. Although pricey, you get what you pay for - it also charges very fast (my phone takes less than 1 hour to fully charge). It's faster than an outlet, so if you constantly find yourself running out of juice or impatiently waiting for your phone to charge, this is the product for you.Quick Review:PROS:- Super fast charge (iPhone 6 charges fully in <1 hr.)- Large capacity (charges iPhone 6 five to six times)- Sleek design, good quality material- Comes with warranty and carrying pouchCONS:- Although it can fit in your pocket, it isn't the smallest thing in the world. (You won't find a portable charger of this capacity that's smaller, anyways so take this with a grain of salt)
title: Buy this if you constantly need a charge or don't want to wait!!

author: Morgan Williams
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2016
review_content: Arrived on time as advertised in new condition. I have had it for four weeks two of them traveling. Works fantastically! if buying just this product you will need a USB charger; due to the capacity a higher charge rate is nice for speed, I purchased the iClever BoostCube 4.8A 24W Dual USB Travel Wall Charger to charge it. The device charges two divices a few times quickly without getting hot (I charged a wifi hot spot and an iPhone 6+ at the same time while using both for traveling in Japan). No problems yet, so far very happy.Update: still works great 1year later
title: due to the capacity a higher charge rate is nice for speed

author: D. Eldridge
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2019
review_content: Bought this charger in 2017 it is still going strong. I have purchased the smaller size as well, I carry one in my golf bag love this product will purchase again.
title: Very reliable

author: Lauren Farrell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
review_content: I bought this product 4 months ago after using my bf’s for over a year. It started off AMAZING but just this week it stopped working. It’s fully charged and won’t keep charging like Belford. I’m hoing the seller can contact me ASAP as I am super loyal to this product and hope they can make it right. This should not die so quickly after purchase.
title: Seller Please HELP!!!

author: Emily Pehrson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2019
review_content: I don't know what I did before this power bank. Definitely worth every penny. I can charge my phone completely maybe 7 to 10 times. A must -have for anyone who.jas a long commuting day or an older phone with less-than-stellar battery life

author: Chris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2020
review_content: I charged my ipad from 10% battery to full, charged my iphone 4 or 5 times and my headphones 4 or 5 times all in 1 charge!  Pretty amazing for such a small device and for little money compared to others.  Great value!

author: BJH888
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2016
review_content: Don't know how I lived without it. Bought this with   Multi Charging Cable,JASTEK® 6.3 Inches Charging Cable with USB C Connecter, Lightning 8pin connecter, Micro USB and Mini USB Connector (1 piece Black)           and I use it for everything from my FitBit to my Phone and BlueTooth headphones(fit bit has it's own 6" cable).  I spend a lot of time hunting and fishing with limited access to electricity and this Is a great thing to have.
title: Don't know how I lived without it

author: lisa downham
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2018
review_content: I am so disappointed in this charger. We had a different charger for 3 years and used it almost daily but it was beginning to fail so i purchased this one. First off it took about 24 hours to charge it, which would be fine if the charger lasted. Before the end of the day, after charging the unit for only the third time, i could not charge my iPhone with it. The battery charger was dead. I tried to recharge but cut i twill no longer charge up. I chose to buy a more expensive charger since i thought it would last but this one didn’t even make it 2 months. I’ve always been an anker buyer because i trusted their products, this one makes me question future purchases.
title: I am so disappointed in this charger

author: MW
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
review_content: I bought this for a comping trip so that I would be able to charge my phone easily. It worked well at first, but now it won’t charge. I have had a few different items like this in the past, but I have never had one fail like this. They usually just lose capacity over time. It’s kind of a drag, because at least if the capacity goes down it is still usable. Since it won’t charge, it is now a nice black paperweight.
title: Worked at first, but died

author: Erin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2016
review_content: This charger is phenomenal. I had purchased one from another brand that wasn't living up to my expectations and was advised to check this one out. I returned the other charger I had and this one arrived in the mail a couple of days later. I have a Note 4 and can charge my phone multiple times before the power gets low on the charger, and I don't have to recharge the charger itself but every few days which is awesome. I was also excited to see that it came with a cable as the other charger I had purchased did not. The protective mesh pouch it came with is also a nice little bonus. The charger is a bit heavy, but what do you expect with all that power? In the event that something ever happens to the particular one I currently have, I will definitely be picking this one up again.
title: Highly recommend

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
review_content: I have had this for about 1.5 months and it performs as expected. Takes a while to charge but also seems to last a long time. I’ve used this to charge a few items from phones to portable speakers with no issue. It’s nice and heavy as it makes me feel it’s high quality and solid.
title: Performs as expected, solid and heavy charger.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
review_content: This charger is good for all of your charging needs. However, when I first received it, it took 2 days to fully charge. I can’t explain that one and it still takes a very long time to charge. It’s very heavy so I can’t carry it in a small nor medium-sized purse. I have to put it in a briefcase or roller bag. All in all, it does charge the devices well.
title: It takes too long to charge and it’s very heavy.

author: Brian
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2018
review_content: This is a great little charge for the price and you can't beat Anker's customer service. I initially had a problem with the charger I received and Anker customer support wasted absolutely no time in resolving the issue and my replacement works great, I couldn't be happier with the product and customer service.
title: Excellent product, excellent customer service!

author: Kris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2019
review_content: These portable chargers are the best! This is my second purchase.  This one is a bit larger and slightly heavier than my previous model but more powerful. Can't say enough how useful these are when traveling
title: Power, portable, reliable- it's got it all

author: Steven
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2019
review_content: Amazing! I take this ever time I travel or go camping, it saves me every time.I get about 4 full charges of my iPhone 7 Plus but honestly how often are you letting it get that low so it lasts about a week on topping up my phone

author: Oceandiva
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2018
review_content: Bought this for business and pleasure travel. I don’t  like hunting down a electrical socket or ports to charge my devices, It charges up my smartphone and iPad quickly without the hassle. Never a problem going thru airport security. Loved it so much I bought one for hubby.

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2018
review_content: Received this in the mail yesterday - had it charging overnight and it is still flashing on 50% battery. Tried a different outlet but it still won’t charge completely. The replacement has been working wonderfully - have charged my iPhone 3 times already and the battery pack still has 75% charge. Very satisfied with the product and the customer service.

author: Aries in CA
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2017

Will revise my review if it doesn't.

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
review_content: I bought this product to take on extended outdoor trips. I had the opportunity to use it once before it stopped charging my phones. The unit charges but fails to charge my iPhone. Be sure to test this before relying on it!!

author: Joshua's Joint
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
review_content: Solid bu fickle 🤷🏾‍♂️ Lol like... it takes a while to charge so I often leave with it less than full. And i always feel like it’s gonna flop on me but it never has... often I’ve left it uncharged for days and ran out and had it charge multiple phones in the clutch...the battery 🔋 is a tank.
title: I mean... it’s really good tho

author: Alex Yeger
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2018
review_content: This was a great battery back when i got it in 2016 and i was hoping it would last longer than it did. I used about 20 charges on it over the period of time with 5 phone charges each time. On average it still takes just as long to charge it, but it barely gets my phone to 80% when im not using it. The quality makes me disappointed in how temporary it is for the price.Update: As understandable that the battery may degrade over time, the Anker customer service team gathered some information about my situation and offered to send a replacement. 5 stars for the response and devotion towards the customer.
title: Good quality for a limited time. Customer Service is Unmatched!

author: A. Paeth
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2018
review_content: Update....Anker stepped up and sent a replacement for the replacement. Well see hiw it works 9 months from now...The first one I received was DOA....they sent a replacement which worked fine but now after 3 months one of the male inserts in a port just broke...

author: Sal rubio
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
review_content: Dead on arival waiting for customer service to respond besides that shipping was fast and easyUpdate customer service very helpful sent out new one very satisfied with the experience definetly will purchase there products again
title: Great customer service

author: Maneesha
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2019
review_content: The battery capacity is amazing.I wish it charged faster.It takes so long that I'd have to st least plug it in a day prior if I plan to use it for some tripSo it's not the perfect everyday charger. author: BMC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2018
review_content: My charger gave out.....i used it at work all the time...it would charge my galaxy 7 edge all the way ....and still have more juice to charge it again..dissapointed cuz more of their products work...5 stars if it would work anker reached out to me and fixed the problem..great customer service I got my replacement and I'm a happy customer

author: JA
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
review_content: One of the ports broke on first use.. I’ve purchased several of these anker powerbanks for the members of my house. This is the first one I’ve ever had an issue with.. This is the reason for the 2 stars. I will reach out to anker and hope they can send me a replacement

author: taly623
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2017
review_content: UPDATE! After a few uses, it completely stop charging my devices. Even though battery charges completely full, once I connect my iPhone, battery indicates no charge, like if the charge was drained in 5 seconds. So disappointed when I needed to charge my phone and this happens. I Barely used it, had it only for emergencies (hurricane season and family trips once a year) For the price I paid, I expected a long battery life. Very disappointed.Love it! Charges my iphone 7 plus almost 6 full charges!

author: Scott_H
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2016
review_content: I have only used the Anker a few times, but so far it performs as advertised. I believe it is well designed, a perfect size for the power it provides, and a very reasonable price. I charged an iPhone 6 and it was just like having it connected to the AC charger. In fact, I was impressed at how quickly I was able to charge the iPhone. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.

author: Anil
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2015
review_content: I am having this for about 2 months now. The charging speed has dropped. It used to charge my Note 3 so fast but today I saw that the charging is taking such a long time no where near the speed it charged a month back.The battery pack has all 4 blue lights on. It's fully charged.The return window is closed. Don't know what to do.Updated: Dec 09 2015:I am impressed with the customer service of Anker. Thanks for respecting our request and appreciate your prompt replies. I have got a replacement. I am positive it will be working as expected. I will update this review if need be. Thanks Anker.
title: I am having this for about 2 months now. ...

author: ppaddon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2019
review_content: Love the Anker quality and durability.  Takes a while to charge it fully, but once it is, it feels like it'll charge forever.  And quickly!  I swear it'll charge my iPhone 8 in 20 minutes flat.  My husband and I both now own one!

author: Lisa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2018
review_content: This product is fantastic for those long days when you don’t have access to a wall charger. It provides about 5 full charges to your phone when the pack is fully charged. My only complaint is that it takes days(literally) to charge up to full capacity. Another downside is the size and weight, it’s heavier than any other portable charger I’ve used.

author: Debbie K
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
review_content: Great on vacation. Everyone used it to charge their iPhones while camping. I don’t think it charges 8 times but it did charge about 4 or 5 - which is great to have when you need it. I love it! Peace of mind while traveling.
title: I love it!

author: Peter E.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
review_content: What cant I say about this charger. I love this charger for the fact that im always on the go and whenever I need my phone the most it always seems to be DEAD. which is where this comes into play. On one complete charge this battery pack can last me a full week and I promise you I charge my phone up to 2-3 time a day so this is super useful. The traveling pouch it comes with is super reliable and protects the charger. Only downside it needs to recharge over night but its so worth the wait.
title: definitely buy

author: Jason Allen
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2019
review_content: The part that plugs into the power bank bends easily and I tried to but just the cord and can’t find how ... and can’t reach anker to find out...  I travel out of state every other week for serious medical issues and rely on the power bank I love the power bank but I can’t afford to order whole new power bank each time to get a new cord like I have done twice now

author: Kevin Ma
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2018
review_content: Had this charger for over a year already. Purchased it for my trip to Asia and it worked perfectly, fast foward 18 months later, it wouldn't even charge my phone anymore. I tried everything from charging different devices to change the USB cables. Seems to me that I am not the only customer with this problem, it looks like  a few others have experienced the same. Very frustrated with this product.
title: it looks like a few others have experienced the same

author: anthony
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2020
review_content: Very good but but not so portable

author: ggskip
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2016
review_content: Holy cow!  I can charge my Samsung S5 four or five times off of this monster.  It has two full-size USB ports so you can plug two devices in at the same time.  Very sleek, and a bit heavy, but that's to be expected at this capacity.  Be sure to order the Anker wall charger to charge this or you'll be waiting a day or two before all four lights show that it's charged.  The Anker charger will have it fully charged in about five or six hours.

author: Steven Munoz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2017
review_content: This is the second one I have purchased from Amazon. I take mine on trips, camping, and also use at work.Pros: fast charging (IPhone 6s Plus), portable, numerous charges, convenienceCons: just takes a while to charge the battery.
title: This is the second one I have purchased from Amazon ...

author: Calvin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2019
review_content: This thing is amazing. When it’s fully charged, I’ve used it for over a month to keep my phone & tablet charged. I use it all the time and haven’t charged it since the 1st time I used it
