author: Simon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
review_content: I purchased this product hoping to have a reliable portable charger in case my phone needed it. I was very excited,  as this is a very sleek product, yet offers multiple charges. The item worked well for maybe two weeks before it began causing problems. The charger almost never works now, and has become very frustrating.
title: Stopped Working Shortly After Purchase

author: S Camacho
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2019
review_content: I received the item today; it came with a 50% charge. Unless, something has changed with Anker- I plugged in and the lights do not flash so I do not believe it is charging. I have checked plug for the source and it is working along w the cable.  Even when I plug into my phone it still shows only 2 lit up blue dots (again I had charged for a good amount of time)Really disappointed as needed it for a trip.I will be returning this product.
title: Not worthy of one star. Not charging?

author: Cliu
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2017
review_content: This thing is great. It holds enough power to charge my phone about 3 times, which says a lot considering my phone battery of over 6,000 mAh. I also love how it can charge up to 2 devices at once. Just remember that because of the large capacity, this thing can take a while to fully charge. It is somewhat big, but I almost always have a bag with me, so that is not an issue.
title: Great Power Bank

author: Anthony Boyev
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2018
review_content: This product not only survived, not only supported, but in fact helped facilitate a 38 day study trip to Japan in which countless people needed to charge their phones. I always let them share this, and recharged if every night. In places with few options to charge your phone which is draining battery because you're lost and constantly looking at Google Maps... This was absolutely invaluable. This is the best purchase I made for the trip. It never once ran out of charge. I estimate it could fully charge my phone from zero to one hundred percent three or four times on one charge. Incredible.If you're looking for a portable charger... buy this one.
title: Buy this portable charger now.

author: SMIMS
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2016
review_content: OK ... so I admit, I bought the Anker 2000mAh Portable Charger PowerCore because of the price.  I do travel occasionally for work and therefore the Anker 2000mAh does come in handy when I'm in need of a charge.  So far, the Anker 2000mAh has performed as advertised.  I've used it to charge both my iPhone 6 Plus and my iPad Air 2.  Something I've noticed, the Anker 2000mAh holds it's charge for a long time.  I can't say that I've timed this, but, I have gone several weeks without recharging it and it's always powered up my devices just fine.Overall I'd recommend the Anker 2000mAh to anyone looking for a portable charger for the devices.  It works great when traveling and does a great job holding it a charge in between charges.
title: Anker 2000mAh - Great Product, Works As Designed

author: Mike C.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2016
review_content: The product is O.K. but not as advanced in features as the advertising suggested . I 've used other Banker products that have delivered in the past, so I feel this charger was oversold.  That is not to say that its not solid because it is; but it's not exceptional. My biggest criticism, however, was the more than two weeks between ordering and receiving the product.  Had I known that more clearly upfront I would not have been force to track the shipment.  Now I have a better understanding of the value of buying "prime" items!
title: O.K. but not exceptional.

author: Billiardbob
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2020
review_content: I have used mine for about 3 years now. Still holds charge and can charge your phone battery about 3-4 times on one charge.  I have 2 and both have held up well.
title: 3 years strong.

author: Sabre Jet
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
review_content: Works for me. A bit too heavy to comfortably carry in my purse but can be done. I keep it in the console. Lasts a lot longer than my little one.
title: Works for me

author: Dan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
review_content: What a great value. This is one smart battery. It senses when a device(s) is plugged in and only charges until full then auto shuts off. It will last for days, maybe even a week depending on use.
title: Tremendous value

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2019
review_content: I bought this battery pack before hiking Kilimanjaro and it lasted the WHOLE 7 day trip. I used it to charge my iPhone 6 and found that as long as I left it in my sleepbag (warmer) at night it was totally fine.
title: Great Battery Pack for Hiking

author: Celebridaddy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
review_content: I have used this product for a few years now (lost my first one on a trip), and Anker recently sent me a brand new replacement because one of the USB ports got loose and wouldn't charge. I love this product and have purchased it for friends for their travels.
title: Great battery, and FANTASTIC warranty.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
review_content: Purchased for a 5-day backpacking trip. It charged multiple devices for 5 nights with juice left to spare. Just a tad bit heavier than I would like for an ultralight backpacking trip. Otherwise solid product
title: Lots of devices charged for 5 days with power to spare

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
review_content: This is a great portable charger but a little bigger and heavier than I expected. Great for use in the car but a little heavy for a suitcase especially if you like to travel light.
title: Portable charger

author: Natalie Pham
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2019
review_content: I was really excited to use this power bank because my sister had one. However, mine was defective and fully charged once before having to recharge the device itself again after maxing out its first round of portable charges with my phone. Afterwards, when I would try to charge it overnight, it would only go up to 1-2 out of the 4 bars of power. I tried plugging and unplugging the power bank, and then switching out cords, but it seemed like nothing worked. Hopefully, this isn’t a common occurrence for these power banks.
title: Worked its maximum potential once :/

author: dpdonahue
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2018
review_content: Purchased the over a year ago to take on vacation.  It has 2 usb ports so it was great having connection for both my phone and my wife's.  What I was really suprised by was how quickly it charged the phone and continues to charge it.  I highly recommend the lighting cable they sell to use to connect the charger to your phone.Service Warranty Department is 5 Star!On a recent outing with friends I found that one of the ports internal parts had broken off.  Upon contacting service they were super fast and very professional addressing my issue.  My wife has the smaller size and keeps it in her purse and love it too.This is my opinion is the only portable charger to buy.
title: Fast Charging & Amazing Service Department

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2016
review_content: It will not charge a tablet.  It will charge maybe 3 phones - iphone or google.  Thought it would be good for many more device charges per full chargeFollow up-this is a great company to deal with.  I was initially disappointed and they kept following up with me to improve my experience.  I finally found the time, they sent me another unit, no return, and the replacement is living up to my expectations for the original purchase.
title: great company to deal with and item works just as described.

author: Matt L.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2016
review_content: We used this extensively on a Disneyland trip and it was a lifesaver.  There are charging stations located all over Disneyland, but they are not always available and then you are tied down until your phone charges.  This allows you to charge on the go.  My Samsung Galaxy Note 4 with a 3220 mAh battery can get at least six full charges out of the charger before it needs charging itself.  If you travel where an electrical outlet is not always available, then this is a must if you want to keep your mobile devices alive.
title: This thing is a lifesaver.

author: TC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2016
review_content: The charger has been a life saver and I use it often. While a bit big and heavy it is great being able to charge multiple devices at once or in my case charge my phone multiple times before I have to charge it again. Let me also mention I get a quick charge with using this even when using my iPhone. The only draw back I have come to find is you do need a good wall charger to charge it and even with that it takes a full night to charge it.
title: Fast, Multiple Charges for Multiple Devices

author: Dylan Acuna
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
review_content: Bought this product back in April 2019. It worked great for me for a couple months, then one of the charging ports gave out on me while I was camping. It wasn’t the end of the world, but I was very disappointed with how quickly it gave out. I also read the reviews and saw this was a pretty common problem so I’m not surprised :( but overall very disappointed.
title: Works great...for a couple months

author: J Patterson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
review_content: This is my favorite of the Anker chargers! Three device Anker charger is too heavy and the one device charger has poor battery life. Due to traveling I have tried them all. This is the best!
title: Best of Anker chargers

author: E. Myers
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2017
review_content: Works perfectly.  Tons of capacity.  It gets one star taken away because when charging it will not pass power through and charge attached devices at the same time.  I would like to be able to plug it in (with my phone connected for charging) so that both are always ready with a full charge in the morning.  I have to have a separate wall adapter and plug (and travel with two accordingly).  Super annoying.
title: Great with one major miss

author: Steven Prince
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2018
review_content: I bought this charger this past June because i did a three week trip in Europe and wanted a reliable charger throughout the trip. I loved it and I was able to charge my phone quite a few times before I had to charge the charger itself. Sadly after four months, my charger is no longer charging my phone. I have charged the battery overnight, and still nothing. I expected it to last much longer for the amount of money I paid for it. Definitely disappointed.
title: Started out strong but then disappointed

author: Ryan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2017
review_content: I have bought more than a few external batteries. Truth be told, I'm one of those people that start panicking when my batteries get under the 50% mark.And while I have always appreciated Anker, the higher price always through me a bit.Never again.After trying out two other reputable brands, I realized just how good the technology in Anker products are. The rate at which batteries are recharged are nowhere near to what this particular battery can do. And the number of recharges? Don't even know because I got tired after trying it out when I recharged an iPhone battery 5 times in a day.Finally, Anker recently sent me a new one of these after a cracked shell made an airport worker nervous and they made me dispose of the original battery. Truly top notch customer service. Loyal Anker customer from now on.
title: I realized just how good the technology in Anker products are

author: osubeav21
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2017
review_content: Very powerful and handy. I keep this always in the trunk of my car for emergencies or when I am away from home. After leaving it in there for 2 months, I used it today and it still had a full charge. It can recharge my phone many times before needing recharging itself. Much more powerful than most of the ones in the stores. It has saved me many times.
title: A charger worth every penny.

author: lkimee
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2017
review_content: I love Anker batteries! I have never had a problem with their product and when I did they were more than willing to exchange the product within the year I had it.I also own Anker Astro which has 13000mAh and lasts about 2 1/2 charges with my current phone. I needed an upgrade to this one because I play PokemonGo and it was killing my phone so fast. I am able to play about 2-3 days without charging the PowerCore. I am very happy I got it.Pro:Battery Life2 usb portsSleek and thinner than I thought it'd beCon:No flashlight function like the AstroQuite a bit of weight to it but to be expected
title: I'd buy it again

author: Seabeelarry
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2016
review_content: This has changed our travels forever!We just got back from a 10 day Europe vaca.Using our iPhones as cameras, GPS and a journal killed our batteries.But I was able to charge numerous times, many from -10% to 90%+ in a matter of minutes...usually while sitting for a quick bite.A couple of times, we had to charge 2 at a time, and still had plenty power for our long 10-12 hour site seeing days.
title: Amazing!

author: Liz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2017
review_content: This charger worked like a charm. I purchased this power bank for my trip to Colorado. At one point I FULLY charged my GoPro and my iPhone 6S in one charge. On another instance, it charged my iPhone 6s FULLY 3 times before it had to be charged again. It took about 45 min to fully charge, and that was with me using it while charging. It's a little heavy, but i don't mind it. It also comes with a little pouch. I highly recommend this item!
title: Charged Multiple Items at once!

author: KF
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2020
review_content: It charged once, didn’t last long and never worked again. Have only had it for a little over a month (long enough to miss the replacement window).
title: Didn’t work

author: Jerry Manapat
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: I've been using this portable charger for a week now. I'm really impressed on how much power I can charge from this device. I was able to charge 2 phones and a tablet...and still have enough juice for other devices.My only gripe with this is the weight. I understand that for a 20000mAh charger, it's going to be huge but it is nice and compact. The size is about the same as a macbook battery (the old macbooks).I highly recommend this product. Wish it was a little lighter in weight but I can't complain. If I can charge more than 3 devices w/ some power left to spare, then this is a keeper.
title: Great packaging and sleek design! Love it!

author: Supplemena
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
review_content: I get 3-4 full charges on my Samsung Note 9 and it takes an hour or two to fully charge. Great stuff.
title: Great charger

author: Clint Miller
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2020
review_content: I use this for hunting with my kids. They take I pads and I charge my phone. Takes a couple full days in the blind before it needs charged
title: Very good

author: Amanda Lee Souza
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
review_content: Used on a trip to Europe with 5 kids & 2 adults with electronics. LIFESAVER!! We used all day & never ran out of power. Charged at night while we slept.
title: Great buy.

author: Angela Migues
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
review_content: I love this charger!  I only give it four stars because it takes forever to charge to the full four blue lines.  The charger does hold the charge a good while.
title: Love This Charger!

author: Alejandro
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
review_content: Lo mejor de lo mejor sin duda la volvería a comprar y la recomiendo, muy sólida y carga muy bien.Tal vez agregaría un mejor cable para cargarla. Es muy corto el q viene
title: The best of the best

author: Joeriggs@optonline.net
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2018
review_content: Has this for five months and used it to charge a couple devices.  Charged the battery full when I received and worked great for two months; only used it a few times when necessary, charged it again then worked for the next two months and now will not charge at all and non functioning.  I assume the battery life should be longer than six months but not in my case.Contacted the company and replaced the battery and have a good return policy.  The replacement worked as expected and no hassle returns.  Changed my disappointment to satisfaction.
title: Works Great for only a Couple Months

author: Wayne Corder
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2019
review_content: I have an Iphone with battery issues and was going to Blizzcon so I obviously couldn't have a afford to have a dead phone.  It stayed hooked up to my phone probably half the day and the power indicator light never went below 75%.  Keep in mind that with a  battery pack this big if you drain it the recharge time is probably going to be over 12 hours.
title: Blizzcon Approved!!

author: Ava A.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
review_content: Two days after the day I could have returned this item the charger started flickering on and off when I was charging. Very disappointed. The first 30 days were great but definitely not worth the amount I had to pay for it.
title: Disappointed

author: Michael N.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2017
review_content: On November 29th I purchased a portable battery for my iPhone. I have been using it and it has worked well until recent.I plugged in the battery after heavy use and bringing the battery down to 1 blue light. I let it charge over night. The next evening ( over 11 hrs later ) the battery only charged to 3 blue lights out of 4. I let it charge until the next morning just in case it needed more time. It was still at 3 blue lights next morning. I unplugged it in fear of over charging it. I used it the next day to charge an iPhone and after about 30 minutes, it went down to 2 blue lights. It did not take long for it to go back to 1 blue light.I have purchased replacement batteries for my previous phone (Galaxy Note 4) and even those did not discharge that quick even after 1 year of using it.
title: Worked very well at first, 2 months later not so much.

author: Melissa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2019
review_content: It's a great battery and lasts long, but for traveling is too heavy and bulky. When I'm traveling and I know that I'll be walking a lot, I bring small pursues but this battery barely fits with my phone.
title: Too heavy / bulky

author: Christiane Sparagowski
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2017
review_content: This is an amazing product.  I have one myself and use it all the time.  I've even ordered about 10 for people I work with.  This has come in handy I don't know how many times whether I'm traveling or helping someone move out of a house that has no electricity.  I recommend this product to everyone I know.  I've not a single problem with this item.  I highly recommend getting one.  It will come in handy when you least expect it and you will wind buying one for everyone you know.  I keep mine in my purse and carry it every where.  Buy one!  You won't regret it.
title: BUY ONE!  Heck buy 2!

author: Daisy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2018
review_content: I’ve only used this charger a few times, but it’s amazing! It takes time to charge once you first receive it (it comes halfway charged), but the battery seems to last a very long time! I’m going to bring it with me to a concert I’m going to this weekend and on all of my hiking trips :)
title: Long lasting battery—get it!!!

author: AZViperDrvr
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2017
review_content: Great product at a great price!  Have several smaller capacity Anker chargers that I use when traveling but I spend as much time recharging those as my PEDs.  This charger has two USB charging ports and I can charge multiple phones multiple times as well as ipads before it needs recharged.  Couldn't be more pleased.
title: Great product at a great price! - Win

author: Kory Florence
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2019
review_content: WOW this product is an absolute life saver for me and my family. Between school and sports, my phone is constantly drained. I've owned this product for two years now and I would not recommend any other brand. Even after an accident going through the washer it still works as if it was brand new.For travel it is very nice and you can slide it into a pocket but it is on the large size so may need to move pocket items around.
title: WOW

author: DanK
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2018
review_content: No complaints.  All our Anker product purchases have turned out good.  I liked that I could charge my phone and a friend's with enough amperage to get both phones fully charged in about an hour.  Probably has enough juice to do 5-7 full charges on a typical cell phone.
title: Plenty of power

author: RadiatTionz
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2018
review_content: I used it while studying abroad for a month in Spain, and it never died even if I only charged it like for 6 nights. I’ve dropped it like 2 twice so far and it still works properly and it has no scratches. It’s really useful for any situation, I take it to college everyday, and even though I don’t use it everyday, it is very convenient to have, especially knowing that the battery will last long.
title: Great product! Recommend buying!

author: Matthew Yoder
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2019
review_content: I had an issue with my initial purchase, but the Anker customer support team was absolutely top-notch. They sent me a new one no questions asked and I absolutely love it. When I go on weekend trips, this charger is all I need. A TON of battery life and I even look like the hero when lending some charge to a friend in need. Would HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone looking for a great charger at an affordable price
title: This thing is a beast!!

author: Michelle Cramer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
review_content: Wow! Love this product! It can charge up to 2 devices using usb chargers. It's slender and compact. It doesn't come with a plug in to change the Anker, just a charger you plug into a USB port. Highly recommend for long lasting use and easy charging of devices.
title: Slender, compact, and worth every dollar!

author: Jake
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018
review_content: I bought this charger thinking what everyone thinks its too good to be true! It charges your iphone super fast i timed it and its between 1-2 minutes per percent charge. I highly recommed buying this charger if your in college or even just a student in high school. You could even charge your phone and a friends phone at the same time. This is also good for taking to the beach to the day. It also came with a nice soft slide on case that you can tighten up so it doesnt fall out.
title: Best Portable Charger Ever!!

author: Preemie's parents
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2019
review_content: It works great. It charges other devices well. It's just a bit heavy so it is not as portable as we would like.
title: Does the job

author: kalabook
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
review_content: I got about 4 charges from 0% battery with an iPhoneX. Would buy again.
title: Worth it!

author: Rusty Pennington
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
review_content: This would be the third battery that I have purchased. I love all three of them. Even the one that died to water damage. The only reason I didn't give it all five stars, is because it takes forever to charge.  Other than that It lives up to everything I use it for which is for phones tablets and a laptop in dire emergencies
title: Great battery

author: Kalie Briggs
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2018
review_content: The first battery I received I had trouble getting it to charge, I contacted the sellers and they immediately sent me a replacement that is working great!  I've used it to charge my phone several times and it still has battery life remaining. Will definitely buy again!
title: Great customer service!!

author: Socrates
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2018
review_content: I purchase this device almost more than a year ago, the device just stopped charging and providing any power, I contacted Anker support and after verifying that my device wasnt working and was still under warranty they send me a new one without a lot of questions, just a couple of pictures of the battery connected and not taking power, great after purchase customer service and other than this issue the battery is great it charge my cellphone pretty fast even connecting 2 devices doesnt cause any issue and it holds a lot of power.
title: Great customer service cor a great device.

author: Krishantha
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2015
review_content: this is heavy than expected. that is not seller issue. that is my expectation issue :)Update:Anker is proven BEST after sales experience i ever had. in that case i can highly recommend them to have business. because they do care your satisfaction than money.Above mention product is performance wise good. but if you are looking for small handy easy to carry product then you should go with A1211 product. that is low capacity (5200) but its very handy and easy to handle. specially if you buy this for a girl that should be your choice.I am updating my rating for this model
title: Three Stars

author: One Mayan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2018
review_content: I take this everywhere. I have several anker products and it's because its quality. I have bought several charger before this one only to be very disappointed with the time it needed to charge and the time it took to charge my devices. This one is the fastest by far.
title: Fast charging all the way around.

author: Alexa
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2019
review_content: I bought this portable charger after making a lot of research , here what I got .. I charged my phone 70% before going to sleep 11pm  , I woke up in the morning 6 am and it’s 1% ... How??? called costumer support today in the morning , problem fixed!  i m satisfied ! Thanks !
title: great costumer support!

author: BB
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2018
review_content: I had been using my Anker charger for over a year and it worked great.  My husband and I were able to charge our iPhones multiple times over a few days before needing to recharge the unit.  One day the unit stopped working.  I contacted Anker, and they were great.  They felt there was a problem with the battery and sent me a replacement charger, which so far is working perfectly like my original unit.  I hope we don’t run into any problems again, but I am grateful for the excellent customer service!  Would recommend!
title: Great customer service!

author: YC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2016
review_content: I have been buying their braided lightning cords and their chargers for quite a while now. They are fantastic. I received this package promptly. The reason I bought this because I was traveling in Germany and my iPhone was about to die. The lady sitting next to me pulled this charger out and said, Here you can use my charger. I was able to charge my phone and the charger still had a lot of juice.
title: Great products by Anker. Reliable. Great quality.

author: NikJamez6
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2019
review_content: This was the best charger! It has the longest battery life and always came in clutch when I needed it the most. Would charge my battery almost fully every time I would use it and I could charge my iPhone X about 4 times on one charge of the external battery. Lightning speed charging and super slim to fit anywhere I needed it! This is a must product to buy!!!
title: SUPER FAST,LONG LASTING,SUPER CHARGER

author: Robin Barrett
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2018
review_content: Ordered this for a camping trip and it works great. We were in places where there were no outlets and this was an essential item to keeping our devices charged. Charges devices quickly. Unit holds a long charge. Size is compact. Durable. Recommend it.
title: Charges quickly. Good quality. Recommend.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2019
review_content: Built out of sturdy materials and charges my phone very quickly and several times on one charge. Has 2 high speed USB ports for quick charging. As always, Anker delivers a superior product that I would highly recommend to anyone.
title: Great product. Still in use and not showing signs of slowing down.

author: Devin Setiawan
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2015
review_content: This battery pack stays on after 5 days of camping trip! I use it solely to charge my phone and play music with it! The small profile makes it easy to fit anywhere. It is also light, in comparison with other battery pack with the same power capacity. It charges super fast! I dropped it a few times but it still works fine! Def recommended for the price and power. Can't go wrong with this!*Update: I have use this battery pack to also charge my gopro, dslr camera, tablet, and fan when I went camping this past weekend! I still came home with 1 dot left on the power indicator!!!
title: Top of the Line Awesome

author: Judy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2016
review_content: I needed a high capacity power pack since my phone's old and dies quickly, and this was just what I was looking for. I read reviews to other chargers and I decided to pick this because I wanted something that's robust and could last for multiple charges. It takes an entire night to fully charge the battery, but it can charge multiple batteries and normally lasts me around 2 weeks (depending on how often I use it). I love it and it's very convenient. It was larger and heavier than I thought it would be, but I would pick a robust and heavy charger over a light one that gets damage easy.
title: Love it!

author: Jyri Kidwell
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2017
review_content: Piece of junk. I had to return my first one because it wouldn't hold a charge. I got a new one that worked well for a few months... but now it will not work because both connections to the cable are broken. Don't waste your money. I wish I could get a refund.
title: DO NOT BUY

author: Trent
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2016
review_content: Pros:+ Has a high capacity. I can usually get 6 Charges on my Moto X+ The design is nice and slender and it fits well in my bookbagCons:- It takes up to 3 hours to charge my phone. I consider myself spoiled though because I am use to a quick-charger charging my phone in 20 minutes- The cable that comes with it to charge your devices is made of really cheap quality. I highly recommend using a different cable- It doesn't come with a charger that plugs into wall. I know its not advertised with one but it would still be nice- It doesn't handle charging two things at once well at all. I tried charging my Moto X and my friends Galaxy at the same time and it didn't work at all.
title: I can usually get 6 Charges on my Moto X + The design is nice and slender and it fits well in my bookbag ...

author: shopmanlerxt
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2017
review_content: Works well. I've powered GoPro cameras and digital audio recorders for days between charges. I'm not a super frequent user but I've used it for a year and it's been flawless for everything I've thrown at it.I have several Anker products and their customer service has been impressive! Solid company.Two thumbs up!
title: Solid and reliable. Two thumbs up!

author: Carol
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2015
review_content: Buy the mAH size that you want but don't look for a cut rate deal. Buy quality as a poor quality charger can be unsafe and damage your device, cord or worse, I know because it happened to me. Buy quality because it is safer!!! Anker products are very high quality and reasonably priced. in my opinion........... its all about value and there is vale in being safe. I have the anker phone case and 5200 mAH as well...all work very well.
title: Buy quality in this case its the best value as well.

author: H. Faridi
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2016
review_content: I have used it many times now and this continues to amaze me of its power and also the ability to store the power for a long time. You do not have to keep it plugged in to have it useable whenever you need it. I surely recommend for others and would buy again when needed.This is a great power brick. Not very heavy but has a ton of juice to power up the devices. I haven't had any issues with it so far.
title: This is a great power brick

author: Monica Perez
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2019
review_content: Slow to recharge power bank. Even with matching brand lightening cable it dies not recharge the iPad as quickly as our previous power bank. Expensive and not worth the price tag.
title: Better power banks for better price out there

author: steven cline
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2016
review_content: I had used the "free" portable chargers that are given out as marketing trinkets, and they were always disappointing.  Truth is, they never seemed to have a charge when I needed them.  (As an aside: why do people use cheap poor quality products for marketing?  They'll put their company's name on a cheap pen that falls apart a week later.  Great idea! associate your company with a piece of junk that falls apart in a week!)Far from the freebies, but still very inexpensive is this Anker Portable Charge.  It looks good, it works great, and with the push of a button, I can get an idea of how much more I can use it before I have to recharge it.  I have used it to recharge my phone several times before having to recharge it.
title: Finally a great dependable portable charger.

author: bigk1902
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020
review_content: This thing takes like 16 hours to charge fully, but will charge my phone (very quickly) 5 full charges and holds its charge for a long time. I take it to work with me every day just in case!
title: Exactly what I was looking for

To complement this, I would recommend purchasing an Anker 24W dual USB wall charger PowerPort 2.

author: Neil H. Ackerman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2018
review_content: I'm changing my review again.  I had a problem with the product (It was delivered to me on June 7 and was great at first,  but after less than 2 monthS,  it totally stopped working), but I got in touch with Anker, the manufacturer, delivered a new battery pack to me today.Charging it now.We shall see...I am very happy that Anker responded so extraordinarily quickly to my issue, and Is going above and beyond to make things right asap.

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2017
review_content: In the excitement of finally purchasing a external battery/battery bank, I didn't realize this is only for devices that don't have adaptive fast charging. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 5 that uses fast charging, but when I plugged my phone into this device it charges at a slower rate. If you have a Samsung Galaxy flagship you know the fast charging capability cuts a full 3 hours charge down to an hour & a half. My phone is quite old & I don't need anything slowing down its charging time. I will be exchanging this version for their Quick Charge 3.0 version.
title: NOT for FAST CHARGING

author: Ashley
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2018
review_content: I had some problem with the product but decided to just wait it out as it may not be an actual problem with the battery but the return window on amazon closed so I emailed their customer service and they replied promptly and properly. They sent me a replacement at no cost and it works perfectly! It also is a high quality and heavy duty battery that you can take on flights without exceeding most airlines’ limit.
title: Excellent, heavy duty battery for flights; Customer service is excellent as well!

author: Rojo
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2017
review_content: I got this package on time on Friday morning, fully charged it by the afternoon, and recharged my iPhone 6s at least six times from low battery levels (10-30%) between Friday and Sunday. I haven't recharged it yet since the initial recharge, and the indicator is telling me it's still over 75% capacity. This may be one of my favorite purchases in recent years. It's a little on the large side; it's longer and a bit thicker than an iPhone, but I think that's expected. Definitely recommend for anyone that will be using their phone extensively over a long period of time without the convenience of plugging in to a wall outlet.

date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2018
review_content: After I wrote the below review, Anker contacted me and sent me another charger for free and didn’t even ask for the original one to be returned. Overall the build quality seems high, however one gripe is that after only 2 weeks of mild use the micro-USB charging port has become touchy like there is a loose solder or something - it only charges if you put slight upward pressure on the port. If they fixed this issue I would highly recommend buying, but as it stands I can't recommend this product.

author: MY

review_content: I'm a big fan of Anker products because of their sleek design and general reliability. For the first time ever, I had an Anker product stop working, but my experience was still fantastic.When for some reason my battery stopped charging my products, I knew I could reach out to customer service and they would help me out right away. Anker's satisfaction guarantee is something they take very seriously, and they quickly sent me a replacement battery when I came to them with my problem. I'm happy to say that this battery works just as perfectly and I'll keep coming back to Anker
title: A+ Customer Service

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2018
review_content: Worked great for a couple of months. Just about a week ago it completely stopped charging my phone. Actually hooked my phone up to the charger on a 15-20 minute drive and it WENT DOWN 2%. I'm out of the country at the moment (the reason I bought this in the first place) and I hope when I get home it's not too late to return this useless waste of money
title: Worked great for a couple of months

author: Chris
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2018
review_content: So I got this primarily to recharge my iPad in between ball games. It takes my older iPad from say 40% to 100% in about an hour. After it charged it, it still had 75% charge left which is great imo. It’s a little heavy but well worth flexibility it offers on charging.
title: Great and fast

author: Jiu-Jitsu Motivation
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2018
review_content: Changing my review because they sent me a replacement and now my charger works perfectly ! Of course I had to have defective one but the new one they sent me works perfect ! So happy, thank you !!! ..Charger gets really hot and takes forever to charge my friend has same one and it doesn’t take that long to charge fully. I think mines defective looking for a replacement please. It’s a great product and my friend has one and loves it however mine is not good.
title: Got a replacement

author: bl foster
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2016
review_content: Received one of these as a gift then gave one, and that person, gave one, and on and on it goes.  These are GREAT.  Good for the car, power outages, etc.  Powers my cell phone faster than home electric.  Easy to use, easy to power up (usb to cpu), and happy with use.  Only negative is weight.  I have carried it in my purse and charged my phone while shopping....it is heavy!!
title: These are GREAT. Good for the car

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2019
review_content: I am normally going be to love and have nothing but positive stuff to say about anker, but this times different. I just purchased this charger, and I am getting the error that this is not an Apple supported device. I am using a official Apple charger that I got when I purchased my iPhone. I have to unplug the charger and plug it back in may times for it to charge right. Anker I have always used your products for many years now, this puts a very sour taste in my mouth.
title: Hesitant to purchase again...

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2017
review_content: This charger is fast. And it can last for days without being recharged. I've charged my phone, and a feimda puone, to 100 percent in a matter of a few days, and the device is it my at 50 percent battery. Its lasts for a long time, is quite durabke, and is worth the purchase. I especially like that the blue lights indicate the battery remaining. When all 4 blue lights shine, you have a full charger, when 3 shine, you have 75 percent remaining and so on.
title: AMAZING

author: Chelsie Garrett
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2017
review_content: This power bank has saved my life so many times! As an entrepreneur working 90% of my business in my "mom pockets" on the go from my phone, i often found myself with 0% battery life. In steps this little guy. Life. Saver.I have recommended this product to so many people on my team looking for a portable charging solution!
title: I have recommended this product to so many people on my team ...

author: Michelle Half
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2018
review_content: Don’t waste your money. Portable charger worked great the first 10 times I used it within 60 days, and now it won’t work. It shuts off and won’t stay on. Have tried many times and it is junk!!!  So for 10 uses, I’m better off buying a $3 cord and plug to carry in my pocket and just find a wall of 12v somewhere.
title: Don’t waste your money

author: Trillion
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2018
review_content: Charges nearly as fast as though my Moto G5 were plugged into via its turbocharger, also quickly charges my Samsung tablet without the "unrecognized charger" message  So far, I am really, REALLY happy with this portable charger.
title: Impressive

author: M. Simon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2019
review_content: I researched and bought this because it was supposedly going to provide 5-7 charges on my iPhone with one full Anker charge. I’m lucky if I get two charges out of this device ...which won’t even get me through a day
title: Doesn’t work

author: David B.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2019
review_content: Never had a quality battery like this and I am not disappointed. Lasts several charges of my iPhone 8. I love the bag that comes with it. Just enough room to stick a the micro USB, type-C, and lightning cables in there for traveling
title: Great for travelling

author: RNorgman
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2016
review_content: When I first received the package it was missing everything except for the battery.  There was no cable, mesh bag, instructions, etc.  I contacted Anker and they jumped right on the issue.  I had all of the missing parts in a couple of days at no charge.  Great service!The power supply works great, I haven't used it much yet as I always have a charged phone for the day and I don't use my tablet much.  However when I do use it the battery works really well.  I could easily charge my phone 5 or 6 times.  (I have a Galaxy S 5).  I'll be glad to have it when I go overseas this summer on vacation!The only take back I have is that you have to buy a wall charger separately... You would think they could make a standard one and throw it in the box as well but they don't.  Not a big deal, but it would be nice.Overall a great product and great customer service!
title: Great service! The power supply works great

author: Brandon Hutton
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
review_content: Highly recommended power bank. It holds a charge for a LONG time. I can charge my Samsung S10 four times on a single charge. It does have some weight to it, but not an issue for me personally. I've traveled to Africa & Europe with this and never had an issue with TSA. Just make sure to pack it on your carry-on.
title: Worth every penny!

author: shawn z
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2016
review_content: My "Anker 2nd Gen Astro E5 20100mAh" stopped working last month. And Anker sent me a replacement real quick. replacement is working fineso far. I'll update in a couple months. I gave it four stars only because the other one (defected one) started losing it's charge eventually.. meaning it stopped charging fast (went from 1 hour full charge to where it started to take 3 hours to fully charge my device). I like Anker's Products tho. I wish them and Samsung would partner up and work on accessories without over pricing their stuff (because Samsung's stuff is wayyyyyy too overpriced.. it's just ridiculous).
title: I like Anker's Products tho

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2016
review_content: I've tried multiple portable chargers before and this one is the only one I would recommend to everyone. I have a Galaxy s6 and I can charge my phone 7 times from 0% to 100% before I need to charge the charger. A problem I had with other brands is that it wouldn't charge the phone while in use, just keep it at the same percentage. But this one will consistently go up while in use and also does it quickly! Even while having two phones plugged in, they will charge at the same rate. (have tried with a galaxy s6 and an iPhone 6)  The only thing I would complain about is that charging the Charger itself, fully takes about 22 hours. I suggest giving it a full day before you go on a trip or have an event where you know you'll be using your phone a lot. It's hardly a problem unless your phone dies 6 times in a day.
title: Best Portable Charger I've Bought

author: Jack Roberts
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020
review_content: I've had a quite a few portable chargers over the years. This is as good as any in terms of # of iphone charges per full battery charge. I have a iphone Xs and can charge it fully 5-6 times with this battery.Not the lightest or smallest, but worth the weight.
title: Great Charger

author: P. S.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2016
review_content: I've owned a few battery banks but this one takes the cake. I'll keep the review short and sweet.Pros:Connections all on the top - makes it so easy to access everything even if its inside its pouch or in your pocket, etc.Instant-On - other chargers I've used have required pressing a button after plugging in your phone. Once you plug it in, its starts charging immediately.Small/Slim size - the size is remarkably small. I own a 3 or so year old anker 10,000mah that is double the size.microUSB charging - this is huge. My previous anker had a proprietary charger that was a tiny circular plug. I left it at a hotel I was at and was forced to use the cigarrette lighter adapter so after that I knew I had to replace it. Micro usb to charge the bank is a no-brainer.Fast charging: this is the fastest charging battery bank I've used. Its extremely impressiveCons:no loop for attaching it to a bag in any way - not a deal breaker by any means, but its nice to clip on your batter bank to keep it secure."pouch/case" is a mesh bag - I would have liked a more robust case, but at the same time it works because I use it to keep the bank and cables inside and can pull them out when I need them without having a mess of cables.Price - its a bit more expensive than other battery banks, but I think the features and design justify it.Conclusion: 10/10 this is the best battery bank on the market right now. I think anker really nailed it on this one. It has all the features I was looking for in a charging bank and its charging speed is incredible.
title: Best portable charger I've used so far.

author: married2abikeguy
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
review_content: Love this phone charger, carries a large charge & charges phones quickly.
title: Great portable battery

author: WF
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
review_content: I have used this charging  device for several international travel flights and it works perfectly. The devices charge quickly and the battery life bar is a very nice feature.
title: Perfect for travel

author: Garo Manjerian
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2019
review_content: Great product still using it, it will turn off charging once you reach 100% which is great but also you might wake up in the morning to find your phone is not at 100%
title: Awesome product highly recommend

author: TP from AZ
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2016
review_content: First of all, the device was about 80% charged when I got it. So, basically it was useable out of the bow. I use my Apple iPad Pro quite a bit along with my iPhone 6S Plus and not usually near a 110vac outlet. Plugging into the charger is very convenient; it will give 2-3x charges to both devices before it too needs charging with about 25% remaining. The charger slips nicely into my pack and can be taken anywhere.
title: The charger slips nicely into my pack and can be taken anywhere

author: wpbk04
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2018
review_content: Just ordered a month ago and charger has already stopped working. Unfortunately I'm just days outside of the return date. What a "coincidence". Don't waste your money.Update: I've changed my previous review from one to five stars. The change is due to Anker's prompt, professional and exceptional customer service!  They emailed me right away, replaced my charger and even followed up to make sure I was happy. The replacement is working perfectly! It charges my Samsung S8 very quickly and will fully charge my S8 at least three times before the Anker needs any charging. Thank you Anker! Good service does still exist!
title: Changed rating from one to five stars!!!

author: KFS
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2017
review_content: I was wondering if I had a need for a battery based charging system, but found this to be incredibly useful.  Have charged my iPhones several (4-5) times from a single recharge of the battery pack.  Nice that I can charge phone, wireless speaker, watch, without having a 110v line handy.  Like having access to the power grid when you're away form it.
title: but found this to be incredibly useful. Have charged my iPhones several (4-5) times from ...

author: Deborah
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2019
review_content: What I did not like: it would charge my phone once and maybe twice but then, wouldn't charge any more.  Lghts were clearly on indicating that there was more power avlbl but it wouldn't charge my phone.
title: Stopped charging even though still full.

author: kebanks
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2018
review_content: The portable itself will not go past the 3rd light on charge. I thought I'd wait 2wks to see if it would make a difference, but as of yet, the charger still will not go past the 3rd light, which leads me to believe its faulty and will probably stop working sooner than expected. It's a little sad considering that all the reviews state that it is great, but it came with a defect from the start. Quite disappointed.
title: The Portable DOES NOT charge all the way. Does not go past the 3rd light when being charged.

author: Chris Atkinson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2018
review_content: I bought this a little over two years ago, I had a small issue where a slightly damaged usb cord managed to start going in one of the ports upside down while I was plugging it in in the dark, but that port still works perfectly, despite the contacts being bent slightly inside. The battery life isn't noticeably lower than when I first got it. Despite some drops over the years the case is still in pretty good shape.I've never had any overheating issues, even while charging two devices at once. I would definitely buy this again if I found that I needed another one for any reason.
title: This thing is built to last

author: shivalm
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2019
review_content: We've used this several times since receipt. We charge our android phones most often and always bring this with us. It gives a lot of charge and is made of durable material. Would purchase again if needed.
title: We take this everywhere.

author: Samuel Wilson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2018
review_content: Its much bigger and heavier that i'd have guessed.  I was hoping that more mAh meant that they were packing more cells into a small space using better technology.  But they just increase the size - which may make it not as practical as i was hoping for travel.
title: Bigger than Expected

author: Cheryl Dickerson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2019
review_content: This product is everything you want it to be. We used it 13 hours at Disney to keep the phones charged and it worked perfect. It has a slender build perfect for travel. I'm going to order them for family for the Holiday's.

author: CF FL
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2017
review_content: I am thrilled with this charger. I have started to use it to charge my phone when I'm in a rush, because it works so quickly, faster than wall outlet. It takes over a day or so to fully charge it the first time, and boy can it hold a lot of charge!! I highly recommend this. Well worth the money.
title: Excellent product. Charges cell phones very quickly.

author: Jason Z.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2016
review_content: Works beautifully to charge my cellphone, tablet, Bluetooth headphones, whatever I need charged via USB. I have been able to get between 3-4 full charges out of this for my old phone (Lumia 1520). I have recently switched to a Moto G4 and have full confidence that I will be able to get at least the number of charges out of it. It has also charged my Dell Venue Pro 8 once completely with plenty of power left over. It appears to be super durable as I have already dropped it from about waist high onto asphalt and a cement floor with no real damage and it is still kicking! Just be prepared for it to take 20-24 hours to charge the portable battery back up once depleted - and that is using a wall charger. I wouldn't even want to try charging it up with a PC USB port!
title: Works beautifully to charge my cellphone

author: SC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
review_content: Fairly good lasting power but very bulky to carry around in your pocket
title: Fairly good lasting power but very bulky to carry around in your pocket

author: rayfrhd
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
review_content: This product was one of the few 20000 mAH backup batteries I found to be available at a reasonable price. It's too soon for me to actually rate the product. Charging to full capacity took about 16 hours with the included cable and a standard phone charger block. I haven't yet used it to charge a phone or an iPad.

author: Jamie Nixon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2019
review_content: This block gives me at least 4-5 iphone charges. I have used this on camping trips, travel, work conferences, music festivals. I rarely leave the house without it. author: JSKW3
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2018
review_content: This battery can charge my phone multiple times. I have traveled overseas with it, even though it is a little heavy in the bag, it makes up for it when I am not near power and thing thing has plenty.  Charge time is a little long, think overnight instead of over lunch.
title: Great Portable power source

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2020
review_content: This charger is seriously a life saver. It is a little heavy and it takes a long time to fully charge itself but ITS SO WORTH IT. Used it on a trip to NYC and was so nice to never have to worry about my phone dying because of this charger. It's also pretty sleek so at time i even had it in my back pocket and could easily use my phone while charging. Really good charger, definitely worth the buy.

author: sarita
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2017
review_content: it doesn't work! what a waste of money - I own an iphone 6+ and nothing charged...

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
review_content: Bought this clock for a deployment, and it worked great for about 8 months, other than the ridiculously slow recharge rate. It got the job done, but about a year after owning this it started to lose the ability to recharge. I’ve taken well care of it and now it is completely useless as it will not charge.Hopefully their products have improved by now, but I have read many reviews stating similar issues with these power banks.

author: Aya
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2017
review_content: Only worked for about 6 weeks or so then died... it was a great charger until it completely stopped working.**Edit 10/29/17 - Customer Service is stellar.  They reached out after my initial review and sent me a replacement unit.  I’m happy to report back that my faith in their products has been restored.  The charger works great and customer service was extremely helpful in diligent in being sure the replacement unit was working ok.  I definitely recommend their products!
title: Died after a while

author: Justin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2019
review_content: Worked great for 2 years. Stopped taking a charge last night. Highly disappointed that it is messing up now. I had hoped that it would last forever and unfortunately I'm past the 18 month warranty. We lose power a lot at my house and this was a life saver to keep my phone charged and to power a USB fan. Wish it didn't stop working.
title: Wish it lived forever.

author: maged hamed
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2017
review_content: I only got a box containing the power bank and I DID NOT GET  the Micro USB cable, travel pouch, welcome guide, our fan-favorite 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.7/20/17. I emailed the company and told them about the problem. They apologized.. Shipped me a new power bank with the accessories. They told me to keep the initial devices as a maker up for my troubles. NOW THAT'S WHAT I CALL GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE. Will buy again and highly recommend Anker products ..
title: I only got a box With the power bank only

author: Erica
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2019
review_content: This is the 2nd Anker I've purchased, and I absolutely love the product. I bought my 1st one to keep me charged during my 1st overseas trip to Asia. I bought a 2nd one so I could "tag team" between each one. Going to GoFest 2019 and then overseas.
title: Battery life

author: Emmanuel R.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
review_content: It no longer works as it did at first. Takes much longer to charge and battery no longer charges fully no matter how long you leave it plugged in.
title: Quality control is not good. Stay away

author: mookie
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
review_content: I purchased this battery pack due to the weather a storm and I lost my electricity and would not have had a way to charge my phone if needed. I know there’s the car charger but then I would have had to sit in the car until the phone was charged.
title: Keep it fully charged at all times!!

author: AM from WA
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2018
review_content: A bit on the heavy side but nice to have that extra power if your laptop, cell or other device needs a charge. I take it camping and hiking so I don't have to worry about finding a place to charge devices.  Well made and I definitely recommend it.
title: Power Versitility

author: JLove
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2017
review_content: A bit heavier/larger than I anticipated, but it worked exactly as stated.  I had planned on carrying this in my purse when we were out on the town in Europe, but it was too large to fit in my small shoulder bag and heavier than I would have liked to carry around for long periods of time.  For days that I traveled with my backpack it came in handy though.  I gave it a full charge before we left on our trip, and used it several times to recharge our iPhone and iPad without having to recharge the device.  Will definitely use again for future travels!!
title: Exactly as described!

author: Christine A. Janus
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2018
review_content: I bought this charger because my phone's battery was not holding a charge for very long and I needed to make sure that when I travel, my phone won't die by the time I reach my destination.  This charger did all that was promised.  I wish I had bought it sooner.  Not only did it keep my phone and other devices charged during flight, it charged them fast.  I am very happy with this product.
title: Fast charging and lasts a long time.  Love it!

author: Dasher6
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2016
review_content: Update,,i was using a 1 amp phone charger, you need a 2 amp charger and then it charges overnight. Anker's amazing customer service contacted me and helped me figure this out, they have great customer service!!-----(original post))-> It is a great  battery bank, but it just takes too ridiculously long to charge, plugged in the wall it took around 15 hours and it already had a quarter charge when I started, it would take 2 full days of charging with the 21 watt panel to charge it maybe more,, I wish anker would put some instructions or helpful common q&a of some kind in the package.
title: Anker 20100 mah battery bank

author: Scott Cook
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2019
review_content: My phone is used all day everyday and will occasionally need a middle of the day charge. With work I don’t have the choice of leaving it on a charger somewhere to charge. This device has been amazing, giving a quick charge and allowing me to continue working.
title: Power on the run!

author: androide_limon
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2016
review_content: I can separate in two parts my experience with Anker. Before and after I bought this amazing product.I travel frequently to the USA and use my mobile and hotspot all day. Before Anker and when the batteries run dry, I had a real problem. No battery  no comunication. Waste time looking to charge them just a bit.But as soon as I bought this battery, my problems ended, with one charge I have power two days. Now I can charge and recharge my phone and hot spot several times a day. Now I don't even bother to take my phone and hotspot fully charged.And when I need to charge the Anker battery, no problem, just connect the power at 9pm and it will be in full charge by 7am. It takes ten hours and lasts two days.
title: Way to go Anker

author: Naab
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
review_content: This is a decent power hold. Will hold a charge for several months and reliable. I have bought several of these for family and friends oversees and these get used HEAVILY with all the load shedding that happens. This brand and product are a lifesaver when you need dependability.
title: Anker is top quality

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2019
review_content: When I first got this in April I loved it, however in December I lost the ability to charge it.  I travel so much I am just getting around to writing a review now.  Very disappointing that it didn't last for a few years.  I am going on another trip in one week without any charger which will make things hard.  Hopefully they will fix this issue.
title: Had it less than a year and I cannot charge it anymore

author: madeline renee courson
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
review_content: I love to watch YouTube videos on my phone and as we all know those eat up the batteries on phones, this battery charger was amazing and it last all day charging my phone, my friends phone, and my Bluetooth earbuds all with out needing to recharge itself. This product came early also it was supposed to get here on a Wednesday and it came the Tuesday before. Would definitely recommend to others!
title: Long Life & Great Charge

author: B-rad
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2016
review_content: I think I love everything Anker. Started with their iPhone charging cables which are like indestructible. This here charger really does do its job. I bought one for my wife a few months back. It charges her 6plus at least 4 times. I ended up getting one for myself. Works amazing. I know there is so many choices out there and it's hard to decide which one to get. This one is honestly a good bang for your buck. Trust it!
title: Tired of so many choices. Stop looking!

author: WD
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2018
review_content: Works well, wish it charged faster but that seems to be an issue with all of them, and this brand is highly rated so I guess this likely as good as it gets for now. Also this is my first one of these so I suppose I'll learn more as I go along.
title: Pretty good.

author: asdf1999
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2015
review_content: A pretty good portable charger. When I received the charger, it was half charged. I finished charging it before using it. It did take a while to completely charge, but I expected that since it's a large portable charger. When fully charged, I get a few phone charges out of it before needing to recharge it. I like the blue light indicators that give you an idea of how much charge is left on the parck. Overall, a good charger for the price.
title: Great portable charger at a fair price

author: Dave
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2017
review_content: charged it up once received and used it several days in a row just to see how well it would work.  Charged my galaxy s8 5 times (>30% charge), charged an iPhone 6s 3 times (>20% charge), and charged iPad (dead,  0% charge) and this thing still had charge left on it!  I'm super happy with this thing.
title: I'm super happy with this thing

author: Ron Castro/At Your Service Inc.
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2017
review_content: I am very pleased with my battery. I had purchased one last yeah and I truly was very pleased with the quality of this brand. Never had an issue and charged every item sometimes two items at the same charge. I had a small issue with the unit. I emailed customer service late at night and when I awoke I had a reply. They asked me what my problem and gave me a possible solution. After trying there recommended solution they did not hesitate to replace my Unit. I must say the their customer service is equal to the quality of this battery.Thank you Anker for caring about your clients and your reputation. Five stars!

author: Cory Andrews
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2019
review_content: I paired this with a  Sony A7R ii.  I paid attention to making sure that it had 3A it out. Today,I shot all day with it not a problem at all and the battery is still full.
title: I shot all day using it with not a problem,  The battery is still full; my mind is blown!

author: Chill
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
review_content: It is a great little charger and fulfills all my needs when i travel. I consider myself a heavy user of my iPhone 6, and this will keep my phone charged for at least 4 days before I have to recharge the Anker. This is actually my 2nd one. It went on sale on Black Friday for $27.99.You can't go wrong with this charger. It has 2 USB ports and rapidly recharges my phone. I use it for camping and long trips.I have seen other 5000 MaH chargers for $60 or $70. People are crazy paying those prices. This is the best value on the market.

author: Mickey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2019
review_content: This is a second one I have ordered. This one being a gift. The first one has been great for the last 3 years. Charges a phone quickly and numerous times before I decided to charge it back up.I have been really happy with the Anker product line. I have numerous other products from them and have been happy with them all.

author: Doreen Godfrey
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2020
review_content: Brhis is the best power charger we’ve ever had. High quality, l ots of stored power and easy to use. I just bought my second one for the family because we all love it and use it. It’s nickname is “The Brick”. Because of its sleek look.

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019
review_content: Not a full 5 stars for traveling, only because I find that it’s a little bit heavy.Other than that, the power lasts forever, I used it sporadically for a week on vacation and never had to recharge it! Is there a lighter model? I’d buy it!

author: JASJeep
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2017
review_content: Anker makes the best products. High quality, excellent customer service and attention to detail with every product I've purchased from Anker. I keep the PowerCore 20100 in my laptop bag along with my other Anker products and have a second set in my backpack. I've included a picture of my Anker products I keep in my laptop bag.Don't waste money on inferior batteries, chargers or cables. Instead invest in Anker products: high quality, high performance and responsible prices.
title: I wouldn't buy anything but Anker

author: dinar
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2020
review_content: minus that it doesnt come with adapter so I had to reorder and for my phone it took a while to charge it, its first time I used it Ill see how it goes later

author: Quinndiesel
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2015
review_content: It is quite powerful, but heavy.  That is to be expected.  It only comes with the micro USB cable.  There is NO charging unit that allows you to plug it into the wall.  At this price I would expect this to be included.  The instructions tell you to plug it into another Anker USB charging device to charge this unit up.  That is absurd and lazy.UPDATE-  They have contacted me several times,by email and by phone and have made good on the lack of a charger plug by sending one immediately.  The customer service is outstanding and thorough in their follow up and dedication to make your experience a positive one.
title: It is quite powerful, but heavy. That is ...

author: Nancy J
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2017
review_content: My daughter-in-law had a portable battery connected to her phone to take pictures of her son's wedding.  This was an "Eureka moment"  for me!  It brought to mind the times our power went out and my phone was almost out of charge. I had to have one of those! The very next week I purchased this Anker Portable Charger and soon after the PowerLine II Lightning Cable along with the Elite Dual Port USB Travel Wall Connector and am quite pleased with all..  I want to add that I am really impressed with Anker as a company  Their products are packaged so carefully that one can tell that the company cares about all aspects of their products.  Thanks, guys!  You have made this almost 82 year old woman happy!.
title: The very next week I purchased this Anker Portable Charger and soon after the PowerLine II Lightning Cable along with the Elite Dual Port USB Travel Wall Connector and am quite pleased with all

author: Catherine
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019
review_content: I love this thing, it charges my phone so many times I use it daily and whenever I go to music festival which I do a lot, it keeps my phone charged to the max and it's still full battery after I used it like 3 times It's amazing. I lost my little case for it tho so it's now scratched but I recommend this to anyone
title: Durable, lasts forever

author: Amazon Customer
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2020
review_content: I genuinely recommend ANKER products, they don't disappoint! Easy charge and battery power lasts quite a while. Perfect for travels, functional and quality product.
title: A must-have for anyone on the go

author: RnC
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2016
review_content: I got this to replace my anker  2nd GEN Astro E7  when it stopped charging. I could not find the one I had before. This newer version is the closest to it  and believe me I looked! I even wrote to the company and ask them. They didn't write me back.  this "newer" version  is nowhere near as good as the older one. I do not know why they stop selling the other one but this one is so clearly inferior that I cannot even begin to express my frustration and disappointment.That said if you did not ever have the older version that I used then you'll probably like this one. This will charge your iPad once and maybe your phone once on a single charge. The one I had before was a beast. It would charge my ipad over two times at least.I went all the way to south Africa from the United States and never had to plug in the device I had to juice the entire way.  This "newer" thing won't even get me to Germany. :-(Update - apparently this one was defective.  How do I know, I just had an amazing customer service experience with Anker.  It was proactive on their part.  They contacted me!  I cannot say enough about how pleasant to deal with they were.  I was all set to move on and write this off and buy another brand but they worked with me and my INSANE schedule.  Multiple times, I dropped the ball on conrrespondence and they waited a respectful amount of time to pick the conversation back up.  I am a very very happy customer now do to the proactive customer care experience.  I still had to remove a star because the first one was defective and because I couldn't find the older version to just re-order.  Thanks Anker!I
title: The older version was much better.  this one will do half the job which is better than nothing. Update - Anker service rocks!

author: Marvin Herrera Angeles
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
review_content: Amazing battery life and amazing for traveling
title: Great Value

author: Bonnie E
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2017
review_content: I just lived through Hurricane Irma and had no power for days. This charger is compact and hold a lot of juice.I also use it to charge my phone on the run. I live in a city so I can't just plug it into my car because I walking everywhere.It's a life saver. I highly recommend it.

author: Michael N
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2016
review_content: This is the best battery pack I've ever used or seen. Portable, huge capacity, sturdy, & convenient. I have an older phone which eats through batteries. This can charge my phone multiple times and relieves any stress I have about dead cell batteries. So nice that it can charge any USB device. Love that it has two charging ports. Essential for Pokemon Go, festivals, camping, etc.

author: tander27
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
review_content: I can charge my Samsung Galaxy phone from under 10 percent to full battery, 5 times before having to recharge this pack. It works great, very happy with this item.

author: Jesse Blondin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2018
review_content: Recently took a trip abroad, and while this does take time to charge up fully, it also charges a phone multiple times over.  This is really useful when I want to charge my batteries to my camera or charge me phone in my backpack when away from a outlet.

author: Cynthia Andrade
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2018
review_content: I was worried this wouldn't be a good buy, but it proved me wrong. I was able to charge 3 phones one and one drone battery that charged four times for about 4 or 5 hours at a picnic and it  we only use about 25% of the battery maybe a little bit more
